List of Skills

From NovaRO: Wiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a list of all known skills in the game.

Novice

Skill Skill Form Properties Description
Basic Skill Passive
  • Max Level: 9
 Enables the use of Basic Interface Skills.
  • [Lv 1]: Enables Trading
    Allows the trading of items with other characters. Right click on a character to initiate.
  • [Lv 2]: Enables Emotions
    Alt+(0~9) and Ctrl+(1,-,=.)
    Alt+L opens additional Emotion icons.
  • [Lv 3]: Enables Sitting
    Sitting doubles HP/SP Recovery Speed.
    Press the Insert key or type /sit.
  • [Lv 4]: Enables Chat Room Creation
    Alt + C Opens a Chat Room or click the Chat button in the Basic Information Window.
  • [Lv 5]: Join a Party
    Character can join a party.
  • [Lv 6]: Enables Use of Kafra Storage
    Allows use of Kafra Storage.
  • [Lv 7]: Organize Party
    Create a party by typing /organize [Party Name], or @party [Party Name]
    Set party options in the Party Window (Alt+Z).
  • [Lv 9]: Enables Change to First Job Class
    Qualifies character for change from Novice to one of the First Job Classes.
First Aid Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 3
 Use 3 SP to restore 5 HP.
Play Dead Special, Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 5
 Feign death to avoid the menace of nearby enemies. The Play Dead status is cancelled by casting this skill again or by certain attacks from an enemy.


Swordsman Branch

Swordsman

Skill Skill Form Properties Description
Sword Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase damage inflicted with One-Handed Sword and Dagger weapons.


  • This skill adds Mastery ATK.


  • [Lv 1] : +4 ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +8 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +12 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +16 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : +24 ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : +28 ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : +32 ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : +36 ATK.
  • [Lv10] : +40 ATK.
Increase HP Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Enhance your natural HP Recovery by restoring additional HP every 10 seconds. Also increase HP received from consumables by 10% per skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : Recover (5 HP +0.2%) Max HP, Receive 10% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 2] : Recover (10 HP +0.4%) Max HP, Receive 20% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 3] : Recover (15 HP +0.6%) Max HP, Receive 30% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 4] : Recover (20 HP +0.8%) Max HP, Receive 40% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 5] : Recover (25 HP +1.0%) Max HP, Receive 50% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 6] : Recover (30 HP +1.2%) Max HP, Receive 60% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 7] : Recover (35 HP +1.4%) Max HP, Receive 70% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 8] : Recover (40 HP +1.6%) Max HP, Receive 80% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 9] : Recover (45 HP +1.8%) Max HP, Receive 90% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv10] : Recover (50 HP +2.0%) Max HP, Receive 100% more healing from consumables.
Bash Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 8
    • (Lv 6~10) : 15
  • Range: 1
  • Required weapon type:
    • Any except Bows
 Hit an enemy with a crushing force. If the Fatal Blow skill is learned, Bash will have an added Stun effect at level 6 and higher.


  • This skill has increased Hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% ATK, +5% Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 160% ATK, +10% Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 190% ATK, +15% Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 220% ATK, +20% Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 250% ATK, +25% Hit.
  • [Lv 6] : 280% ATK, +30% Hit.
  • [Lv 7] : 310% ATK, +35% Hit.
  • [Lv 8] : 340% ATK, +40% Hit.
  • [Lv 9] : 370% ATK, +45% Hit.
  • [Lv10] : 400% ATK, +50% Hit.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Provoke Status Increase,
Status Decrease
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 3 + Skill Level
  • Range: 9
 Attempt to enrage an enemy to decrease their defense while also increasing their attack power for 30 seconds.


  • The difference between the caster's base level and the target's base level will affect the chance of success.
  • Players will have their Soft DEF reduced opposed to Hard DEF.
  • This skill can interrupt a skill being cast.
  • This will remove the target's Frozen, Stone, Sleep or Play Dead status.
  • Does not work on Boss or Undead race enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 73% Chance to apply effect, +5% Damage, -10% DEF.
  • [Lv 2] : 76% Chance to apply effect, +8% Damage, -15% DEF.
  • [Lv 3] : 79% Chance to apply effect, +11% Damage, -20% DEF.
  • [Lv 4] : 82% Chance to apply effect, +14% Damage, -25% DEF.
  • [Lv 5] : 85% Chance to apply effect, +17% Damage, -30% DEF.
  • [Lv 6] : 88% Chance to apply effect, +20% Damage, -35% DEF.
  • [Lv 7] : 91% Chance to apply effect, +23% Damage, -40% DEF.
  • [Lv 8] : 94% Chance to apply effect, +26% Damage, -45% DEF.
  • [Lv 9] : 97% Chance to apply effect, +29% Damage, -50% DEF.
  • [Lv10] : 100% Chance to apply effect, +32% Damage, -55% DEF.
Two-Handed Sword Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase damage inflicted with Two-Handed Sword weapons.


  • This skill adds Mastery ATK.


  • [Lv 1] : +4 ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +8 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +12 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +16 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : +24 ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : +28 ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : +32 ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : +36 ATK.
  • [Lv10] : +40 ATK.
Magnum Break Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Fire
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 2s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 5x5
    • (Lv 5~8) : 7x7
    • (Lv 9~10) : 9x9
 Consume a small amount of HP to inflict damage and knock all enemies around you backwards 2 cells.


  • For 10 seconds after casting Magnum Break, your weapon will receive a 20% Fire property damage enhancement. (This effect gives you extra damage, and does not Endow your weapon to fire).
  • This skill has increased Hit rate.
  • If the targets hit are players outside the 3x3 area, they will take reduced damage from this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : Consumes 20 HP, +10% Hit, 120% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 110% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 2] : Consumes 20 HP, +20% Hit, 140% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 120% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 3] : Consumes 19 HP, +30% Hit, 160% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 130% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 4] : Consumes 19 HP, +40% Hit, 180% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 140% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 5] : Consumes 18 HP, +50% Hit, 200% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 150% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 6] : Consumes 18 HP, +60% Hit, 220% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 160% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 7] : Consumes 17 HP, +70% Hit, 240% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 170% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 8] : Consumes 17 HP, +80% Hit, 260% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 180% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 9] : Consumes 16 HP, +90% Hit, 280% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 190% ATK instead.
  • [Lv10] : Consumes 16 HP, +100% Hit, 300% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 200% ATK instead.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Endure Status Increase
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
 Remove your flinching animation, enabling you to attack and move while receiving damage.


  • This status is automatically cancelled after the duration or taking damage 7 times.
  • This skill has no effect in War of Emperium.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 MDEF, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 MDEF, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 MDEF, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +4 MDEF, Duration 19 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 MDEF, Duration 22 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +6 MDEF, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +7 MDEF, Duration 28 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +8 MDEF, Duration 31 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +9 MDEF, Duration 34 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +10 MDEF, Duration 37 seconds.
Moving HP-Recovery Passive
  • Platinum Skill
 Enable your natural HP recovery while moving.


  • Only 25% of the HP that is naturally recovered while standing is restored while moving.
  • The Increase HP Recovery skill does not affect Moving HP Recovery.
Fatal Blow Passive
  • Platinum Skill
 Enhance the Bash skill causing the Stun status on the target when you use level 6 Bash or higher.


  • The chance of inflicting Stun increases based on your Base Level and Bash skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : Bash level 6 = {1 x Base Level ÷ 10}%
  • [Lv 2] : Bash level 7 = {2 x Base Level ÷ 10}%
  • [Lv 3] : Bash level 8 = {3 x Base Level ÷ 10}%
  • [Lv 4] : Bash level 9 = {4 x Base Level ÷ 10}%
  • [Lv 5] : Bash level 10 = {5 x Base Level ÷ 10}%
Auto Berserk Status Increase,
Toggle
  • Platinum Skill
  • Target: Self
 Empowered by rage, you enter a condition that is equal to Level 10 Provoke status when your HP is reduced to less than 25%.


  • This effect has no duration, but can be dispelled and will end automatically if HP goes above 25%.
  • This skill costs 0 SP, but cannot be toggled without at least 1 SP.


Knight

Skill Type Properties Description
Spear Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase damage inflicted with Spear weapons. When riding a Pecopeco mount, you will have more ATK than normal.


  • This skill adds Mastery ATK.


  • [Lv 1] : +4 ATK. (+5 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 2] : +8 ATK. (+10 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 3] : +12 ATK. (+15 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 4] : +16 ATK. (+20 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 5] : +20 ATK. (+25 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 6] : +24 ATK. (+30 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 7] : +28 ATK. (+35 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 8] : +32 ATK. (+40 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv 9] : +36 ATK. (+45 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
  • [Lv10] : +40 ATK. (+50 ATK while mounted on a Pecopeco).
Two-Hand Quicken Status Increase
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10 + (4 × Skill Level)
  • Required weapon type:
    • Two-handed Sword
 Temporarily increase your Attack Speed, Critical Rate, and Hit while using a Two-Handed Sword weapon.


  • This skill increases your ASPD skill modifier by 7.
  • (This is not a flat ASPD bonus. To see how it affects your ASPD, please visit the Attack Speed page)
  • This effect is taken off if affected by Decrease Agility or Quagmire.
  • This effect is also taken off if you unequip the sword.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% ASPD, +2 Hit, +3 Critical Rate, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% ASPD, +4 Hit, +4 Critical Rate, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +10% ASPD, +6 Hit, +5 Critical Rate, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +10% ASPD, +8 Hit, +6 Critical Rate, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% ASPD, +10 Hit, +7 Critical Rate, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +10% ASPD, +12 Hit, +8 Critical Rate, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +10% ASPD, +14 Hit, +9 Critical Rate, Duration 210 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +10% ASPD, +16 Hit, +10 Critical Rate, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +10% ASPD, +18 Hit, +11 Critical Rate, Duration 270 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +10% ASPD, +20 Hit, +12 Critical Rate, Duration 300 seconds.
Auto Counter Reflection
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 3
  • Required weapon type:
    • Any except Bows
 Enter a defensive stance for a short time, and after receiving a melee attack from an enemy, negate the damage and retaliate back with a mighty critical attack.


  • The stance ends after countering one attack.
  • This skill can be combined with Crush Strike.


  • [Lv 1] : Stance lasts for 0.4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Stance lasts for 0.8 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Stance lasts for 1.2 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Stance lasts for 1.6 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Stance lasts for 2.0 seconds.
Riding Mount
  • Max Level: 1
 Allows riding of a Pecopeco mount. While mounted on a Pecopeco you will have +1000 weight limit.


  • Pecopeco mounts can be rented from the Universal Rental NPC in any town.
Pierce Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 7
  • Range: 2
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Attack an enemy using a thrusting stab, larger enemies will take additional hits. Increased Hit rate while using Pierce.


This skill hits multiple times depending on the targets size;

  • Small enemies are hit 1 time.
  • Medium enemies are hit 2 times.
  • Large enemies are hit 3 times.


  • [Lv 1] : 110% ATK, +5% Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% ATK, +10% Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 130% ATK, +15% Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 140% ATK, +20% Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 150% ATK, +25% Hit.
  • [Lv 6] : 160% ATK, +30% Hit.
  • [Lv 7] : 170% ATK, +35% Hit.
  • [Lv 8] : 180% ATK, +40% Hit.
  • [Lv 9] : 190% ATK, +45% Hit.
  • [Lv10] : 200% ATK, +50% Hit.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Bowling Bash Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12 + Skill Level
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.35s
  • Cooldown: 1s
  • Range: 2
  • Cast can not be interrupted
Does two successive hits to an enemy and its surroundings, while knocking them back 5 cells.


  • When using a Two-handed sword, this can deal up to 4 hits instead, depending on the amount of enemies near the target.
  • You can not change weapons for 1 second after casting this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 140% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 340% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 380% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 420% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 460% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 500% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Cavalier Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Reduces the Attack Speed penalty while mounted on a Pecopeco.


  • With no points invested in this skill, you will have 50% of normal Attack Speed while mounted.


  • [Lv 1] : 60% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : 70% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : 80% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : 90% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% of normal ASPD.
Spear Stab Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 9
  • Range: 4
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Forcefully stab an enemy with your spear that ignores DEF and knocks them back up to 6 cells.


  • This skill ignores the targets DEF.
  • All enemies in between you and the target will also suffer damage and knock back.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 160% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 240% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 300% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Spear Boomerang Ranged Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 1 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Throw your spear at an enemy from a distance to inflict ranged damage to them.


  • [Lv 1] : 150% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 250% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 350% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Brandish Spear Ranged Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 24
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.35s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.35s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cooldown: 1s
  • Range: 2
  • Requires riding a Pecopeco
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 A powerful lancing strike that can only be done while riding a Pecopeco.


  • Damage is increased based on your STR.
  • You can not change weapons for 1 second after using this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 500% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 700% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 1100% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 1300% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 1400% ATK.
Charge Attack Ranged Physical Attack
  • Platinum Skill
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Cooldown: 0.5s
  • Range: 14
  • Cast can not be interrupted
Charge towards a distant enemy, dealing 700% ATK and knock them back 2 cells.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:
This skill is disabled.

One Hand Quicken Status Increase
  • Soul Link Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Required weapon type:
    • One-handed Sword
 Temporarily increase your Attack Speed by 10% while using a One-Handed Sword for 600 seconds.


  • You must have Knight Spirit active to use this skill.
  • This effect is also taken off if you unequip the sword.
  • This skill increases your ASPD skill modifier by 7.
  • (This is not a flat ASPD bonus. To see how it affects your ASPD, please visit the Attack Speed page)
  • This effect is taken off if affected by Decrease Agility or Quagmire.


Lord Knight

Skill Type Properties Description
Aura Blade Status Increase
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10 + (8 × Skill Level)
  • Required weapon type:
    • Any except unarmed
 Enchant your currently equipped weapon with an aura that will inflict additional damage that ignores accuracy check and the enemies Defense.


  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : (Base Level x 4) Bonus Damage, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : (Base Level x 5) Bonus Damage, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : (Base Level x 6) Bonus Damage, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : (Base Level x 7) Bonus Damage, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : (Base Level x 8) Bonus Damage, Duration 120 seconds.
Parrying Protective
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Required weapon type:
    • Two-handed Sword
 Block damage from melee physical attacks with your Two-Handed Sword.


  • When you successfully block an attack, you will not be able to attack for a short time


  • [Lv 1] : 23% Chance to block, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 26% Chance to block, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 29% Chance to block, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 32% Chance to block, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 35% Chance to block, Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 38% Chance to block, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 41% Chance to block, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 44% Chance to block, Duration 50 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 47% Chance to block, Duration 55 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 50% Chance to block, Duration 60 seconds.


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • 25% Chance to block at max level.
Concentration Status Increase
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10 + (4 × Skill Level)
 Increase your Hit, and ATK, while reducing your DEF for a short time.


  • Also gain level 1 Endure effects for 60 seconds. (This does not overwrite your normal Endure skill).
  • The Endure granted with this skill will last 1 minute regardless of skill level.
  • This skill increases your EquipATK and WeaponATK by 15%.


  • [Lv 1] : -7% DEF, +10 Hit, +7% ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : -9% DEF, +20 Hit, +9% ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : -11% DEF, +30 Hit, +11% ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : -13% DEF, +40 Hit, +13% ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : -15% DEF, +50 Hit, +15% ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
Tension Relax Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
 Triple your natural HP regeneration while sitting.


  • If you are overweight, you will have regular HP regeneration speed instead.
  • The effect will be cancelled if you stand up, change gear, use an item, or receive damage.
Berserk Status Increase
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 200
  • Job Level Required: 50
 Use the power of rage to increase your Max HP, Movement Speed and Attack Power. However, there are various side effects as well. Berserk lasts for 5 minutes (600 seconds).


For the 5 minute duration or while HP is greater than 100, gain the following effects:

  • Triple your HP and restore it to full on cast.
  • Set SP to 0 on cast.
  • Disables item use.
  • Disables chatting.
  • Cannot change equipment.
  • Cannot cast skills (Except Auto Casts).
  • Cannot be healed by most sources, including Leech gears.
  • Prevents natural HP/SP regeneration.
  • Lose 5% of Max HP every 10 seconds.
  • Flee -50%.
  • Reduce DEF/MDEF to 0.
  • +200% ATK for physical attacks.
  • +25% Movement Speed (same as Increase AGI).
  • ASPD +30%.
  • Do not flinch when taking damage.
  • Set a base +15 ASPD skill bonus (not a flat increase, refer to Attack Speed).


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • Duration: 150 seconds.
Spiral Pierce Ranged Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 0.05 + (0.10 × Skill Level)
    • (Lv5) : 0.25s
  • Fixed Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 0.05 + (0.10 × Skill Level)
    • (Lv5) : 0.3s
  • Cast Delay: 0 + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 5
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Sword
    • Two-handed Sword
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Strike an enemy with spiraling strikes that immobilize it for a second.


  • Half of your weapon weight is added to Equipment ATK in the damage formula.
  • Mastery ATK does not affect this skill.
  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level.


The size modifier for this skill is not dependent on your weapon type, but instead the own skills formula;

  • Small - 125%
  • Medium - 100%
  • Large - 75%


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 350% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 400% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Head Crush Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 23
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 4
 Brutally strike an enemy with a 50% the chance of causing the Bleeding status, which will make the target continuously receive extra damage for up to 120 seconds.


  • Demon race and Undead element enemies cannot be afflicted with Bleeding.


  • [Lv 1] : 140% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 300% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Joint Beat Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10 + 2 × Ceiling(Skill Level / 2)
  • Cast Delay:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 0.8s
    • (Lv 5~10) : 1.0s
  • Range: 4
  • Required weapon type:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Strike an enemies vital points to cause various abnormal statuses at random, that last for 30 seconds.


  • The targets STR reduces the chance to be inflicted.
  • Every break effect can stack with each other.
  • Movement speed reductions do not stack with other sources.


The possible status effects are;

  • Ankle Break: Slows movement speed by 50%.
  • Wrist Break: Apply a -25 skill ASPD modifier and decrease ASPD by 25%.
  • Knee Break: Apply a -10 skill ASPD modifier, decrease ASPD by 10%, slows movement speed by 30%.
  • Shoulder Break: Decrease soft DEF by 50%.
  • Waist Break: Decrease base attack by 25%, soft DEF by 25%.
  • Neck Break: Afflict Bleeding status, change damage from Joint Beat to 20% ~ 200%


  • [Lv 1] : 60% ATK, 10% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 70% ATK, 15% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 80% ATK, 20% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 90% ATK, 25% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% ATK, 30% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 110% ATK, 35% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 120% ATK, 40% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 130% ATK, 45% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 140% ATK, 50% Chance to apply status effect.
  • [Lv10] : 150% ATK, 55% Chance to apply status effect.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%


Rune Knight

Skill Type Properties Description
Dragon Training Mount
  • Max Level: 5
 Allows you to ride a Ferus dragon. This skills effects are only active while you are riding a dragon.


  • This skill increases both Dragon Breath, and Dragon Breath Water damage.
  • This skill adds Mastery ATK.
  • While mounted on a dragon, Spear weapons will ignore the Size Penalty.


  • [Lv 1] : +0% Dragon Breath Base ATK%, +10 ATK when using a Spear weapon, +700 Maximum weight limit, 80% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% Dragon Breath Base ATK%, +20 ATK when using a Spear weapon, +900 Maximum weight limit, 85% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : +20% Dragon Breath Base ATK%, +30 ATK when using a Spear weapon, +1100 Maximum weight limit, 90% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : +30% Dragon Breath Base ATK%, +40 ATK when using a Spear weapon, +1300 Maximum weight limit, 95% of normal ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : +40% Dragon Breath Base ATK%, +50 ATK when using a Spear weapon, +1500 Maximum weight limit, 100% of normal ASPD.
Rune Mastery Passive,
Crafting
  • Max Level: 10
  • Consumes:  Elder Branch, Rune Gemstone
 Through the mastery of runes, you have gained the ability to craft and use the powerful effects of runestones.


  • Higher levels allows you to craft more types of runes, increase the success rate when crafting them, and create more runes each time.
  • Many runes also increase their effectiveness depending on Rune Mastery skill level. See Runes for more information.


  • [Lv 1] : +2% Success rate.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% Success rate.
  • [Lv 3] : +6% Success rate.
  • [Lv 4] : +8% Success rate.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% Success rate.
  • [Lv 6] : +12% Success rate.
  • [Lv 7] : +14% Success rate.
  • [Lv 8] : +16% Success rate.
  • [Lv 9] : +18% Success rate.
  • [Lv10] : +20% Success rate.
Phantom Thrust Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy, Ally
  • SP Cost: 12 + (3 × Skill Level)
  • Range: 4 + Skill Level
  • Required weapon type:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Pull a target closer to yourself, and deal damage only if the target is an enemy.


  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level and Spear Mastery skill level.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Skill_Level x 50 + Spear_Mastery_Skill_Level x 10} x {Base Level ÷ 150}]%


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • Cooldown: 90 seconds.
Enchant Blade Status Increase
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 35 + (5 × Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
 Enchant your blade with a magic energy allowing you to deal additional magic damage with your physical attacks for 5 minutes.


  • Bonus magic damage is increased based on your Base, Level, INT, MATK, and skill level.
  • This damage treats Hard MDEF the same as Soft MDEF, reducing damage by a flat amount instead of a %.


Bonus Damage is calculated using the following formula;
Bonus Damage = [{{Skill_Level x 20 + 100} x {Base_Level ÷ 100}} + INT + MATK - {Enemy Soft Mdef + Hard Mdef}]%


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • Increases Melee Physical damage by 2% for 30 seconds.
Hundred Spear Ranged Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 60
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.1 - (0.1 × Skill Level sec)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 3x3
    • (Lv 5~8) : 5x5
    • (Lv 9~10) : 7x7
  • Required weapon type:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
  • Cast can not be interrupted
Pierce several targets multiple times in a row with your spear.


  • Damage is increased based on Spiral Pierce skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1400% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1600% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 1800% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 2000% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 2200% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 2400% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 2600% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK% + 50 x Spiral_Pierce_Skill_Level}]%

Dragon Breath Ranged Physical Attack,
Ground
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Skill
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 × Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 0.0s
    • (Lv 4~6) : 1.0s
    • (Lv 7~8) : 1.5s
    • (Lv 9~10) : 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 3x3
    • (Lv 4~6) : 5x5
    • (Lv 7~8) : 7x7
    • (Lv 9~10) : 9x9
  • Requires riding a Ferus dragon mount
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Command your Dragon to spew out scorching fire at a targeted location on the ground that will damage all enemies in the area.


  • There is a 15% chance of causing the Burning status on enemies for 10 seconds.
  • Damage is calculated based on your Current HP, Max SP, Base Level, Dragon Breath skill level, Dragon Training skill level, ranged damage modifiers, and the property of the attack.


  •  Turisus Runestone endows the skill property to Holy.
  •  Lux Anima Rune endows the skill property to Shadow.
  •  Lux Anima Rune (Shadow) element takes priority if both Runestones are active.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Skill_Level x {Current_HP ÷ 50 + Max_SP ÷ 4} x {Base_Level ÷ 100} x {100 + {(Dragon_Training_Skill_Level - 1) x 10}} ÷ 100}]%

Dragon Howling Status Decrease
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1) : 7x7
    • (Lv 2) : 9x9
    • (Lv 3) : 11x11
    • (Lv 4) : 13x13
    • (Lv 5) : 15x15
  • Requires riding a Ferus dragon mount
 Command your dragon to howl, potentially causing the Fear status to all enemies in range.


  • [Lv 1] : 56% Chance to apply Fear status.
  • [Lv 2] : 62% Chance to apply Fear status.
  • [Lv 3] : 68% Chance to apply Fear status.
  • [Lv 4] : 74% Chance to apply Fear status.
  • [Lv 5] : 80% Chance to apply Fear status.


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • Increases Ranged Physical damage by 4% for 30 seconds.
Dragon Breath Water Ranged Physical Attack,
Ground
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Skill
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 × Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 0.0s
    • (Lv 4~6) : 1.0s
    • (Lv 7~8) : 1.5s
    • (Lv 9~10) : 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 3x3
    • (Lv 4~6) : 5x5
    • (Lv 7~8) : 7x7
    • (Lv 9~10) : 9x9
  • Requires riding a Ferus dragon mount
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Command your Dragon to spew out freezing cold ice at a targeted location on the ground that will damage all enemies in the area.


  • There is a 15% chance of causing the Freezing status on enemies.
  • Damage is calculated based on your Current HP, Max SP, Base Level, Dragon Breath skill level, Dragon Training skill level, ranged damage modifiers, and the property of the attack.


  •  Asir Runestone endows the skill property to Ghost.
  •  Lux Anima Rune endows the skill property to Neutral.
  •  Lux Anima Rune (Neutral) element takes priority if both Runestones are active.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Skill_Level x {Current_HP ÷ 50 + Max_SP ÷ 4} x {Base_Level ÷ 100} x {100 + {(Dragon_Training_Skill_Level - 1) x 10}} ÷ 100}]%

Sonic Wave Ranged Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30 + (3 × Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 1.75s
 Smash your weapon into the ground creating a sonic wave to damage an enemy in the distance


  • This skill can apply Critical Hits.
  • Critical Damage Modifiers apply to this skill at half their value. (30% Critical Damage actually gives +15% Critical Damage instead).
  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% ATK, 7 Cell range.
  • [Lv 2] : 1350% ATK, 7 Cell range.
  • [Lv 3] : 1500% ATK, 8 Cell range.
  • [Lv 4] : 1650% ATK, 8 Cell range.
  • [Lv 5] : 1800% ATK, 9 Cell range.
  • [Lv 6] : 1950% ATK, 9 Cell range.
  • [Lv 7] : 2100% ATK, 10 Cell range.
  • [Lv 8] : 2250% ATK, 10 Cell range.
  • [Lv 9] : 2400% ATK, 11 Cell range.
  • [Lv10] : 2550% ATK, 11 Cell range.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%} x {Base_Level ÷ 100}]%

Death Bound Reflection
  • Max Level: 10
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 50
    • (Lv 2~10) : 55 + (5 × Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
 Take a stance for 3 seconds, if an enemy attacks you with a melee attack, amplify the damage. The attacker takes 70% of the amplified damage while you take 30%.


  • This status only lasts for 1 attack.
  • Cannot be used on Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : +600% damage taken.
  • [Lv 2] : +700% damage taken.
  • [Lv 3] : +800% damage taken.
  • [Lv 4] : +900% damage taken.
  • [Lv 5] : +1000% damage taken.
  • [Lv 6] : +1100% damage taken.
  • [Lv 7] : +1200% damage taken.
  • [Lv 8] : +1300% damage taken.
  • [Lv 9] : +1400% damage taken.
  • [Lv10] : +1500% damage taken.
Wind Cutter Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 0.95 - (0.13 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 3x3
    • (Lv 3~4) : 5x5
    • (Lv 5) : 7x7
  • Required weapon type:
    • Dagger
    • One-handed Sword
    • Two-handed Sword
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Swing your weapon around you and deal damage to all nearby enemies.


  • If you use a Two-Handed Sword, this skill will ignore DEF and hit enemies twice.
  • If you use a Spear class weapon, this skill will deal Ranged Physical damage instead of Melee Physical damage.
  • Base Skill Damage is changed if you equip a Two-Handed word or a Spear class weapon.


Skill Level 1 2 3 4 5
Weapon Type
Two-Handed (per hit) 250% 500% 750% 1000% 1250%
Spear 400% 800% 1200% 1600% 2000%
Other Weapon 300% 600% 900% 1200% 1500%


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%}]%

Ignition Break Melee Physical Attack
  • Max Level: 5
  • Property: Based on Weapon
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Area of Effect
    • (Lv 1~5) : 9x9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Dagger
    • One-handed Sword
    • Two-handed Sword
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Sword
  • Cast can not be interrupted
Plunge your weapon into the ground causing a strong explosion inflicting damage to all enemies around you.


  • This skill can apply Critical Hits.
  • Critical Damage Modifiers apply to this skill at half their value. (30% Critical Damage actually gives +15% Critical Damage instead).
  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level.
  • This skill can't be interrupted.


  • [Lv 1] : 450% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1350% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 2250% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Base_ATK%} x {Base_Level ÷ 100}]%


In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:

  • This skills Critical Rate is halved.


Rune Skills
Runestone Skill Type Properties Description
 Turisus Runestone Giant Growth Status Increase
  • Target: Self
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
 For 15 minutes, gain the following effects:
  • Increase STR by 30.
  • Add a 30% chance to hit an enemy for 2.5 times the damage while melee attacking.
  • Increase ATK-based physical damage by 250% (125% during PVP). This effect can not stack with Crush Strike and is additive rather than multiplicative.
  • Increases melee physical damage by 15%.
  • The damage bonus now also applies to skill attacks.
  • Endows Dragon Breath with the Holy Element.
 Isia Runestone Vitality Activation Status Increase
  • Target: Self
 For 15 minutes, gain the following effects:
  • Healing received is increased by 50%. (Disabled inside Monster Hunter)
  • Reduces melee physical reflection damage by 50%.
 Pertz Runestone Storm Blast Melee Physical Attack
  • Target: Self
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cooldown: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
  • Can damage traps
 Deal damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area around you.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Rune_Mastery_Skill_Level + {STR ÷ ~5.7}} x 100]%

 Hagalas Runestone Stone Hard Skin Status Increase
  • Target: Self
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
 Consume 20% of your current HP.

For 15 minutes or when you have received damage greater than the amount of HP paid, gain the following effects:

  • Increase hard DEF and hard MDEF by Job Level × Rune Mastery Level ÷ 4
  • When you receive a physical melee attack, 30% chance of the attacker's weapon breaking. If the attacker is a monster, reduce their ATK by 25% for 10 seconds instead. This effect does not work against Boss monsters.
 Asir Runestone Fighting Spirit Status Increase
  • Target: Self
 For 15 minutes, gain the following effects:
  • Increase your ATK by 70 + (7 × Number of Party Members).
  • Increase your ASPD skill modifier by (0.4 × Rune Mastery Level)
  • Endows Dragon Breath Water with the Ghost Element.
 Urj Runestone Abundance Recovery
  • Target: Self
 For 15 minutes, restore 60 SP every 10 seconds.
 Rhydo Runestone Crush Strike Melee Physical Attack
  • Target: Self
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
 Your next physical melee attack will deal massive damage.


  • Once you attack, there is a 20% chance of your weapon breaking. This effect runs out if not used in 30 seconds, or if you change equipment.
  • This rune has a 30 second cooldown.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
SkillFormula% = [{Weapon_Level x {Weapon_Refine + 6} x 100} + Weapon ATK + Weapon Weight]%

 Nosiege Runestone Refresh Recovery
  • Target: Self
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
 Recover 25% of your MaxHP and restore and prevent the following status ailments for the next 60 seconds:
  • Stun / Sleep / Curse / Stone Curse / Poison / Blind / Silence / Bleeding / Confusion / Freeze / Deep Sleep / Burning / Freezing / Crystallize
  • Guillotine Cross Poisons
  • Marsh of Abyss
  • Howling of Mandragora


  • 120 second item reuse delay.
 Verkana Runestone Millenium Shield Protective
  • Target: Self
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Create shields that absorb any type of damage and lasts for 15 minutes.

There is a 20% chance 4 shields are created, 30% chance that 3 shields are created and a 50% chance that 2 shields are created. Each shield has 1000 HP and excess damage does not carry over.


  • 60 second item reuse delay.
 Lux Anima Rune Lux Anima Status Increase
  • Target: Self
 For 15 minutes, gain the following effects:
  • A melee physical attack has a 15% chance to trigger Storm Blast Level 1.
  • Increases damage against all size enemies by 30%.
  • Increases critical damage by 30%.
  • Increases short range physical damage by 30%.
  • Increases long range physical damage by 30%.
  • Increases Max HP and Max SP by 30%.


  • Endows Dragon Breath with the Shadow Element. Takes priority over  Turisus Runestone.
  • Endows Dragon Breath Water with the Neutral Element. Takes priority over  Asir Runestone.

Skill Type Properties Description
Faith Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase your maximum HP and resistance to the Holy property.


  • [Lv 1] : +200 Max HP, +5% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 2] : +400 Max HP, +10% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 3] : +600 Max HP, +15% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 4] : +800 Max HP, +20% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 5] : +1000 Max HP, +25% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 6] : +1200 Max HP, +30% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 7] : +1400 Max HP, +35% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 8] : +1600 Max HP, +40% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv 9] : +1800 Max HP, +45% Holy resistance.
  • [Lv10] : +2000 Max HP, +50% Holy resistance.
Auto Guard Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Ready your shield to block incoming physical attacks.


  • Duration lasts for 600 seconds or until toggled off.


  • [Lv 1] : 5% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 2] : 10% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 3] : 14% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 4] : 18% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 5] : 21% Chance to block.

  • [Lv 7] : 26% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 8] : 28% Chance to block.
  • [Lv 9] : 29% Chance to block.
  • [Lv10] : 30% Chance to block.

  • [Lv 2] : +8 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +12 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +16 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : +24 ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : +28 ATK.

  • [Lv10] : +40 ATK.
Riding Passive
Mobility
  • Max Level: 1
 Enable riding of the Pecopeco.

While riding a Pecopeco, your maximum carry weight increases by 1000.

  • Max Level: 10
 Increases physical attack against Demon and Undead race enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +6 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +9 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +12 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +15 ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : +18 ATK.

  • [Lv 9] : +27 ATK.
  • [Lv10] : +30 ATK.
Divine Protection Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase defense against Demon and Undead race enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 DEF.
  • [Lv 2] : +6 DEF.
  • [Lv 3] : +9 DEF.
  • [Lv 4] : +12 DEF.
  • [Lv 5] : +15 DEF.
  • [Lv 6] : +18 DEF.
  • [Lv 7] : +21 DEF.
  • [Lv 8] : +24 DEF.
  • [Lv 9] : +27 DEF.
  • [Lv10] : +30 DEF.
Heal Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Restores HP to a single target.
  • The amount of HP restored is based on the skill level, Base Level, INT, and MATK of the caster.
  • If cast on an undead player or monster this will instead deal Holy element magic damage to the target. (Can be cast on monsters if "/noshift" is activated).
Cure Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Removes Silence, Blind, and Chaos from a target.
Shield Charge Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 3
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Attack an enemy with your shield dealing Melee Physical damage. Also has a chance to inflict the Stun status onto them and knock them back.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK, 20% Chance to apply Stun status, and knock them back 5 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% ATK, 25% Chance to apply Stun status, and knock them back 6 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 160% ATK, 30% Chance to apply Stun status, and knock them back 7 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 180% ATK, 35% Chance to apply Stun status, and knock them back 8 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% ATK, 40% Chance to apply Stun status, and knock them back 9 cells.

  • Cast Delay: 0.7s

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Requires a shield equipped

  • [Lv 3] : Reflect 19% of damage.
  • [Lv 4] : Reflect 22% of damage.

  • [Lv 8] : Reflect 34% of damage.
  • [Lv 9] : Reflect 37% of damage.
  • [Lv10] : Reflect 40% of damage.
Holy Cross Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10 + (1 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Slash an enemy with a cross shape dealing melee physical damage with a chance to inflict the Blind status to the target.

When wielding a two-handed weapon the damage is increased.


  • This skills damage is forced to the Holy element.


  • [Lv 1] : 135% ATK (One-hand), 270% ATK (Two-hand), 3% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 2] : 170% ATK (One-hand), 340% ATK (Two-hand), 6% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 3] : 205% ATK (One-hand), 410% ATK (Two-hand), 9% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% ATK (One-hand), 480% ATK (Two-hand), 12% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 5] : 275% ATK (One-hand), 550% ATK (Two-hand), 15% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 6] : 310% ATK (One-hand), 620% ATK (Two-hand), 18% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 7] : 345% ATK (One-hand), 690% ATK (Two-hand), 21% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 8] : 380% ATK (One-hand), 760% ATK (Two-hand), 24% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 9] : 415% ATK (One-hand), 830% ATK (Two-hand), 27% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv10] : 450% ATK (One-hand), 900% ATK (Two-hand), 30% Chance to Blind.

  • Max Level: 10

Devotion Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 25
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Range: 6 + (1 x Skill Level)
 Adds a protective link to your party members, allowing you to take all of the damage they receive.

This link will cancel if you go out of range of the target, switch maps, teleport, or the duration expires.


  • You can have up to 1 link for every level of this skill learned.
  • Targets must be within 10 base levels of the caster.
  • Crusader, Paladin, and Royal Guards can not be targeted by this skill.
  • Targets linked with this skill will inherit any aura-like buffs the caster has. (eg. Auto Guard, Defender, and Reflect Shield will all block damage for the target).


  • [Lv 1] : 7 Cells range, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 8 Cells range, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 9 Cells range, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 10 Cells range, Duration 75 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 11 Cells range, Duration 90 seconds.
Providence Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Range: 9
 Increases a targets resistance to Demon race monsters and Holy element attacks.


  • Crusader, Paladin, and Royal Guards can not be targeted by this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 5% Demon race resistance, 5% Holy element resistance.
  • [Lv 2] : 10% Demon race resistance, 10% Holy element resistance.
  • [Lv 3] : 15% Demon race resistance, 15% Holy element resistance.
  • [Lv 4] : 20% Demon race resistance, 20% Holy element resistance.
  • [Lv 5] : 25% Demon race resistance, 25% Holy element resistance.
Defender Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cast Delay: 0.8s
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Shield yourself within an aura that reduces ranged physical damage taken at the cost of reducing your ASPD.

This skill also reduces your movement speed while active.


  • [Lv 1] : Reduces ranged damage by 20%, -20% ASPD,
  • [Lv 2] : Reduces ranged damage by 35%, -15% ASPD,
  • [Lv 3] : Reduces ranged damage by 50%, -10% ASPD,
  • [Lv 4] : Reduces ranged damage by 65%, -5% ASPD,
  • [Lv 5] : Reduces ranged damage by 80%, -0% ASPD,
Spear Quicken Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Increases ASPD with spear type weapons, as well as your Critical Rate and Flee.


  • This skill increases your ASPD skill modifier by 7.
  • (This is not a flat ASPD bonus. To see how it affects your ASPD, please visit the Attack Speed page)
  • This effect is taken off if affected by Decrease Agility or Quagmire.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% ASPD, +3 Critical Rate, +2 Flee, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% ASPD, +6 Critical Rate, +4 Flee, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +10% ASPD, +9 Critical Rate, +6 Flee, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +10% ASPD, +12 Critical Rate, +8 Flee, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% ASPD, +15 Critical Rate, +10 Flee, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +10% ASPD, +18 Critical Rate, +12 Flee, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +10% ASPD, +21 Critical Rate, +14 Flee, Duration 210 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +10% ASPD, +24 Critical Rate, +16 Flee, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +10% ASPD, +27 Critical Rate, +18 Flee, Duration 270 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +10% ASPD, +30 Critical Rate, +20 Flee, Duration 300 seconds.
Shrink Support
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Adds a 50% chance to stun targets when Auto Guard blocks attacks from that target.

Duration lasts for 15 minutes.

Skill Type Properties Description
Pressure Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon a giant cross from the sky to crush the target, dealing Holy property magic damage.

Summon a giant cross from the sky to crush the target, dealing 650 ~ 1250% MATK of holy property magic.


  • This skills damage scales with your Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 650% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 950% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1100% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1250% MATK.
Sacrifice Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
 Sacrifice 9% of your Max HP for each time you are attacked, to reflect damage back to the target attacking you.

The damage dealt to the enemy depends on the amount inflicted on to you.


  • This will work for up to 5 attacks before needing to be recast.
  • This skills damage is forced to the Neutral property.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% Damage reflected.
  • [Lv 2] : 110% Damage reflected.
  • [Lv 3] : 120% Damage reflected.
  • [Lv 4] : 130% Damage reflected.
  • [Lv 5] : 140% Damage reflected.
Gospel Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 80
    • (Lv 6~10) : 100
 Apply random buffs to allies and debuffs to enemies within a cross shaped AoE around you. Continuously drains HP and SP, and has a 55 ~ 100% chance to apply effects throughout the duration depending on the skill level.


  • This will remove all buffs and debuffs from the caster.


Positive Effects

  • Restores between 1 and 9,999 HP.
  • Cures from the majority of status effects.
  • Applies Level 10 Blessing.
  • Applies Level 10 Increase Agility.
  • Endows weapon with the Holy property.
  • Endows armor with the Holy property.
  • Doubles Max HP.
  • Doubles Max SP.
  • Boosts all stats by 20.
  • Boosts hard defense by 25% for 10 seconds.
  • Doubles attack.
  • Boosts flee and hit rate by 50.
  • Grants immunity against status effects.


Negative Effects

  • Inflicts between 1 and 9,999 of Neutral property fixed damage, which ignores the accuracy check and bypasses Kyrie Eleison.
  • Causes the Curse status for an unusually lengthy period of time.
  • Causes the Blind status for an unusually lengthy period of time.
  • Causes the Poison status for an unusually lengthy period of time.
  • Applies Level 10 Provoke.
  • Drops all defense to 0.
  • Drops attack to 0.
  • Drops flee rate to 0.
  • Reduces ASPD and movement speed by 75%.
Shield Chain Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 11
  • Requires a shield equipped
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Strike an enemy with your shield 5 times in a row, dealing ranged physical damage.

You also get +20 Hit while using this skill.


  • This skills damage is based on casters Base Level, and the equipped shields weight, and refinement.


  • [Lv 1] : 500% ATK, +20 Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 700% ATK, +20 Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 900% ATK, +20 Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 1100% ATK, +20 Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 1300% ATK, +20 Hit.


Royal Guard

Skill Type Properties Description
Banishing Point Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 18 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 7
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Strike an enemy at a distance with your spear, with increased accuracy.


  • This skill deals ranged physical damage.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.
  • This skills damage is increased based on Bash's skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, +5 Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, +10 Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, +15 Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, +20 Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, +25 Hit.
  • [Lv 6] : 600% ATK, +30 Hit.
  • [Lv 7] : 700% ATK, +35 Hit.
  • [Lv 8] : 800% ATK, +40 Hit.
  • [Lv 9] : 900% ATK, +45 Hit.
  • [Lv10] : 1000% ATK, +50 Hit.


Damage is calculated using the following formula: OUTDATED
Damage (ATK) = [{Base_Damage + (Bash_Level × 30)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Trample Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15 + (15 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 5x5
 Trample the area around you with a chance of removing traps nearby. Explosive traps will still detonate but you have a chance to dodge the damage.


  • Dodge chance is increased based on the casters AGI and DEX.


  • [Lv 1] : 5% Base dodge chance, 50% Chance of removing traps.
  • [Lv 2] : 10% Base dodge chance, 75% Chance of removing traps.
  • [Lv 3] : 15% Base dodge chance, 100% Chance of removing traps.


Formula for calculating chance to dodge explosive traps:
Dodge Chance = [Base_Dodge_Chance + (DEX + AGI) ÷ 4]%

Shield Press Damage
  • Max Level: 5

  • SP Cost: 8 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Range: 1
  • Requires a shield equipped

  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 1600% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 1800% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 2000% ATK.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK) = [{Base_Damage + Shield_Weight + STR} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]% + (VIT × Shield_Refine)

Reflect Damage Reduction Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Reduces damage reflected from melee damage used by the player.

Force of Vanguard Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Apply a buff to yourself to increase your Max HP, DEF, and allows you to gain Rage counters.

Whenever you receive physical damage you have a chance to gain a Rage counter, increasing this skills level increases the maximum amount of Rage counters allowed.

Continuously drains SP while active.


  • Rage counters can be used for other skills.


  • [Lv 1] : +3% Max HP, +2% DEF, 20% Chance to gain Rage counter, Max 7 Rage counters, Drains 20 SP every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +6% Max HP, +4% DEF, 32% Chance to gain Rage counter, Max 9 Rage counters, Drains 16 SP every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +9% Max HP, +6% DEF, 44% Chance to gain Rage counter, Max 11 Rage counters, Drains 12 SP every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +12% Max HP, +8% DEF, 56% Chance to gain Rage counter, Max 13 Rage counters, Drains 8 SP every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +15% Max HP, +10% DEF, 68% Chance to gain Rage counter, Max 15 Rage counters, Drains 4 SP every 10 seconds.
Moon Slasher Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 16 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 7s - (1s x Skill Level)
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Deals short ranged damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area of effect around you.


  • This skills damage is increased based on Overbrand's skill level.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.
  • After casting this skill, the damage of Overbrand, is increased for a few seconds.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK, 2 seconds of extra Overbrand damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 240% ATK, 4 seconds of extra Overbrand damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 360% ATK, 6 seconds of extra Overbrand damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 480% ATK, 8 seconds of extra Overbrand damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 600% ATK, 10 seconds of extra Overbrand damage.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK) = [{Base_Damage + (Overbrand_Level × 80)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Pinpoint Attack Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 5
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Leap at a target dealing ranged critical damage, and inflicting the Bleeding status on the target or destroying a piece of the targets equipment.


  • This skill always deals Critical hits, even with 1 critical rate.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters AGI.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, Inflict Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, Destroy Helmet.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, Destroy Shield.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, Destroy Armor.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, Destroy Weapon.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK) = [{Base_Damage + (AGI × 5)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 120)]%

Rage Burst Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 150
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 1
 Release all the Rage counters accumulated from Force of Vanguard to deal massive damage to a single target. The more Rage counters the higher the damage.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters missing HP, Base Level, and the amount of Rage counters.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK) = [{(Rage_Counters × 200) + (MaxHP − CurrentHP) ÷ 100} × (BaseLevel × 100)]%

Exceed Break Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 8 + (12 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.5s + (0.5s x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Buff yourself to strengthen your next normal attack, while decreasing movement speed during this time.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Job Level, and Base Level.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the equipped weapons Weight and Weapon Level.


  • [Lv 1] : +100% ATK, -50% Movement speed.
  • [Lv 2] : +200% ATK, -40% Movement speed.
  • [Lv 3] : +300% ATK, -30% Movement speed.
  • [Lv 4] : +400% ATK, -20% Movement speed.
  • [Lv 5] : +500% ATK, -10% Movement speed.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK): [{Base_Damage + (JobLevel × 10)} + (WeaponWeight × WeaponLevel) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Prestige Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
 Places an aura around you that increases your hard DEF and gives you a base chance to dodge magic attacks.


  • The DEF increase is increased based on the casters Base Level, and Defender's skill level.
  • The dodge chance is increased based on the casters INT, LUK, Base Level, and this skills level.


  • [Lv 1] : +15 DEF, 1% Base Dodge chance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +30 DEF, 2% Base Dodge chance, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +45 DEF, 3% Base Dodge chance, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +60 DEF, 4% Base Dodge chance, Duration 75 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +75 DEF, 5% Base Dodge chance, Duration 90 seconds.


Defense is calculated using the following formula:
DEF Increase = {Base_DEF_Increase + (Defender_Level × 10)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)

Magic dodge chance is calculated using the following formula:
Dodge Chance = [Base_Dodge_Chance + {(INT + LUK) × (SkillLevel ÷ 20) × (BaseLevel ÷ 200)}]%

Earth Drive Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 44 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 8s - (1s x Skill Level)
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 3x3
    • (Lv 3~4) : 5x5
    • (Lv 5) : 7x7
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Brandish your shield dealing melee damage to all nearby enemies.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, Skill Level, STR, and VIT.
  • This will remove ground magic/effects within the area of effect, as well as reveal hidden targets.


  • [Lv 1] : 380% ATK, Debuff lasts 3 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 760% ATK, Debuff lasts 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 1140% ATK, Debuff lasts 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 1520% ATK, Debuff lasts 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 1900% ATK, Debuff lasts 15 seconds.


Damage is calculated using the following formula:
Damage (ATK) = [(Shield weight × (SkillLevel + 1)) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

King's Grace Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 220 - (20 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 110s - (10s x Skill Level)
 Immobilizes you and your nearby party members for 5 seconds preventing all damage, and recovering HP every second to all party members for the duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 4% HP recovered every second.
  • [Lv 2] : 5% HP recovered every second.
  • [Lv 3] : 6% HP recovered every second.
  • [Lv 4] : 7% HP recovered every second.
  • [Lv 5] : 8% HP recovered every second.


Removes various status debuffs on you and your party, the debuffs cleared include;

  • Bleeding
  • Blind
  • Burning
  • Chaos
  • Crystallization
  • Curse
  • Deep Sleep
  • Fear
  • Freezing
  • Frozen
  • Hallucination
  • Howling
  • Poison
  • Silence
  • Sleep
  • Stone
  • Stun
Cannon Spear Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 1.7s
  • Range: 7
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Thrust your spear with the power of a cannon, dealing damage to an enemy and all enemies near them from up to 7 cells away.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters STR, Base Level, and the Skill Level.
  • This skill can deal critical hits.
  • The critical chance for this skill is equal to your Critical Rate.
  • Critical Damage modifiers applies to this skill at half their value.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK, 3x3 AoE.
  • [Lv 2] : 240% ATK, 3x3 AoE.
  • [Lv 3] : 360% ATK, 5x5 AoE.
  • [Lv 4] : 480% ATK, 5x5 AoE.
  • [Lv 5] : 600% ATK, 7x7 AoE.


Damage is calculated using the following formula: OUTDATED
Damage (ATK) = [{Base_Damage + (STR × SkillLevel)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Shield Spell Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Requires a shield equipped
 Allows you to gain various effects based on the level of the skill used.


  • Only one spell may be active at a time.
  • You don't need a shield equipped after getting the effect, you're free to swap to your main weapon being it one-handed or two-handed.


  • [Lv 1] : Recovers 3% of user's MaxHP every 3 seconds for 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Recovers 3% of user's MaxSP every 5 seconds for 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : ATK + 150 and MATK + 150 for 90 seconds.

In High Rank Monster Hunting missions:
Any level used will grant ATK +150, MATK +150 and lasts for 30 seconds. Each skill level is replaced with a new effect.

  • [Lv 1] : Ranged Damage +3%.
  • [Lv 2] : All Property Magical Damage +3%.
  • [Lv 3] : Melee Damage +5%.
Overbrand Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cooldown: 0.35s
  • Range: 2
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Brand a cross into an enemy inflicting high damage in a 7x7 area.


  • Damage is increased for a short time after casting Moon Slasher.


  • [Lv 1] : 350% ATK, 500% after Moon Slasher.
  • [Lv 2] : 700% ATK, 1000% after Moon Slasher.
  • [Lv 3] : 1050% ATK, 1500% after Moon Slasher.
  • [Lv 4] : 1400% ATK, 2000% after Moon Slasher.
  • [Lv 5] : 1750% ATK, 2500% after Moon Slasher.
Banding Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 24 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 11x11
 Increase your DEF based on how many party members are in an 11x11 area around you.
  • Requires being in a party.
  • Cannot be used with Prestige.


  • [Lv 1] : DEF +18 per party member, 60s duration.
  • [Lv 2] : DEF +21 per party member, 90s duration.
  • [Lv 3] : DEF +24 per party member, 120s duration.
  • [Lv 4] : DEF +27 per party member, 150s duration.
  • [Lv 5] : DEF +30 per party member, 180s duration.
Hesperus Lit Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30 + (7 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: no
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 0.2s
  • Range: 3
  • Required weapon types:
    • One-handed Spear
    • Two-handed Spear
 Attack an enemy using the power of the force of light.


  • Damage is increased based on your Base Level, and VIT.
  • Damage is increased further if Inspiration is active.


  • [Lv 1] :300% ATK, 450% with Inspiration.
  • [Lv 2] :600% ATK, 900% with Inspiration.
  • [Lv 3] :900% ATK, 1350% with Inspiration.
  • [Lv 4] :1200% ATK, 1800% with Inspiration.
  • [Lv 5] :1500% ATK, 2250% with Inspiration.
Inspiration Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 600s - (60s x Skill Level)
 Gain a sudden surge of inspiration increasing your Hit, all of your stats, ATK, MATK, and Max HP for 30 seconds.
  • Duration is increased by 30 seconds for every skill level.
  • While this skill is active, it will consume an amount of Max HP and Max SP every 5 seconds.
  • While under the Inspiration status, you will be immune to most negative status effects.
Level Base HIT Increase All Stats Base ATK/MATK Increase Max HP Increase HP Drain SP Drain Duration Cooldown
1 12 6 40 4% 3.0% 4.0% 60s 9m
2 24 12 80 8% 2.5% 3.5% 90s 8m
3 36 18 120 12% 2.0% 3.0% 120s 7m
4 48 24 160 16% 1.5% 2.5% 150s 6m
4 60 30 200 20% 1.0% 2.0% 180s 5m

  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s

  • Requires standing on a water cell
  • Consumes: 1  Empty Bottle
 The caster must be standing on a walkable body of water (e.g. ponds, lake shore, beach, Deluge, Watery Evasion) to use this skill.


  • Creates 1  Holy Water
Blessing Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 24 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 Bless a single target increasing their STR, DEX, INT, and Hit.

This skill will remove Curse and Stone Curse statuses from the target.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 STR, +1 DEX, +1 INT, +2 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 STR, +2 DEX, +2 INT, +4 Hit, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 STR, +3 DEX, +3 INT, +6 Hit, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +4 STR, +4 DEX, +4 INT, +8 Hit, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 STR, +5 DEX, +5 INT, +10 Hit, Duration 140 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +6 STR, +6 DEX, +6 INT, +12 Hit, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +7 STR, +7 DEX, +7 INT, +14 Hit, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +8 STR, +8 DEX, +8 INT, +16 Hit, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +9 STR, +9 DEX, +9 INT, +18 Hit, Duration 220 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +10 STR, +10 DEX, +10 INT, +20 Hit, Duration 240 seconds.

Heal Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Restores HP to a single target.
  • The amount of HP restored is based on the skill level, Base Level, INT, and MATK of the caster.
  • If cast on an undead player or monster this will instead deal Holy element magic damage to the target. (Can be cast on monsters if "/noshift" is activated).
Holy Light Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Range: 9
 Deal 125% MATK Holy element magic damage on a single target,


  • This skill removes Kyrie Eleison from the target.
  • Deals 500% MATK, and increase SP cost by 500% when under the effect of Soul Linker skill.

Pneuma Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 9
 Create a 3x3 area on the ground that temporarily nullifies ranged physical damage.


  • Can not be cast overlapping a Safety Wall, or on top of Land Protector.
Ruwach Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Temporarily reveals hidden enemies within a 5x5 area centered on the caster.

Deals 100% MATK damage to hidden enemies revealed and cancels their hiding status.

Signum Crucis Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 35
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.35s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.15s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
 Decrease the Hard DEF of all Undead element and Demon race monsters on the screen by chance.


  • [Lv 1] : 27% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 14%.
  • [Lv 2] : 31% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 18%.
  • [Lv 3] : 35% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 22%.
  • [Lv 4] : 39% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 26%.
  • [Lv 5] : 43% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 30%.
  • [Lv 6] : 47% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 34%.
  • [Lv 7] : 51% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 38%.
  • [Lv 8] : 55% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 42%.
  • [Lv 9] : 59% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 46%.
  • [Lv10] : 63% Chance, Decrease Hard DEF by 50%.
Teleport Mobility
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 10
    • (Lv 2) : 9
 Allows you to teleport randomly, or to your save point.


  • [Lv 1] Teleports the caster to a random location in the same map.
  • [Lv 2] Teleports the caster to their save point.
  • Can not be cast if the caster is standing on top of Land Protector.
Warp Portal Mobility
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 38 - (3 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a portal on the ground that transports any player that steps into it to another map.


  • [Lv 1] Transports players to the caster's save point.
  • [Lv 2~4] Transports players to a specific Memo point.
  • You can use the /memo command to memorize a spot and add it to your Warp Portal destinations. Some maps and dungeons can not be added as Warp Portal destination.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 9
 This ground targeting skill applies Holy element endow on the armor of players within a 3x3 area.

Increase SP Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Naturally restore SP every 10 seconds. Also increase the amount of SP healed from consumables.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore (3 SP + 0.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 2% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore (6 SP + 0.4%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 4% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore (9 SP + 0.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 6% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore (12 SP + 0.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 8% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore (15 SP + 1.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 10% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore (18 SP + 1.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 12% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore (21 SP + 1.4%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 14% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 8] : Restore (24 SP + 1.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 16% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 9] : Restore (27 SP + 1.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 18% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv10] : Restore (30 SP + 2.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 20% more SP from consumables.
Kyrie Eleison Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 20
    • (Lv 4~6) : 25
    • (Lv 7~9) : 30
    • (Lv 10) : 35
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
 Apply a barrier to a target that blocks melee and ranged physical attacks.


  • The barrier's durability is based on the Max HP of the target.
  • Kyrie Eleison is immediately removed if Holy Light hits the target.


  • [Lv 1] : Barrier is equal to 12% of targets Max HP, Blocks 5 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Barrier is equal to 14% of targets Max HP, Blocks 6 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Barrier is equal to 16% of targets Max HP, Blocks 6 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Barrier is equal to 18% of targets Max HP, Blocks 7 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Barrier is equal to 20% of targets Max HP, Blocks 7 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Barrier is equal to 22% of targets Max HP, Blocks 8 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Barrier is equal to 24% of targets Max HP, Blocks 8 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : Barrier is equal to 26% of targets Max HP, Blocks 9 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : Barrier is equal to 28% of targets Max HP, Blocks 9 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : Barrier is equal to 30% of targets Max HP, Blocks 10 attacks, Duration 120 seconds.
Lex Aeterna Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 9
 A single target will receive double damage from the next incoming attack.


  • Skills that inflict hits in a damage bundle (The final damage is shown in large yellow numbers) will have its entire damage doubled.
  • For skills that inflict multiple hits (The damage is shown in white numbers), only the first hit will deal double damage.
  • Can not be applied on Frozen or Stone Cursed targets.
Lex Divina Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 20
    • (Lv 6~10) : 30 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 5
 Inflicts the Silence status on a single target.
  • Targets with low INT are more likely to be Silenced, and take longer to recover from Silence.
  • Targets with High will recover in a time shorter than the duration stated.
  • Casting this on a silenced target will remove the Silence status.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 50 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : Duration 60 seconds.
