Magnus Exorcismus Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 38 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 6.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a cross shaped 7x7 area on the ground that inflicts Holy property magic damage to all enemies inside every 3 seconds.


  • This skill deals additional damage to Demon and Undead races, and Shadow and Undead element enemies.
  • Magnus Exorcismus will stop dealing damage if the caster is Stunned, Frozen, or Stone Cursed.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% MATK, 1 Hit every 3 seconds, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 100% MATK, 2 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 100% MATK, 3 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 100% MATK, 4 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% MATK, 5 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 100% MATK, 6 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 100% MATK, 7 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 100% MATK, 8 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 100% MATK, 9 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 100% MATK, 10 Hits every 3 seconds, Duration 14 seconds.
Redemptio Recovery
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 800
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.2s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.8s
 Resurrects all party members around the caster and restores 50% of their Max HP.


  • Reduces your HP and SP to 1 when cast.
  • The Variable Cast Time from this skill can only be reduced by equipment, gear, and skill effects and it is not affected by DEX or INT stats.
Resurrection Recovery
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 60
  • Var. Cast Time: 6.4 - (1.6 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.6 - (0.4 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: (Skill Level - 1)
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Resurrects a dead player, restoring a portion of their Max HP.


  • When cast on Undead element enemies, Resurrection has a chance to instantly kill them. (This does not work on Boss monsters).


  • [Lv 1] : Restore 20% of Max HP.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore 40% of Max HP.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore 60% of Max HP.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore 80% of Max HP.
Safety Wall Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 30
    • (Lv 3~6) : 35
    • (Lv 7~10) : 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.4 - (4 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1) : 0.8
    • (Lv 2) : 0.72
    • (Lv 3) : 0.64
    • (Lv 4) : 0.56
    • (Lv 5) : 0.48
    • (Lv 6) : 0.40
    • (Lv 7) : 0.32
    • (Lv 8) : 0.24
    • (Lv 9) : 0.16
    • (Lv 10) : 0.08
  • Cast Delay: Roughly 0.3s at every level
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a barrier on the ground that blocks all melee physical attacks.

The barrier will break after so many hits or if it recieves a hit the exceed its durability.


  • Can not be cast next to Pneuma.


  • [Lv 1] : 300 Base durability, Blocks 2 hits, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 600 Base durability, Blocks 3 hits, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 900 Base durability, Blocks 4 hits, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200 Base durability, Blocks 5 hits, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500 Base durability, Blocks 6 hits, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 1800 Base durability, Blocks 7 hits, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 2100 Base durability, Blocks 8 hits, Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 2400 Base durability, Blocks 9 hits, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 2700 Base durability, Blocks 10 hits, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 3000 Base durability, Blocks 11 hits, Duration 50 seconds.


Durability is based on the following formula;
Durability (HP) = Base_Durability + 7000 × (1 + 0.1 × Job_Level ÷ 50) + 65 × INT + Max_SP

Sanctuary Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 12 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a cross shaped 5x5 area on the ground the restores HP to everyone inside each second.

Deals Holy element magic damage to any Undead element and Demon race targets the area, it will also knock them back 2 cells.


  • Unlike most healing skills, Sanctuary can heal Mechanics inside Madogear and Homunculus.


  • [Lv 1] : Can heal up to 4 characters at a time, Heals 100 HP, Deals 50 damage, Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Can heal up to 5 characters at a time, Heals 200 HP, Deals 100 damage, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Can heal up to 6 characters at a time, Heals 300 HP, Deals 150 damage, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Can heal up to 7 characters at a time, Heals 400 HP, Deals 200 damage, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Can heal up to 8 characters at a time, Heals 500 HP, Deals 250 damage, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Can heal up to 9 characters at a time, Heals 600 HP, Deals 300 damage, Duration 19 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Can heal up to 10 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 22 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : Can heal up to 11 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : Can heal up to 12 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 28 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : Can heal up to 13 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 31 seconds.
Slow Poison Recovery
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 4 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 If used on a target under the Poison status effect, temporarily stops the HP drain effect.


  • Can not be cast on yourself.


  • [Lv 1] : Stops the drain for 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Stops the drain for 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Stops the drain for 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Stops the drain for 40 seconds.
Status Recovery Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
 Removes Frozen, Stone Curse, Stun, White Imprison, Stasis, and Poem of the Netherworld status's from a target.


  • If used on Undead element monster, has a chance to inflict the Blind status.
  • If used on a passive monster that's attacking a player, it will return to its passive state.
Suffragium Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 8
  • Var. Cast Time: 1s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1 s
  • Cool Down: 30 s
 Decrease your parties Variable Cast Time for a short time.

Only affects status variable cast time and doesn't stack with anything.


  • [Lv 1] : -10% Variable Cast Time, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : -15% Variable Cast Time, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : -20% Variable Cast Time, Duration 60 seconds.
Turn Undead Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 5
 Deals Holy element magic damage to a single target.

If used on an Undead element monster, has a chance to instantly kill it. (Does not work on Boss monsters).


  • The instant kill chance is increase based on the caster Base Level, INT, LUK, and the targets current/Max HP.


The instant-kill chance is capped at 70%.
Instant Kill Chance = [(Base Chance + {BaseLevel / 10} + {INT / 10} + {LUK / 10} + {Target_HP / Target_MaxHP}) x 20]%


  • [Lv 1] : 30% MATK, +2% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 30% MATK, +4% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 30% MATK, +6% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 30% MATK, +8% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 30% MATK, +10% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 6] : 30% MATK, +12% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 7] : 30% MATK, +14% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 8] : 30% MATK, +16% Base Chance.
  • [Lv 9] : 30% MATK, +18% Base Chance.
  • [Lv10] : 30% MATK, +20% Base Chance.


High Priest

Skill Type Properties Description
Assumptio Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.4 + (0.4 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.1 + (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Increase a single targets Hard DEF and healing received for a short time.


  • Assumptio can not be cast if the caster is inside a Guild Castle/WoE map.
  • It does not reduce incoming damage from skills that inflict fixed damage, DEF piercing damage, and MDEF piercing damage.
  • Lower level Assumptio can not refresh the duration of higher level Assumptio.


  • [Lv 1] : +50 Hard DEF, +2% Healing received, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +100 Hard DEF, +4% Healing received, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +150 Hard DEF, +6% Healing received, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +200 Hard DEF, +8% Healing received, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +250 Hard DEF, +10% Healing received, Duration 100 seconds.
Basilica Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 1.0s
 Increase the your Holy property physical and magical damage on Shadow and Undead property enemies.


  • Note that this damage only applies to these specified properties of enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : +5% Physical Holy damage, +3% Magical Holy damage, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% Physical Holy damage, +6% Magical Holy damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +15% Physical Holy damage, +9% Magical Holy damage, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +20% Physical Holy damage, +12% Magical Holy damage, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +25% Physical Holy damage, +15% Magical Holy damage, Duration 180 seconds.
Meditation Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Permanently increase your Max SP, natural SP regeneration, and the Healing amount for some skills.


  • The skills that receive a healing increase is Heal, Coluceo Heal, Highness Heal.


Skill Healing only applies to the specified skills.

  • [Lv 1] : +1% Max SP, +3% Natural SP regeneration, +2% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 2] : +2% Max SP, +6% Natural SP regeneration, +4% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 3] : +3% Max SP, +9% Natural SP regeneration, +6% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 4] : +4% Max SP, +12% Natural SP regeneration, +8% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 5] : +5% Max SP, +15% Natural SP regeneration, +10% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 6] : +6% Max SP, +18% Natural SP regeneration, +12% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 7] : +7% Max SP, +21% Natural SP regeneration, +14% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 8] : +8% Max SP, +24% Natural SP regeneration, +16% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv 9] : +9% Max SP, +27% Natural SP regeneration, +18% Skill Healing.
  • [Lv10] : +10% Max SP, +30% Natural SP regeneration, +20% Skill Healing.
Mana Recharge Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Permanently reduces the SP cost of your skills.


  • [Lv 1] : -4% SP Cost.
  • [Lv 2] : -8% SP Cost.
  • [Lv 3] : -12% SP Cost.
  • [Lv 4] : -16% SP Cost.
  • [Lv 5] : -20% SP Cost.


Arch Bishop

Skill Type Properties Description
Adoramus Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 16 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 2.5s
  • Range: 11
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~6) : 7x7
    • (Lv 7~10) : 11x11
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Deal Holy element magic damage to a target and all enemies around it.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.
  • Under the effect of  Ancilla, damage becomes Neutral.
  • The chance of inflicting Decrease Agility and Blind status is increased depending on the casters Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 550% MATK, 4% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% MATK, 8% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 3] : 1050% MATK, 12% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 4] : 1300% MATK, 16% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 5] : 1550% MATK, 20% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 6] : 1800% MATK, 24% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 7] : 2050% MATK, 28% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 8] : 2300% MATK, 32% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv 9] : 2550% MATK, 36% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
  • [Lv10] : 2800% MATK, 40% Chance to inflict Decrease Agility / Blind status.
Ancilla Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • SP % Cost: 10% of max
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Creates a single  Ancilla.

You can carry up to 3  Ancilla in your inventory at a time, and it is character bound.


Ancilla can be consumed to increase Healing effectiveness by 15%, and SP recovery by 30% for 60 seconds.

Canto Candidus Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 180 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
 Bestows the effects of Increase Agility on the caster and party members in a large area centered on the caster.

Targets will receive the Increase Agility bonus as well as extra AGI based on the casters Job Level.


  • The casters Job Level increases the AGI bonus given. (AGI bonus = Job Level / 10).
  • Canto Candidus uses the highest level of Increase Agility the caster has learned.
  • Does not affect Mechanics inside Madogear.


  • [Lv 1] : 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 15x15 Area of effect, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 31x31 Area of effect, Duration 240 seconds.
Clearance Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 48 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 11
 Has a chance to remove (nearly) all buffs and debuffs from a target.


This includes special statuses as well, such as Steel Body, Berserk, and Howling of Mandragora.


  • Does not work against Boss monsters and can not be used on players outside of your party.


  • [Lv 1] : 68% Chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 76% Chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 84% Chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 92% Chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% Chance.
Clementia Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 180 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
 Bestows the effects of Blessing on the caster and party members in a large area centered on the caster.

Targets will receive the Blessing bonus as well as extra STR, INT, and DEX based on the casters Job Level.


  • The casters Job Level increases the STR, INT, and DEX bonus given. (Stat bonus = Job Level / 10).
  • Clementia uses the highest level of Blessing the caster has learned.


  • [Lv 1] : 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 15x15 Area of effect, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 31x31 Area of effect, Duration 240 seconds.
Coluceo Heal Recovery
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 180 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5 - (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
 Restores HP to the caster and party members in a large area centered around the caster.

Restores more HP if there are more members in the party.


  • Coluceo Heal uses the highest level of Heal the caster has learned.


  • [Lv 1] : 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 15x15 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 31x31 Area of effect.


Bonus HP = [(HP Restored ÷ 100) × (Party_Members × 5) ÷ 2]

Convenio Mobility
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70
 Summons all party members in the same map to the casters location.


  • Convenio can only be used by the party leader.
  • Does not work in WoE/BG/PVP and maps that prevent teleportation, or on ground skills that prevent it such as Land Protector or Safety Wall.
Duple Light Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Summons a pair of glowing light sphere that have a chance to inflict additional damage when the caster uses melee physical attacks.


  • One sphere deals Ranged physical damage, and takes the property of the weapon.
  • The other sphere deals neutral element magic damage.


ATK% = Physical Sphere
MATK% = Magical Sphere

  • [Lv 1] : 165% ATK, 440% MATK, 12% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 180% ATK, 480% MATK, 14% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 195% ATK, 520% MATK, 16% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 210% ATK, 560% MATK, 18% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 225% ATK, 600% MATK, 20% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 240% ATK, 640% MATK, 22% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 255% ATK, 680% MATK, 24% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 270% ATK, 720% MATK, 26% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 285% ATK, 760% MATK, 28% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 300% ATK, 800% MATK, 30% Chance to deal damage, Duration 90 seconds.
Epiclesis Recovery
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 300
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5 + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Range: 11
  • Consumes: 1  Ancilla
  • Consumes: 1  Holy Water
 Creates a 5x5 area on the ground that resurrects dead players, and increases Max HP.

It also recovers HP, SP, and reveals hidden targets every 5 seconds.


  • This skill can heal players under the Berserk status.


  • [Lv 1] : +5% Max HP, Recover 3% HP, Recover 2% SP, Duration 18 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% Max HP, Recover 3% HP, Recover 2% SP, Duration 21 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +15% Max HP, Recover 4% HP, Recover 3% SP, Duration 24 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +20% Max HP, Recover 4% HP, Recover 3% SP, Duration 27 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +25% Max HP, Recover 5% HP, Recover 4% SP, Duration 30 seconds.
Expiatio Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 11
 Allows a targets physical and magical attacks to pierce enemies DEF and MDEF.


  • [Lv 1] : Pierce 5% DEF / MDEF, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Pierce 10% DEF / MDEF, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Pierce 15% DEF / MDEF, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Pierce 20% DEF / MDEF, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Pierce 25% DEF / MDEF, Duration 150 seconds.
Highness Heal Recovery
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 40 + (30 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 11
 Restores a large amount of HP to a single target.


  • This skills Healing is based on Heal's Skill Level.
  • This skills Healing is increased based on the casters INT, Base Level, and Healing Modifiers.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% Healing effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 230% Healing effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 260% Healing effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 290% Healing effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 320% Healing effect.


HP Restored = Healing Effect × {[(INT + BaseLevel) ÷ 8] × [(Heal_Level × 8) + 4] × [Healing Modifier]}

  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)

  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s

Offertorium Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: (30 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 6 - (1 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Increase the effectiveness of Heal, Sanctuary, Coluceo Heal, and Highness Heal for a short time.

During this time increase SP cost of all skills by a large amount.


  • This status is cancelled if it is casted again, or if the caster receives Magnificat.
  • This skill removes various debuffs from the caster when it is cast. (Bleeding, Blind, Burning, Chaos, Curse, Freezing, Hallucination, Poison, Guillotine Cross Poisons, Mandragora Howling).


  • [Lv 1] : +30% Heal Effectiveness, +120% SP Cost of skills, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +60% Heal Effectiveness, +140% SP Cost of skills, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +90% Heal Effectiveness, +160% SP Cost of skills, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +120% Heal Effectiveness, +180% SP Cost of skills, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +150% Heal Effectiveness, +200% SP Cost of skills, Duration 90 seconds.
Oratio Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 32 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
 Has a chance to temporarily reduce the Holy property resistance of all enemies in a 31x31 area centered around the caster.


  • Oratio affects Boss monsters and hidden enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 45% Chance, -2% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% Chance, -4% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 55% Chance, -6% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 60% Chance, -8% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 65% Chance, -10% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 70% Chance, -12% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 75% Chance, -14% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 80% Chance, -16% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 85% Chance, -18% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 90% Chance, -20% Holy resistance, Duration 30 seconds.
Praefatio Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10 + (3 x Skill Level)
 Applies a barrier that blocks melee and ranged physical damage on the caster and all party members.

The barrier will block a certain number of hits, and its durability is equal to a portion of Max HP of the target.


  • The barriers durability is increased depending on the amount of party members there are.
  • The highest level Praefatio will overwrite the duration of lower level Praefatio, and lower level Praefatio cannot refresh the duration of higher level Praefatio.
  • Praefatio and Kyrie Eleison interact in this way as well. Using Praefatio and Kyrie Eleison at the same level will refresh the barrier's duration.
Renovatio Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Range: 11
 Recovers 5% Max HP of the caster and party members every 5 seconds for 90 seconds.
Sacrament Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 80 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
 Reduces a single targets Fixed Casting Time.


  • Lower level Sacrament can not refresh the duration of higher level Sacrament.


  • [Lv 1] : -10% Fixed Casting Time, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : -20% Fixed Casting Time, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : -30% Fixed Casting Time, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : -40% Fixed Casting Time, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : -50% Fixed Casting Time, Duration 180 seconds.
Silentium Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 60 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
  • Area of Affect:
    • (Lv 1) : 9x9
    • (Lv 2) : 11x11
    • (Lv 3) : 13x13
    • (Lv 4) : 15x15
    • (Lv 5) : 17x17
 Applies a Lex Divina effect on all enemies in a large area centered around the caster.

This will remove the silence status from targets that have it withing the area.


  • The chance of inflicting Silence is affected by the enemy's Base Level, VIT, and LUK.
Vituperatum Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 148 - (14 x Skill Level)
  • Cooldown: 5s
  • Range: 11
  • Area of Affect:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 3x3
    • (Lv 4~5) : 5x5
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Applies a Lex Aeterna effect on a target and all targets around it.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 8
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Allows you to summon Spirit Spheres, each Sphere summoned gives +3 ATK.


  • Spirit Spheres last for 10 minutes.
  • Spirit Sphere are commonly used as requirements to cast other skills.


  • [Lv 1] : 1 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 2] : 2 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 3] : 3 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 4] : 4 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 5] : 5 Spirit Sphere maximum.

  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Absorb all the Spirit Spheres from a target, regaining 7 SP for each sphere absorbed.


  • When used on a monsters, this instead has a 20% chance to regain 2 x Monster Level SP.

  • [Lv 2] : +3 Flee.

  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 2
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Deal damage to a single target with increasing damage depending on how high the targets DEF is.


  • This skills damage is increased by 50% if the target is under the Blade Stop status.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK.
Triple Attack Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Enables a 30% chance to do a triple attack while auto attacking a target.

Triple attacks will do more damage than regular attacks.


  • After a successful triple attack, there will be a 0.3 second window to start using combo skills.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 160% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 240% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 300% ATK.
Finger Offensive Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Walk Delay: 0.2 x (Skill Level - 1)
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Throw your current Spirit Spheres at a target, each dealing their own damage.


  • This skills damage is increased by 50% if the target is under the Blade Stop status.


  • [Lv 1] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1400% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1600% ATK.
Blade Stop Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
 Allows you to "catch" and enemy during their attack animation. This will stop you and the target from doing anything for 10 seconds. If you or the target is killed in this time, the other will be freed.


Depending on the skill level used, it will enable another skill for you to use while in this status;

  • Level 1 : No skill
  • Level 2 : Finger Offensive
  • Level 3 : Investigate
  • Level 4 : Chain Combo
  • Level 5 : Asura Strike


  • This skill will only stop Boss monsters for 2 seconds.
Critical Explosion Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Sphere Cost: 5
 Consume 5 Spirit Spheres to activate the Fury status.

Fury status increases your Critical Rate and reduces you natural SP recovery.


  • [Lv 1] : +10 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +12.5 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +15 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +17.5 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
Spirit Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increase your HP and SP recovery while sitting.

This restores HP/SP every 10 seconds, or every 20 seconds if your weight is above 70%.


  • The HP/SP restored is in 2 parts, a flat bonus, and a percentage based bonus.


  • [Lv 1] : (4 + 0.2%) HP Restored, (2 + 0.2%) SP Restored.
  • [Lv 2] : (8 + 0.4%) HP Restored, (4 + 0.4%) SP Restored.
  • [Lv 3] : (12 + 0.6%) HP Restored, (6 + 0.6%) SP Restored.
  • [Lv 4] : (16 + 0.8%) HP Restored, (8 + 0.8%) SP Restored.
  • [Lv 5] : (20 + 1.0%) HP Restored, (10 + 1.0%) SP Restored.
Asura Strike Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 1
  • Sphere Cost: 5
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.25 - (0.25 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.25 - (0.25 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 3.5 - (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
  • Required status : Fury
 Consumes all of your remaining SP and Spirit Spheres to strike a target with a DEF piercing attack.

After casting this skill, Fury status is removed and SP will not be naturally recovered for 10 seconds.


  • This skills damage is forced to the neutral element.


There are four ways this skill can be used, in all of them Fury status is required:

  • 5 Spirit Spheres: can be used in the same manner as single-target skills; by selecting Asura Strike through a hotkey and clicking on a target.
  • 4 Spirit Spheres: can be used during the delay of Chain Combo. This will bypass the Cast Time.
  • 4 Spirit Spheres: can be used on the target while it has been Rooted with Level 5 Stop Blade.
  • 1 Spirit Sphere: can be used during the delay of Combo Finish. This will bypass the Cast Time.


Base Damage + Bonus Damage
{ATK × (8 + SP ÷ 10)} + {250 + (150 x Skill Level)}

Chain Combo Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 4 + (1 x Skill Level)
 Hit the current target with 4 melee attacks the deal increased damage.

If you are equipped with a Knuckle weapon, you will hit the target for 6 melee attacks instead.


  • This skill can only be used after Triple Attack triggers.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 350% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 450% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK.
Combo Finish Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (1 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 5x5
 Deal a combo strike to a target dealing a large amount of damage.


  • This skill can only be used after Chain Combo.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 750% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1050% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1200% ATK.
Steel Body Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 200
  • Sphere Cost: 5
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.5s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Use the strength of your mind to reduce all incoming damage by 90%.


  • You can not use skills while this skill is active. Your movement and ASPD will be reduced by 25% as well.
  • DEF and MDEF will reduce damage after the 90% reduction is applied.
  • Piercing effects are still reduced by the 90% reduction.
Body Relocation Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 14
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Range: 18
 Instantly move up to 18 cells away.


  • This skill costs 0 Spirit Spheres while in the Fury status.
  • You can use this skill even if you are stuck in a trap or another movement disabling skill.
  • Asura Strike can not be cast for 2 seconds after casting this skill.

  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted

Ki Explosion Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40
  • HP Cost: 200
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 1
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1) : 3x3
 Strike a target with a focused attack for 800% ATK. There is a 70% chance to stun enemies within the targets area for 2 seconds.

All enemies within the area will be knocked back 5 cells, except for the target.

Dragon Combo Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: (2 + Skill Level)
  • Range: 2

Attack an enemy for melee physical damage, with a chance to stun the target.

  • [Lv 1] : 180% ATK, 2% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 2] : 260% ATK, 3% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 3] : 340% ATK, 4% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 4] : 420% ATK, 5% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, 6% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 6] : 580% ATK, 7% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 7] : 660% ATK, 8% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 8] : 740% ATK, 9% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 9] : 820% ATK, 10% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv10] : 900% ATK, 11% Chance to Stun.


Damage is calculated using the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [(Base_Damage) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

  • Cast Delay: 0.5s

  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK.

  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [(Base_Damage + AGI) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s

Gentle Touch - Silence Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 0.5 + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Inflict a melee physical attack on a single target with the chance to leave them silenced.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and DEX.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, 5% Base silence chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, 10% Base silence chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, 15% Base silence chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, 20% Base silence chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, 25% Base silence chance.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [(Base_Damage + DEX) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%


Chance of silence effect is based on this formula;
Chance of Effect = [Base_Chance_of_Effect + (BaseLevel + DEX) ÷ 10]%

Gentle Touch - Cure Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 0.5 + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Restores some HP to a target and has a chance to remove some negative status effects.


  • [Lv 1] : (120 + 1%) HP restored, 5% Chance to recover from statuses.
  • [Lv 2] : (240 + 2%) HP restored, 10% Chance to recover from statuses.
  • [Lv 3] : (360 + 3%) HP restored, 15% Chance to recover from statuses.
  • [Lv 4] : (480 + 4%) HP restored, 20% Chance to recover from statuses.
  • [Lv 5] : (600 + 5%) HP restored, 25% Chance to recover from statuses.


Status effect removes success rate is based on the following formula;
Success Rate = [{BaseSuccessRate + (DEX + BaseLevel) ÷ 4} − Random(1, 10)]%


List of removeable status effects:

  • Blind
  • Frozen
  • Hallucination
  • Poison
  • Silence
  • Stone
  • Stun
Tiger Cannon Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost: 2
  • Var. Cast Time: 1 + (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 1
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 5x5
    • (Lv 6~10) : 7x7
  • Required status: Fury status
 Attack all enemies in an area around the sura.

The damage from this skill is based on a percentage of your Max HP and Max SP.


  • This skills damage is increased if used in a combo after Fallen Empire.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters, and the targets Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 12% Max HP, 6% Max SP, 240 Bonus damage, 500 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 2] : 14% Max HP, 7% Max SP, 480 Bonus damage, 1000 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 3] : 16% Max HP, 8% Max SP, 720 Bonus damage, 1500 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 4] : 18% Max HP, 9% Max SP, 960 Bonus damage, 2000 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 5] : 20% Max HP, 10% Max SP, 1200 Bonus damage, 2500 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 6] : 22% Max HP, 11% Max SP, 1440 Bonus damage, 3000 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 7] : 24% Max HP, 12% Max SP, 1680 Bonus damage, 3500 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 8] : 26% Max HP, 13% Max SP, 1920 Bonus damage, 4000 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 9] : 28% Max HP, 14% Max SP, 2160 Bonus damage, 4500 Bonus damage (If used in combo).
  • [Lv10] : 30% Max HP, 15% Max SP, 2400 Bonus damage, 5000 Bonus damage (If used in combo).


Base Damage is determined with the following formula;
Normal = (HPamount_Result + SPamount_Result) ÷ 4
Combo = (HPamount_Result + SPamount_Result) ÷ 2


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]% + Bonus_Damage + Target_BaseLevel × 40

Crescent Elbow Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80
  • Sphere Cost: 2
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
 Prepare yourself for an enemies attack.

The next time an enemy attacks you with a melee attack, reflect the damage back to them while you only take a portion of it.


  • This skills damage increases based on the attackers Max HP.
  • The caster will take 10% of the original damage.
  • Damage (ATK) of this skill is capped at 5000%.


  • [Lv 1] : 55% Chance to reflect, 1.2 "Damage Taken Mod", Duration 3 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to reflect, 1.4 "Damage Taken Mod", Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 65% Chance to reflect, 1.6 "Damage Taken Mod", Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 70% Chance to reflect, 1.8 "Damage Taken Mod", Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 75% Chance to reflect, 2.0 "Damage Taken Mod", Duration 7 seconds.


Success chance is based on this formula;
Success Rate = [Base_Success_Rate + (JobLevel ÷ 2)]%


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [{(Target_HP ÷ 100) × SkillLevel} × (BaseLevel ÷ 125)]% + (Damage_Taken × Damage_Taken_Mod)

Cursed Circle Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • HP % Cost: (1 x Skill Level)% of max HP
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 3x3
    • (Lv 3~4) : 5x5
    • (Lv 5) : 7x7
 Silence and immobilize all enemies within an area around the caster, including the caster itself. This skill ends after its duration ends or the user casts a different skill.

Consumes 1 spirit sphere for every target affected. Any target that can not be paid for will be unaffected by the skill.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 3 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 7 seconds.
Gentle Touch - Energy Gain Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • HP % Cost: (1 x Skill Level)% of max HP
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5 + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Places a buff on yourself allowing you to gain a Spirit Sphere when attacking or receiving damage at chance.


  • Increases Combo Finish, Chain Crush Combo, and Tiger Palm damage by 50% while under this skills buff.


  • [Lv 1] : 15% Chance to obtain a Spirit Sphere.
  • [Lv 2] : 20% Chance to obtain a Spirit Sphere.
  • [Lv 3] : 25% Chance to obtain a Spirit Sphere.
  • [Lv 4] : 30% Chance to obtain a Spirit Sphere.
  • [Lv 5] : 35% Chance to obtain a Spirit Sphere.
Gentle Touch - Change Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • HP % Cost: (1 x Skill Level)% of max HP
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 220 - (20 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Using your knowledge of pressure points, buff yourself increasing your ATK and ATK%.


  • Increases Rampage Blaster, and Knuckle Arrow damage by 30% while under this skills buff.
  • This skill can not be used at the same time as Gentle Touch - Revitalize.


  • [Lv 1] : +8 ATK, +1% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +16 ATK, +2% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +24 ATK, +3% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +32 ATK, +4% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +40 ATK, +5% ATK.
Howling of Lion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost: (1 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 5x5
    • (Lv 3~4) : 7x7
    • (Lv 5): 9x9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Let out the howl of a lion damaging all enemies in a large area around you.


  • Targets damaged by this skill will lose all Minstrel and Wanderer song buffs on them.
  • This skill damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 500% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1500% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 2000% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% ATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Earth Shaker Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 32 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost: 1
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1) : 3x3
    • (Lv 2) : 5x5
    • (Lv 3) : 7x7
    • (Lv 4) : 9x9
    • (Lv 5) : 11x11
 Stomp the ground violently shaking the area around and dealing damage to all nearby enemies. Concealed enemies will take additional damage.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and STR.
  • Concealed enemies will take additional damage, but it is not revealed how much this additional damage is.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500% ATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100) + (STR × 2)]%

Windmill Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 45
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
 Swing your feet in a 5x5 area around you forcing all enemy players to use /sit. On monsters this will stun them for 1 ~ 4 seconds randomly instead.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and DEX.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [(BaseLevel + DEX) × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Gentle Touch - Revitalize Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost: (1 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 220 - (20 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Using your pressure point knowledge, you can increase your Max HP, DEF, and HP Recovery for 240 seconds.


  • Increases Tiger Cannon and Gate of Hell damage by 30% while under this skills buff.
  • This skill can not be used at the same time as Gentle Touch - Energy Gain.


  • [Lv 1] : +2% Max HP, +20 DEF, +80% HP Recovery.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% Max HP, +40 DEF, +110% HP Recovery.
  • [Lv 3] : +6% Max HP, +60 DEF, +140% HP Recovery.
  • [Lv 4] : +8% Max HP, +80 DEF, +170% HP Recovery.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% Max HP, +100 DEF, +200% HP Recovery.
Flash Combo Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 65
  • Sphere Cost: 5:5:4:4:3
    • (Lv 1~2) : 5
    • (Lv 3~4) : 4
    • (Lv 5) : 3
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 14 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 1
 Casts multiple combo skills in rapid succession with bonus ATK.


These are the skills cast, in this order;

  • Dragon Combo.
  • Fallen Empire.
  • Tiger Cannon.


  • This skill uses the highest level of each learned skill when cast.
  • This skill adds WeaponATK for the duration of the skills being cast.


  • [Lv 1] : +40 ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +60 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +80 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +100 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +120 ATK.
Rampage Blaster Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Sphere Cost: 3
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Required status: Fury status
 Deal long ranged physical damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area around you.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.
  • If this skill is used after Earth Shaker, it deals increased damage.


  • [Lv 1] : 350% ATK, 550% ATK (If used after Earth Shaker).
  • [Lv 2] : 700% ATK, 1100% ATK (If used after Earth Shaker).
  • [Lv 3] : 1050% ATK, 1650% ATK (If used after Earth Shaker).
  • [Lv 4] : 1400% ATK, 2200% ATK (If used after Earth Shaker).
  • [Lv 5] : 1750% ATK, 2750% ATK (If used after Earth Shaker).
Lightning Walk Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 90 - (10 x Skill Level)
  • HP % Cost: 6 - (1 x Skill Level) of max HP
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
 Prepare yourself to dodge an enemies long ranged attack. When attacked by a ranged attack, dodge and instantly move in front of the attacker.


  • The chance to dodge the attack is increased based on the casters Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 45% Base dodge chance, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% Base dodge chance, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 55% Base dodge chance, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 60% Base dodge chance, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 65% Base dodge chance, Duration 9 seconds.


Dodge Chance is calculated using this formula;
Dodge Chance = [BaseDodgeChance + (JobLevel ÷ 2)]%

Knuckle Arrow Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 5 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere Cost:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 1
    • (Lv 6~10) : 0
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 6 + (1 x Skill Level)
 Leap towards a target and strike it with long ranged physical damage, knocking back the target in the process. If the target is knocked into a wall or obstacle, they will take additional damage.


  • This skill deals increased damage to Boss monsters, since they can not be knocked back.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% ATK, +750% ATK (If knocked into wall), 700% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 2] : 700% ATK, +300% ATK (If knocked into wall), 900% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 3] : 800% ATK, +450% ATK (If knocked into wall), 1100% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 4] : 900% ATK, +600% ATK (If knocked into wall), 1300% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK, +750% ATK (If knocked into wall), 1500% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 6] : 1100% ATK, +900% ATK (If knocked into wall), 1700% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 7] : 1200% ATK, +1050% ATK (If knocked into wall), 1900% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 8] : 1300% ATK, +1200% ATK (If knocked into wall), 2100% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv 9] : 1400% ATK, +1350% ATK (If knocked into wall), 2300% ATK (Against Boss monster).
  • [Lv10] : 1500% ATK, +1500% ATK (If knocked into wall), 2500% ATK (Against Boss monster).


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Knockback damage is based on this formula;
Added Damage (ATK) = [Knockback_Damage + (1000 × Target_CurrWeight ÷ Target_WeightLimit) + (Target_BaseLevel × 5) × (BaseLevel ÷ 150)]%

Rising Dragon Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 120
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 30.0s
 Increases the maximum amount of Spirit Spheres you can hold, and increase your Max HP and Max SP.


  • This skill will enter you into the Fury status for the duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 6 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +1% Max HP, +1% Max SP, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 7 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +2% Max HP, +2% Max SP, Duration 140 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 8 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +3% Max HP, +3% Max SP, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 9 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +4% Max HP, +4% Max SP, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 10 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +5% Max HP, +5% Max SP, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 11 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +6% Max HP, +6% Max SP, Duration 220 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 12 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +7% Max HP, +7% Max SP, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 13 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +8% Max HP, +8% Max SP, Duration 260 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 14 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +9% Max HP, +9% Max SP, Duration 280 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 15 Maximum Spirit Spheres, +10% Max HP, +10% Max SP, Duration 300 seconds.
Gate of Hell Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Sphere Cost: 2
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8 + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Range:
    • (Lv 1) : 1
    • (Lv 2) : 2
    • (Lv 3~4) : 3
    • (Lv 5~6) : 4
    • (Lv 7~8) : 5
    • (Lv 9) : 6
    • (Lv 10) : 7
 Inflict ranged physical damage to a target dealing massive damage.


  • This skills damage is increased if it is used in a combo.
  • This skill is always considered a long ranged attack on all skill levels.
  • This skills damage is forced to the Neutral property.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 500% ATK, 800% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 2] : 1000% ATK, 1600% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 3] : 1500% ATK, 2400% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 4] : 2000% ATK, 3200% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% ATK, 4000% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 6] : 3000% ATK, 4800% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 7] : 3500% ATK, 5600% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 8] : 4000% ATK, 6400% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv 9] : 4500% ATK, 7200% ATK (If used in combo).
  • [Lv10] : 5000% ATK, 8000% ATK (If used in combo).


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]% + Bonus_Damage



Bonus Damage

  • The bonus damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, Max HP and Current HP, and Max SP and Current SP.


  • [Lv 1] : x1.2 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 2] : x1.4 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 3] : x1.6 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 4] : x1.8 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 5] : x2.0 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 6] : x2.2 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 7] : x2.4 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 8] : x2.6 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv 9] : x2.8 SP Modifier.
  • [Lv10] : x3.0 SP Modifier.


Bonus damage is calculated base on the following formula;
Normal = (User_MaxHP − User_HP) + (User_SP × SP_Modifier) + (BaseLevel × 10)
Combo = (User_MaxHP − User_HP) + (User_MaxSP × SP_Modifier) + (BaseLevel × 40)

Stone Curse Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 26 - (Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Range: 2
  • Consumes: 1  Red Gemstone
 Attempt to apply the Stone Curse status affect to a target at chance.

Successfully Stone Curse'd targets will be unable to attack or cast skills for a few seconds, then become immobile and into Earth 1 element.

Re-casting this skill on a Stone Cursed target will remove the status from them.


  • When skill level is 6 or higher, it only consumes the  Red Gemstone on successful casts.


  • [Lv 1] : 24% Chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 28% Chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 32% Chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 36% Chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 40% Chance.
  • [Lv 6] : 44% Chance.
  • [Lv 7] : 48% Chance.
  • [Lv 8] : 52% Chance.
  • [Lv 9] : 56% Chance.
  • [Lv10] : 60% Chance.

Increase SP Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Naturally restore SP every 10 seconds. Also increase the amount of SP healed from consumables.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore (3 SP + 0.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 2% more SP from consumables.

  • [Lv 3] : Restore (9 SP + 0.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 6% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore (12 SP + 0.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 8% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore (15 SP + 1.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 10% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore (18 SP + 1.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 12% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore (21 SP + 1.4%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 14% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 8] : Restore (24 SP + 1.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 16% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 9] : Restore (27 SP + 1.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 18% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv10] : Restore (30 SP + 2.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 20% more SP from consumables.

  • SP Cost: 26 - (Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.64s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.16s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s

  • [Lv 2] : 120% MATK, 41% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.

  • [Lv 5] : 150% MATK, 50% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.

  • [Lv10] : 200% MATK, 65% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.

Safety Wall Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 30
    • (Lv 3~6) : 35
    • (Lv 7~10) : 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.4 - (4 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1) : 0.8
    • (Lv 2) : 0.72
    • (Lv 3) : 0.64
    • (Lv 4) : 0.56
    • (Lv 5) : 0.48
    • (Lv 6) : 0.40
    • (Lv 7) : 0.32
    • (Lv 8) : 0.24
    • (Lv 9) : 0.16
    • (Lv 10) : 0.08
  • Cast Delay: Roughly 0.3s at every level
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a barrier on the ground that blocks all melee physical attacks.

The barrier will break after so many hits or if it recieves a hit the exceed its durability.


  • Can not be cast next to Pneuma.


  • [Lv 1] : 300 Base durability, Blocks 2 hits, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 600 Base durability, Blocks 3 hits, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 900 Base durability, Blocks 4 hits, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200 Base durability, Blocks 5 hits, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500 Base durability, Blocks 6 hits, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 1800 Base durability, Blocks 7 hits, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 2100 Base durability, Blocks 8 hits, Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 2400 Base durability, Blocks 9 hits, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 2700 Base durability, Blocks 10 hits, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 3000 Base durability, Blocks 11 hits, Duration 50 seconds.


Durability is based on the following formula;
Durability (HP) = Base_Durability + 7000 × (1 + 0.1 × Job_Level ÷ 50) + 65 × INT + Max_SP

Fire Wall Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s ~ 0.64s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s ~ 0.06s
  • Range: 9
 Create a 1x3 wall of fire on the ground that deals Fire property magic damage to all enemies that walk into it.

Enemies damaged by the Fire Wall will be knocked back 2 cells.

After a cell in the wall deals damage a certain number of time, it will disappear.


  • Undead race and Boss monsters take all hits at once and are not affected by the knock back of this skill.
  • A maximum of 3 fire walls can be created at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 3 times, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 4 times, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 5 times, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 6 times, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 7 times, Duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 8 times, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 9 times, Duration 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 10 times, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 11 times, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 12 times, Duration 14 seconds.
Energy Coat Support
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 5.0s
 Use your SP as a shield to reduce damage from all incoming sources.

The closer your SP is to maximum, the higher the damage reduction, but more SP will be consumed every hit as well.


  • [Remaining SP 81~100%]: -30% Damage taken, 3% SP Consumed every time you take damage.
  • [Remaining SP 61~ 80%]: -24% Damage taken, 2.5% SP Consumed every time you take damage.
  • [Remaining SP 41~ 60%]: -18% Damage taken, 2% SP Consumed every time you take damage.
  • [Remaining SP 21~ 40%]: -12% Damage taken, 1.5% SP Consumed every time you take damage.
  • [Remaining SP 1 ~ 20%]: -6% Damage taken, 1% SP Consumed every time you take damage.

Fire Pillar Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 75
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.92s - (0.192 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.48s - (0.048 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Set a 3x3 trap on the ground that deals Fire property magic damage to any enemy that steps on it.


  • This skill seems to ignore MDEF (Unconfirmed).
  • You can not place a Fire Pillar within 3 cells of an ally or enemy.
  • You can have up to 5 Fire Pillars set at once.

Enemies in range are knocked back 2 cells, and take Fire property magic damage.

Water Ball Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 15
    • (Lv 3~4) : 20
    • (Lv 5) : 25
  • Var. Cast Time: 0 + (0.64 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0 + (0.16 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
  • Requires standing on a water cell
 Draw water from the ground to summon a Water Ball to throw at a target, using an area around you to strike an enemy many times for Water property magic damage.

The target will be hit 1 time for every Water cell used around you.


  • You can use a Sage's Deluge or a Ninja's Watery Evasion for this attack, but the ground effect on each cell is removed for each strike of Water Ball.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% MATK, Uses a 1x1 Area of water.
  • [Lv 2] : 160% MATK, Uses a 3x3 Area of water.
  • [Lv 3] : 190% MATK, Uses a 3x3 Area of water.
  • [Lv 4] : 220% MATK, Uses a 5x5 Area of water.
  • [Lv 5] : 250% MATK, Uses a 5x5 Area of water.
Ice Wall Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 9
 Create a wall of ice (1x5 area, centered on the targeted cell) which prevents anyone from walking through the area.


  • Ice Walls have 400 ~ 2200 HP, 0 DEF, 0 MDEF, and their HP decreases by 50 every second.
  • Ice Walls can be attacked by yourself, allies and enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 400 HP.
  • [Lv 2] : 600 HP.
  • [Lv 3] : 800 HP.

  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 9

Meteor Storm Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 20
    • (Lv 2) : 24
    • (Lv 3) : 30
    • (Lv 4) : 34
    • (Lv 5) : 40
    • (Lv 6) : 44
    • (Lv 7) : 50
    • (Lv 8) : 54
    • (Lv 9) : 60
    • (Lv 10) : 64
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 6.3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cooldown: 7s
  • Range: 9
 Drop down meteors in a 13x13 area of effect, dealing Fire property magic damage to all enemies that get hit.

Enemies hit have a chance to be stunned.


  • Meteors that drop down will hit all enemies within a 7x7 Area around the cell it lands.


  • [Lv 1] : 2 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 1 time, 3% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 2] : 3 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 1 time, 6% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 3] : 3 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 2 times, 9% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 4] : 4 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 2 times, 12% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 5] : 4 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 3 times, 15% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 6] : 5 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 3 times, 18% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 7] : 5 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 4 times, 21% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 8] : 6 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 4 times, 24% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 9] : 6 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 5 times, 27% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv10] : 7 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 5 times, 30% Chance to Stun.

Quagmire Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 0 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a 5x5 mud bog that cuts the Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX of enemies that enter it by half.

Also removes the effects of Increase Agility, Two-Handed Quicken, and Adrenaline Rush type skills.


  • You can have up to 3 Quagmires active at a time.
  • AGI and DEX will only drop by a maximum of 50 each.
  • In PvP enviroments, allies and the caster can be affected as well, and players will only receive a 25% penalty to Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX instead.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 25 seconds.
Sight Blaster Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.28s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.32s
 Call forth a protective fire ball that lasts for up to 15 minutes.

If an enemy walks within a 3x3 area of the caster, it deals 600% Fire property magic damage, and knocks them back 3 cells.


  • The knockback effect is disabled in BG/WoE.


High Wizard

Skill Type Properties Description
Soul Drain Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increases Max SP, and whenever you defeat a non-player enemy with a magical attack you recover some SP.


  • [Lv 1] : +2% Max SP.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% Max SP.
  • [Lv 3] : +6% Max SP.
  • [Lv 4] : +8% Max SP.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% Max SP.
  • [Lv 6] : +12% Max SP.
  • [Lv 7] : +14% Max SP.
  • [Lv 8] : +16% Max SP.
  • [Lv 9] : +18% Max SP.
  • [Lv10] : +20% Max SP.


When you defeat a non-player enemy with a magical attack, recover SP equal to:
(Enemy Base Level × ((95 + (15 × Soul Drain Level))) / 100)

Magic Crasher Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 8
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.24s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.06s
  • Cast Delay: 0.3s
  • Range: 9
 Strike an enemy with a weapon property physical attack, but you use your MATK instead of ATK for damage.


  • This attack uses the enemies DEF instead of Mdef.
  • This is considered a Ranged Physical Attack.

Napalm Vulcan Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: (15 x Skill Level) - 5
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cooldown: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Strike a target and all enemies in a 3x3 area around them for Ghost property magic damage.

Additionally, there is a chance to inflict the Curse status on targets hit.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 70% MATK, 1 Strike, 5% Chance to apply Curse status.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% MATK, 2 Strikes, 20% Chance to apply Curse status.

  • [Lv 4] : 280% MATK, 4 Strikes, 20% Chance to apply Curse status.
  • [Lv 5] : 350% MATK, 5 Strikes, 25% Chance to apply Curse status.
