  • SP Cost: 40
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 5.0s
  • Range: 18
  • Consumes: 1  Yellow Gemstone
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Clear a 3x3 area of any ground effects.


  • This skill removes Land Protector.
  • This skill is not affected by effects which remove or lower gemstone costs.
Gravitation Field Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: (20 x Skill Level)
  • Variable Cast Time: 5.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cooldown: 5.0s
  • Range: 18
 Create a 5x5 area of effect with intensified gravity that deals Neutral property magic damage.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the caster's Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% MATK, Hits 2 times.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% MATK, Hits 4 times.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% MATK, Hits 6 times.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% MATK, Hits 8 times.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% MATK, Hits 10 times.


Note: The final damage formula is:
Damage = [Skill Lvl × MATK × (# of hits) × (Base Level / 100)]


Warlock

Skill Type Properties Description
Marsh of Abyss Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 38 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 11
 Curse a target for 30 seconds to reduce their Movement Speed, DEF, and Flee.


  • The reduction of DEF and Flee are increased based on the caster's Job Level and INT.
  • This skill will remove Increase Agility, Wind Walk, and ASPD potions.


  • [Lv 1] : -50% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 2] : -60% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 3] : -70% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 4] : -80% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 5] : -90% Movement Speed.
Radius Passive
  • Max Level: 3
 Increase the casting range of Warlock skills, and reduce their Fixed Casting Time as well.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 Cell range, -10% Fixed Casting Time.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 Cell range, -15% Fixed Casting Time.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 Cell range, -20% Fixed Casting Time.
Summon Fire Ball Support
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Fire elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Fire ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Fire property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Fire property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Lightning Ball Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Lightning elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Lightning ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Wind property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Wind property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Water Ball Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Water elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Water ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Water property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Water property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Stone Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon an Earth elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Earth ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Earth property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Earth property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Release Damage
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 3
    • (Lv 2) : 20
  • Range: 11
  • Cast Delay: Equal to the skill stored
 Allows you to release stored magic, or fling elemental balls at targets.


  • Skills stored still have the same cast delay as the normal skill.
  • Elemental ball damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : Instantly cast a randomly selected spell that was stored with Reading Spellbook. If there are no spells stored, use one elemental ball to strike a target.
  • [Lv 2] : Release all summoned elemental balls to strike a target with magic damage of the elemental ball type.
Reading Spellbook Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Passive, Self
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
 Allows you to read Spell Books to store spells in your mind, letting you later use them with Release to cast the spell instantly.


To store a spell you must put the Spell Book item in your skill hotkey bar and use it as if it is a consumable. (It will not be consumed, and there is a different book for each skill).
Each spell stored will take a different amount of Mind Slots, which determines the amount of spells you can hold.


  • The number of spells you can store is determined by your INT, Base Level, Freezing Spell level and the spells you are trying to store.


8 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Drain Life)


10 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Lord of Vermilion)
  •  Spell Book (Meteor Storm)
  •  Spell Book (Storm Gust)


12 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Jack Frost)
  •  Spell Book (Earth Strain)
  •  Spell Book (Crimson Rock)
  •  Spell Book (Chain Lightning)


22 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Comet)
  •  Spell Book (Tetra Vortex)


The formula to calculate mind slots is:
(Freezing Spell Level × 4) + Floor(Base Level ÷ 10) + Floor(Total INT ÷ 10)

Freezing Spell Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase the number of Mind Slots available.


  • Mind Slots determine the amount of spells you can store using Reading Spellbook.
  • You can find you total mind slots and currently held spells with the @battlestats command ingame.


  • [Lv 1] : +8 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 2] : +16 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 3] : +24 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 4] : +32 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 5] : +40 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 6] : +48 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 7] : +56 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 8] : +64 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 9] : +72 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv10] : +80 Mind Slots.


The formula to calculate mind slots is:
(Freezing Spell Level × 4) + Floor(Base Level ÷ 10) + Floor(Total INT ÷ 10)

Frost Misty Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 32 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 8.0s
 Create a shower of Icy Mist around an area, dealing Water property magic damage to all enemies in range, also has a chance to inflict 10 seconds of the Frost status.

Targets with the Frost status will take additional damage from Jack Frost.


  • Target's affected by the Frost status will have reduced Movement Speed, DEF, and increased Fixed Casting Time.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% MATK, 30% Chance to apply Frost status, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% MATK, 35% Chance to apply Frost status, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% MATK, 40% Chance to apply Frost status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% MATK, 45% Chance to apply Frost status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 700% MATK, 50% Chance to apply Frost status, 11x11 Area of Effect.


This skills damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Sienna Execrate Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Consumes: 2  Red Gemstone
 Attempt to inflict the Stone Curse status to all enemies within a chosen area.


  • The chance of Stone Curse is increased based on the casters Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : Inflict Stone Curse for 10 seconds, 3x3 Area of Effect, 48% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 2] : Inflict Stone Curse for 12 seconds, 3x3 Area of Effect, 56% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 3] : Inflict Stone Curse for 14 seconds, 5x5 Area of Effect, 64% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 4] : Inflict Stone Curse for 16 seconds, 5x5 Area of Effect, 72% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 5] : Inflict Stone Curse for 18 seconds, 7x7 Area of Effect, 80% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
Drain Life Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 16 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Range: 11
 Deal Neutral property magic damage to a single target, with a chance to leech health from them and heal yourself for a portion of the damage dealt.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and INT.
  • The amount of Health leeched is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% MATK, 74% Chance to Leech, 8% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% MATK, 78% Chance to Leech, 16% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% MATK, 82% Chance to Leech, 24% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% MATK, 86% Chance to Leech, 32% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% MATK, 90% Chance to Leech, 40% of damage leeched as HP.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage + INT} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Amount of health absorbed is based on the following formula;
HP Absorb = [Base_HP_Absorb × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Crimson Rock Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 11
 Call forth a large meteor to strike a target and all enemies in a 7x7 surrounding area, dealing Fire property magic damage.

All targets hit by the meteor will be knocked back 3 cells.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1300% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1900% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 2500% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 3100% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 3700% MATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)}]%

Chain Lightning Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 11
 Strike a target with lightning that deals Wind property magic damage and will bounce between nearby enemies around the target.


The lightning will hit a single target 4 times. But if there are enemies nearby the target, the lightning will instead bounce between them multiple times.

  • [One Target] : Deals damage 4 times.
  • [Many Targets] : Deals damage 5~9 times split among all nearby enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% MATK, Lightning bounces 5 times.
  • [Lv 2] : 700% MATK, Lightning bounces 6 times.
  • [Lv 3] : 800% MATK, Lightning bounces 7 times.
  • [Lv 4] : 900% MATK, Lightning bounces 8 times.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% MATK, Lightning bounces 9 times.
Soul Expansion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 11
 Hit an enemy and enemies in the area around them twice with Ghost property magic damage.


  • Enemies inside White Imprison, will take double damage from this skill.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and INT.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1400% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1600% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1800% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2000% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage + INT} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Jack Frost Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cooldown: 4.0s
 Call forth a massive area of Icicles from the ground, hitting a large area around the target. Dealing Water property magic damage, bonus damage is applied if the target is under the Frost status.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1300% MATK, (1800% MATK) if Frost status, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% MATK, (2400% MATK) if Frost status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1900% MATK, (3000% MATK) if Frost status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2200% MATK, (3600% MATK) if Frost status, 11x11 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% MATK, (4200% MATK) if Frost status, 13x13 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Normal Damage (MATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Stasis Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 170s + (10 x Skill Level)
 In a massive area around you, completely seal off the usage of any skills from characters in the area.


  • This skill affects yourself, allies, and enemies.
  • This skills affect is reduced by the targets DEX, and VIT.


  • [Lv 1] : 5 second Base duration, 19x19 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 10 second Base duration, 21x21 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 15 second Base duration, 23x23 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 20 second Base duration, 25x25 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 25 second Base duration, 27x27 Area of Effect.


Duration of the effect is based on this formula;
Effect Duration = [5 + {Base_Duration − (Target_VIT + Target_DEX) ÷ 20}] seconds

Hell Inferno Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 60 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 11
 Deal 2 hits at the same time, one for Fire property magic damage, and the other for Shadow property magic damage in a small area around a target.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 400% MATK (Fire), 600% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% MATK (Fire), 1200% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1200% MATK (Fire), 1800% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1600% MATK (Fire), 2400% MATK (Shadow), 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2000% MATK (Fire), 3000% MATK (Shadow), 5x5 Area of effect.
Earth Strain Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 62 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 7.0s
  • Range: 6
 Raise the land in a moving wave toward one direction, dealing Earth property magic damage to all enemies hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 1600% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 2200% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 2800% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 3400% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 4000% MATK.
White Imprison Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 45 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 4.0s
  • Range: 11
 Imprison a single target in a transparent box, preventing them from moving or using skills and items for a short time.


  • While imprisoned, only Ghost property attacks can damage the target, they will also immediately end White Imprison.
  • When White Imprison ends normally, it will deal Fixed irreducible damage to the target that was trapped.
  • White Imprison can be cast on yourself, if it is, it will always be successful and last 5 seconds regardless of skill level.
  • White Imprison does not work against Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to imprison target, Duration 10 seconds, 400 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to imprison target, Duration 12 seconds, 800 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 70% Chance to imprison target, Duration 14 seconds, 1200 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Chance to imprison target, Duration 16 seconds, 1600 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 90% Chance to imprison target, Duration 18 seconds, 2000 Fixed irreducible damage.
Comet Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 400 + (80 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 5s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.5s
  • Cool Down: 20.0s
  • Range: 11
 Drop a massive 13x13 Comet from the depths of space, dealing Neutral property magic damage to all enemies in range.

All targets hit will also receive 'Magic Intoxication' status for 20 seconds. While under this status targets will have -50% resistance to All Properties of attacks.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 3200% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 3900% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 4600% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 5300% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 6000% MATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [(Base_Damage × Base_Level ÷ 100)]%

Tetra Vortex Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 90 + (30 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
  • Range: 11
 Strike a small area around a target with the power of the core elements. This damage is divided into 4 hits, each hit will take the elemental property from on of the consumed elemental balls used to cast the skill.


  • This spell requires you to have 4 elemental balls summoned, and consumes them all on cast.


You can mix the elements of this spell,
For example if you used Fire, Fire, Water, Wind element balls to cast the spell, it would deal Fire damage on the first and second hit, Water damage on the third, and Wind on the fourth hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 2000% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2400% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2800% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 3200% MATK per hit, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 3600% MATK per hit, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 4000% MATK per hit, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 4400% MATK per hit, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : 4800% MATK per hit, 7x7 Area of effect.


Each element of Tetra Vortex also has a chance to apply a different status effect on the target.

  • [Fire Element] -- Burning status
  • [Wind Element] -- Stun status
  • [Water Element] -- Freezing status
  • [Earth Element] -- Bleeding status
Intense Telekinesis Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (50 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 300.0s
 Sharpen your mind to greatly enhance your Ghost magic damage for 60 seconds. Multiplying Ghost property magic damage while also decreasing their Variable Casting Time and SP Consumption.


  • This skill can not be removed with Clearance , or Dispel.
  • The effects of this skill only apply to Ghost property skills.


  • [Lv 1] : +40% Ghost property magic damage, -10% Variable Cast Time, -10% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 2] : +80% Ghost property magic damage, -20% Variable Cast Time, -20% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 3] : +120% Ghost property magic damage, -30% Variable Cast Time, -30% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 4] : +160% Ghost property magic damage, -40% Variable Cast Time, -40% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 5] : +200% Ghost property magic damage, -50% Variable Cast Time, -50% SP Consumption.
Recognized Spell Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 20s + (30 x Skill Level)
 Increase you damage capabilities by always using the highest possible MATK variance, letting you deal the maximum amount of magical damage every time you cast a skill.

However, it also increases the SP Consumption of all skills by 25%.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 180 seconds.

Advanced Book Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Adds Mastery ATK and increase ASPD when using Book type weapons.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 ATK, +0.5% ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : +6 ATK, +1.0% ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : +9 ATK, +1.5% ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : +12 ATK, +2.0% ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : +15 ATK, +2.5% ASPD.
  • [Lv 6] : +18 ATK, +3.0% ASPD.
  • [Lv 7] : +21 ATK, +3.5% ASPD.
  • [Lv 8] : +24 ATK, +4.0% ASPD.
  • [Lv 9] : +27 ATK, +4.5% ASPD.
  • [Lv10] : +30 ATK, +5.0% ASPD.
Sense Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 9
 Reveal information about a monster.

Retrieve the monsters level, current HP, size, race, property, DEF, MDEF and the property damage table.


  • The information window will be shown to all party members.
Earth Spike Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 3.2s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.4s
  • Range: 9
 Raise spikes from the ground to deal multiple hits of Earth property magic damage to a single target.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% MATK, 1 Spike.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% MATK, 2 Spike.
  • [Lv 3] : 200% MATK, 3 Spike.
  • [Lv 4] : 200% MATK, 4 Spike.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% MATK, 5 Spike.
Heaven's Drive Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 24 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.9s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 0.8s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cooldown: 1s
  • Range: 9
 Cause jagged spikes to rise up from the ground in a 5x5 area, hitting any enemies inside the area for multiple hits of Earth property magical damage.


  • If this skill hits a hidden target it will reveal them.


  • [Lv 1] : 125% MATK, Hits targets 1 time.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% MATK, Hits targets 2 time.
  • [Lv 3] : 375% MATK, Hits targets 3 time.
  • [Lv 4] : 500% MATK, Hits targets 4 time.
  • [Lv 5] : 625% MATK, Hits targets 5 time.
Cast Cancel Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2
 Allows you to cancel a spell you are currently casting.

Higher levels lets you regain some of the SP spent to cast the spell.


  • [Lv 1] : 10% SP Regained
  • [Lv 2] : 30% SP Regained
  • [Lv 3] : 50% SP Regained
  • [Lv 4] : 70% SP Regained
  • [Lv 5] : 90% SP Regained

  • [Lv 4] : 80% SP Absorbed

  • Range: 9

Dragonology Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increases resistance to Dragon race monsters, as well as the damage you deal to Dragon race monster. Gives small INT bonuses as well.


  • The ATK% and MATK% only affect Dragon race monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : +4% Dragon Resistance, +4% ATK, +2% MATK, +1 INT.
  • [Lv 2] : +8% Dragon Resistance, +8% ATK, +4% MATK, +1 INT.
  • [Lv 3] : +12% Dragon Resistance, +12% ATK, +6% MATK, +2 INT.
  • [Lv 4] : +16% Dragon Resistance, +16% ATK, +8% MATK, +2 INT.
  • [Lv 5] : +20% Dragon Resistance, +20% ATK, +10% MATK, +3 INT.
Spell Breaker Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.56s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.14s
  • Range: 9
 Interrupt a spell being cast, and gain the SP being used to cast that spell. The monsters' HP will also be reduced by 2%.


  • At level 5, you will gain half of the HP drained by this skill.
  • This skill only has a 10% chance to work on Boss monsters, and will not drain HP from them.


  • [Lv 1] : Absorb 0% of the SP.
  • [Lv 2] : Absorb 25% of the SP.
  • [Lv 3] : Absorb 50% of the SP.
  • [Lv 4] : Absorb 75% of the SP.
  • [Lv 5] : Absorb 100% of the SP.
Free Cast Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Allows you to move and attack while casting skills. Your movement and attack speed will be reduced while casting a skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 30% Movement Speed, 55% ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : 35% Movement Speed, 60% ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : 40% Movement Speed, 65% ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : 45% Movement Speed, 70% ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : 50% Movement Speed, 75% ASPD.
  • [Lv 6] : 55% Movement Speed, 80% ASPD.
  • [Lv 7] : 60% Movement Speed, 85% ASPD.
  • [Lv 8] : 65% Movement Speed, 90% ASPD.
  • [Lv 9] : 70% Movement Speed, 95% ASPD.
  • [Lv 10] : 75% Movement Speed, 100% ASPD.
Volcano Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 2
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a 7x7 volcano on the ground, all players inside the area of effect will do increased Fire property damage and get increased ATK and MATK.


  • This skill can not overlap with other ground sage skills.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% Fire property damage, +10 ATK, +10 MATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +14% Fire property damage, +15 ATK, +15 MATK, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +17% Fire property damage, +20 ATK, +20 MATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +19% Fire property damage, +25 ATK, +25 MATK, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +20% Fire property damage, +30 ATK, +30 MATK, Duration 300 seconds.
Deluge Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 2
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a 7x7 deluge on the ground, all players inside the area of effect will do increased Water property damage and get increased Max HP.


  • This skill can not overlap with other ground sage skills.
  • You can cast Deluge, and Water Ball.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% Water property damage, +5% Max HP, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +14% Water property damage, +9% Max HP, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +17% Water property damage, +12% Max HP, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +19% Water property damage, +14% Max HP, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +20% Water property damage, +15% Max HP, Duration 300 seconds.
Whirlwind Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 2
  • Consumes 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a 7x7 whirlwind on the ground, all players inside the area of effect will do increased Wind property damage and have increased Flee.


  • This skill can not overlap with other ground sage skills.
  • Fire Wall will have +50% Duration inside the whirlwind.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% Wind property damage, +3 Flee, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +14% Wind property damage, +6 Flee, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +17% Wind property damage, +9 Flee, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +19% Wind property damage, +12 Flee, Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +20% Wind property damage, +15 Flee, Duration 300 seconds.
Auto Spell Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 35
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
 Adds a chance to auto cast a selected skill while doing normal attacks.


  • The auto cast skill level will be half of Auto Spell's skill level.
  • New skills are unlocked at different levels.


  • [Lv 1] : 2% Chance to auto cast, Fire Bolt, Lightning Bolt, Cold Bolt.
  • [Lv 2] : 4% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv 3] : 6% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv 4] : 8% Chance to auto cast, Soul Strike, Fire Ball.
  • [Lv 5] : 10% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv 6] : 12% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv 7] : 14% Chance to auto cast, Earth Spike, Frost Diver.
  • [Lv 8] : 16% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv 9] : 18% Chance to auto cast.
  • [Lv10] : 20% Chance to auto cast, Heaven's Drive, Thunderstorm.
Land Protector Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 70 - (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 2
  • Area of Effect:
    • [Lv 1] : 7x7
    • [Lv 2] : 7x7
    • [Lv 3] : 9x9
    • [Lv 4] : 9x9
    • [Lv 5] : 11x11
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
  • Consumes: 1  Yellow Gemstone
 Create a protective layer on the ground that removes and prevents any other ground skills being cast in the targeted area.


  • [Lv 1] : 7x7 Area of Effect, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 7x7 Area of Effect, Duration 165 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 9x9 Area of Effect, Duration 210 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 9x9 Area of Effect, Duration 255 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 11x11 Area of Effect, Duration 300 seconds.
Dispel Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Yellow Gemstone
 Removes all the buffs and debuffs from a target at chance, the chance is reduced based on the targets MDEF.


  • At level 5 (100% chance) it is not reduced by the targets MDEF.


  • [Lv 1] : 60% Chance to succeed.
  • [Lv 2] : 70% Chance to succeed.
  • [Lv 3] : 80% Chance to succeed.
  • [Lv 4] : 90% Chance to succeed.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% Chance to succeed.
Abracadabra Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Consumes: 2  Yellow Gemstone
 Abracadabra allows you to cast random skills, even some exclusive ones as well.

The skills cast are equal to the level of this skill.

Below is a list of special skills only available through this skill.


  • This skills will always use at least 1  Yellow Gemstone, even if you have effects that remove gemstone consumption.

Monocell Change a monster into a Poring for an amount of time.


  • This skill shows up as "????" when choosing a target.

Class Change Change a monster into a random field MvP for an amount of time.


  • This skill shows up as "????" when choosing a target.

Monster Chant Summons a random monster. (Similar to  Dead Branch)

Grampus Morph Change the caster's face to be SUPER UGLY for a period of time.

Grim Reaper Instantly kills a monster.


  • You receive no experience for the monster killed.
  • This does not work on boss monsters.
  • This skill shows up as "????" when choosing a target.

Gold Digger Steals zeny from a monster.


Amount of zeny is determined using this formula;
Monster Level * 100

  • This skill shows up as "????" when choosing a target.

Beastly Hypnosis Allows you to tame any tamable monster without the taming consumable.

  • This also works on the White Lady MvP.
  • This skill shows up as "????" when choosing a target.

Questioning The caster uses the /? emote.

Gravity Shows the Gravity logo above the caster's head.

Leveling Gives you 10% of the experience needed for the next level.

Suicide Instantly kill the caster.

Rejuvenation Fully heal the caster's HP and SP.

Coma Set the caster's HP and SP to 1.

Create Elemental Converter Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
 Allows you to create the four basic elemental converters.

 Crystal Blue +  Blank Scroll =  Water Elemental Converter

 Red Blood +  Blank Scroll =  Fire Elemental Converter

 Green Live +  Blank Scroll =  Earth Elemental Converter

 Wind of Verdure +  Blank Scroll =  Wind Elemental Converter

Elemental Change (Water) Support
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Water Elemental Converter
 Change a monsters property to Water 1.

This skill only has a chance to work, and the chance is increased based on the casters DEX, INT, Job Level.


  • This skill does not affect Boss monsters, or players.
Elemental Change (Earth) Support
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Earth Elemental Converter
 Change a monsters property to Earth 1.

This skill only has a chance to work, and the chance is increased based on the casters DEX, INT, Job Level.


  • This skill does not affect Boss monsters, or players.

  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Fire Elemental Converter
 Change a monsters property to Fire 1.

This skill only has a chance to work, and the chance is increased based on the casters DEX, INT, Job Level.


  • This skill does not affect Boss monsters, or players.

  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Wind Elemental Converter
 Change a monsters property to Wind 1.

This skill only has a chance to work, and the chance is increased based on the casters DEX, INT, Job Level.


  • This skill does not affect Boss monsters, or players.


Professor

Skill Type Properties Description
Health Conversion Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: (Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.8s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
 Consumes 10% of your HP to restore your SP.


  • [Lv 1] : Increase SP by 10% of the HP consumed
  • [Lv 2] : Increase SP by 20% of the HP consumed
  • [Lv 3] : Increase SP by 30% of the HP consumed
  • [Lv 4] : Increase SP by 40% of the HP consumed
  • [Lv 5] : Increase SP by 50% of the HP consumed
Soul Change Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Range: 9
 Exchange SP with a targeted party member. You will only receive half of the SP exchanged from the target.
Soul Burn Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 10s
    • (Lv 5) : 15s
  • Range: 9
 Attempt to drain a targets SP completely. If this fails it will instead drain the casters SP completely.


  • At level 5 this will deal magic damage equal to double the SP drained.


  • [Lv 1] : 40% Success rate.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% Success rate.
  • [Lv 3] : 60% Success rate.
  • [Lv 4] : 70% Success rate.
  • [Lv 5] : 70% Success rate.
Memorize Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
  • Fixed Cast Time: 5.0s
 The next 5 skills you cast will have -50% Variable Cast Time.


  • This effect wears off if you die.
Wall of Fog Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 25
  • Range: 9
 Create a 5x3 area of fog on the ground.

Attacking any target inside the mist with a single target skill will have a 75% chance to miss.

Ranged attacks and skills will have their damage reduced by 75%, and -50 Hit.

Duration lasts for 20 seconds.


  • Only 2 Wall of Fogs can be created at a time.
Spider Web Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Range: 7
  • Consumes: 1  Cobweb
 Shoot a web at a target to trap it.


  • If the webbed target is attacked by Fire element, they will receive double damage and be released from the web.
  • Flee of the enemy affected by it is reduced in 50%.
  • Only 2 webs can be active at the same time.
  • Does not work on Boss monsters.
  • Duration lasts for 8 seconds.
Double Casting Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 35 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 While this is active any bolt skill that you cast will have a chance to cast again.


  • This will double cast auto cast bolt skills as well.


  • [Lv 1] : 40% chance
  • [Lv 2] : 50% chance
  • [Lv 3] : 60% chance
  • [Lv 4] : 70% chance
  • [Lv 5] : 80% chance
Mind Breaker Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 9 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.7s + (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 Attack an enemies spirit granting it increased MATK but drastically reducing its MDEF.


  • [Lv 1] : +20% MATK, -12% MDEF.
  • [Lv 2] : +40% MATK, -24% MDEF.
  • [Lv 3] : +60% MATK, -36% MDEF.
  • [Lv 4] : +80% MATK, -48% MDEF.
  • [Lv 5] : +100% MATK, -60% MDEF.


Sorcerer

Skill Type Properties Description
Fire Walk Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 26 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Create a line of firewalls as you walk. Enemies that run into these walls will take Fire property magic damage.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 60% MATK, Up to 8 Fire cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% MATK, Up to 10 Fire cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 180% MATK, Up to 12 Fire cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% MATK, Up to 14 Fire cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 300% MATK, Up to 16 Fire cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (MATK%) = {Base_Damage x (BaseLevel / 100)}

Electric Walk Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 26 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Create a line of electric walls as you walk. Enemies that run into these walls will take Wind property magic damage.


  • Damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 60% MATK, Up to 8 Electric cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% MATK, Up to 10 Electric cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 180% MATK, Up to 12 Electric cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% MATK, Up to 14 Electric cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 300% MATK, Up to 16 Electric cells can be created, Duration 12 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (MATK%) = {Base_Damage x (BaseLevel / 100)}

Spell Fist Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 36 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Interrupt your own bolt skill during casting to channel the power into your attacks. Your physical attacks will deal magical property damage of the bolt skill you cancelled.


  • This is considered Melee magical damage.
  • This is a single target skill no matter what you do, you can't splash it damage.


  • [Lv 1] : 20% Base damage, Duration 45 sec.
  • [Lv 2] : 40% Base damage, Duration 60 sec.
  • [Lv 3] : 60% Base damage, Duration 75 sec.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Base damage, Duration 90 sec.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% Base damage, Duration 105 sec.
  • [Lv 6] : 120% Base damage, Duration 120 sec.
  • [Lv 7] : 140% Base damage, Duration 135 sec.
  • [Lv 8] : 160% Base damage, Duration 150 sec.
  • [Lv 9] : 180% Base damage, Duration 165 sec.
  • [Lv10] : 200% Base damage, Duration 180 sec.
Earth Grave Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 54 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Raise the ground in a targeted area stabbing enemies with Earth property magic damage. There is also a chance to cause the Bleeding status to targets hit.


  • This skill remove Hiding and Cloaking statuses from targets hit.
  • This skills damage is increased Based on the casters Base Level, INT, and Seismic Weapon skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : 5% Chance to cause the Bleeding status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 10% Chance to cause the Bleeding status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 15% Chance to cause the Bleeding status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 20% Chance to cause the Bleeding status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 25% Chance to cause the Bleeding status, 9x9 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK)% = [{(SkillLevel × INT) + (SeismicWeapon_Level × 200)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]

Diamond Dust Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 44 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a cloud of mist that deals Water property magic damage to all enemies in the area. There is also a chance to apply the Crystallization status to enemies inside the area.


  • Crystallization status has a 20 second base duration.
  • This skills damage is based on the casters Base Level, INT, and Frost Weapon skill level.
  • Crystallization's duration is decreased based on the targets VIT.


  • [Lv 1] : 10% Chance to apply Crystallization status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 15% Chance to apply Crystallization status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 20% Chance to apply Crystallization status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 25% Chance to apply Crystallization status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 30% Chance to apply Crystallization status, 9x9 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{(Skill_Level × INT) + (FrostWeapon_Level × 200)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100 )]%

Crystallization status duration is based on the following formula;
Duration of Effect = [Base_Duration − (Target_BaseVIT ÷ 10)]

Psychic Wave Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 48
    • (Lv 2) : 56
    • (Lv 3) : 64
    • (Lv 4) : 70
    • (Lv 5) : 78
  • Var. Cast Time: 7s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.1s - (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a wave of mental energy to deal Neutral property magic damage to all enemies in the area. This skill hits the enemies more times depending on the level.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and INT.
  • Using a Rod or a Book as a weapon makes the skill do a second hit per hit.
  • Having a level 2 Elemental summoned will change the property of this skill to the same property as the Elemental.


  • [Lv 1] : 70% MATK, 3 Hits, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% MATK, 4 Hits, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 210% MATK, 5 Hits, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 280% MATK, 6 Hits, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 350% MATK, 7 Hits, 11x11 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage + (INT × 3)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Killing Cloud Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 48
    • (Lv 2) : 56
    • (Lv 3) : 64
    • (Lv 4) : 70
    • (Lv 5) : 78
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.1s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.9s - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 2  Red Gemstone
 Summon a cloud of poison in an 7x7 area, all targets inside the cloud will take Poison property magic damage 3 times every second. Targets inside the area will also have a chance to gain the Cloud Poison status.


  • You can only have 1 Killing Cloud active at a time.
  • Killing Cloud lasts for 5 seconds.
  • Targets inflicted with Killing Cloud can receive the Cloud Poison status. It lasts for 5 seconds.
  • Cloud Poison status increases the damage received from Poison property attacks.
  • The increase in damage is based on the skill level used.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 40% MATK, 5% Increased Poison damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 80% MATK, 10% Increased Poison damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 120% MATK, 15% Increased Poison damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 160% MATK, 20% Increased Poison damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% MATK, 25% Increased Poison damage.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Striking Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 45 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
 Increase a single targets ATK and Perfect Hit for a short time at the cost of SP.


  • Lasts for 90 seconds.
  • This skill will constantly drain the SP of the player while active.


  • [Lv 1] : +20 ATK, +30 Perfect Hit, 5SP/s.
  • [Lv 2] : +40 ATK, +40 Perfect Hit, 4SP/s.
  • [Lv 3] : +60 ATK, +50 Perfect Hit, 3SP/s.
  • [Lv 4] : +80 ATK, +60 Perfect Hit, 2SP/s.
  • [Lv 5] : +100 ATK, +70 Perfect Hit, 1SP/s.
Warmer Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 28 + (12 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 30 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 Create a warming flame that covers a 7x7 area. All characters inside this area will be cured of Frozen, Freezing, and Crystallization statuses, and can not gain the Frozen, Freezing, or Crystallization statuses.


Anyone inside this area will also recover a small amount of HP every few seconds.


  • [Lv 1] : Recover 1% Max HP every 3 seconds, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Recover 2% Max HP every 3 seconds, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Recover 3% Max HP every 3 seconds, Duration 50 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Recover 4% Max HP every 3 seconds, Duration 55 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Recover 5% Max HP every 3 seconds, Duration 60 seconds.
Vacuum Extreme Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 26 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a vacuum that sucks enemies into one center cell. Anyone caught in the vacuum can not move, STR reduces the time that they are stuck for.


  • [Lv 1] : 3x3 Area of Effect, Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 3x3 Area of Effect, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 5x5 Area of Effect, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 5x5 Area of Effect, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 7x7 Area of Effect, Duration 12 seconds.


This is the formula for the total duration;
Duration = {Base_Duration - (Target_STR / 20)}

Varetyr Spear Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 60 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Strike a target and all the enemies surrounding it with a thundering bolt from the sky, that deals Wind property magic damage.


  • Note: This skills MATK% was predicted based on the past version of the skill, there is a chance it could not be entirely accurate.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, INT, Striking, and Lightning Loader skill levels.


  • [Lv 1] : (INT x 1)% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect, 5% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 2] : (INT x 2)% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect, 10% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 3] : (INT x 3)% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect, 15% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 4] : (INT x 4)% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect, 20% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 5] : (INT x 5)% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect, 25% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 6] : (INT x 6)% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect, 30% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 7] : (INT x 7)% MATK, 7x7 Area of Effect, 35% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 8] : (INT x 8)% MATK, 7x7 Area of Effect, 40% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv 9] : (INT x 9)% MATK, 7x7 Area of Effect, 45% Chance to apply Stun status.
  • [Lv10] : (INT x 10)% MATK, 9x9 Area of Effect, 50% Chance to apply Stun status.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage_MATK + (LightningLoader_Level × 50) + (Striking_Level x 50)} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

4 Elemental Analysis Support
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: (10 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
 Allows you to convert elemental stones and small ores into each other.


  • [Lv 1] : Break down an elemental stone into 6 ~ 10 smaller ores randomly.
  • [Lv 2] : Consume 10 smaller ores for a 90% chance to create an elemental stone.


Elemental Stones

  •  Flame Heart
  •  Mystic Frozen
  •  Rough Wind
  •  Great Nature


Small Ores

  •  Red Blood
  •  Wind of Verdure
  •  Crystal Blue
  •  Green Live
Poison Buster Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s + (1.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0 - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
 Force magical poison into an enemy, causing them to explode and deal poison damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area around them.


  • Having the Cloud Poison status from Killing Cloud increases further the damage.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level and INT.
  • Does not work on Poison property monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : 1300% MATK, 1500% with Cloud Poison.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% MATK, 2000% with Cloud Poison.
  • [Lv 3] : 1900% MATK, 2500% with Cloud Poison.
  • [Lv 4] : 2200% MATK, 3000% with Cloud Poison.
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% MATK, 3500% with Cloud Poison.


This skills damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [Base_Damage * (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Arrullo Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s + (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0 - (0.2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 4.0s + (Skill Level)
  • Range:
    • (Lv 1~4) : 7
    • (Lv 5) : 9
  • Consumes : 1  Yellow Gemstone
 Has a chance to put anyone caught in a large area into a Deep Sleep.


  • Chance of causing Deep Sleep is increased based on the casters INT and Job Level, and decreased by targets INT and LUK.
  • Duration is decreased by targets Base Level, and INT.


  • [Lv 1] : 20% Chance, 3x3 Area of effect, 8 second duration
  • [Lv 2] : 25% Chance, 3x3 Area of effect, 10 second duration
  • [Lv 3] : 30% Chance, 5x5 Area of effect, 12 second duration
  • [Lv 4] : 35% Chance, 5x5 Area of effect, 14 second duration
  • [Lv 5] : 40% Chance, 7x7 Area of effect, 16 second duration
Elemental Control Support
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Requires having an elemental spirit summoned
 Allows you to change the mode of your Elemental spirit, in passive mode they will slowly recover HP and SP.


  • Having an Elemental summoned will slowly drain the casters SP.


  • [Lv 1] : Switch spirit to Passive mode
  • [Lv 2] : Switch the spirit to Defensive Mode
  • [Lv 3] : Switch the spirit to Offense Mode
  • [Lv 4] : Unsummon the Spirit.
Summon Agni Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (50 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: (Skill Level)s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Consumes : 3  Red Blood
  • Consumes : 6  Red Blood
  • Consumes : 1  Flame Heart
 Summons Agni, a Fire elemental to aid you in battle. Different modes and levels will let Agni cast different skills.


  • Check the Sorcerer guide for more information on Agni.

  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s

 Summons Aqua, a Water elemental to aid you in battle. Different modes and levels will let Aqua cast different skills.


  • Check the Sorcerer guide for more information on Aqua.

 Summons Ventus, a Wind elemental to aid you in battle. Different modes and levels will let Ventus cast different skills.


  • Check the Sorcerer guide for more information on Ventus.

  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s

  • Consumes 1  Great Nature
 Summons Tera, a Earth elemental to aid you in battle. Different modes and levels will let Tera cast different skills.


  • Check the Sorcerer guide for more information on Tera.
Elemental Action Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 5
  • Requires having an elemental spirit summoned
 Force your elemental spirit to use one of it's offensive skills at random.
Elemental Sympathy Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Gives multiple bonuses to your elemental spirit.


  • [Lv 1] : +5% Max HP and SP, +25 ATK, +25 MATK, -10% SP consumption to summon.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% Max HP and SP, +50 ATK, +50 MATK, -15% SP consumption to summon.
  • [Lv 3] : +15% Max HP and SP, +75 ATK, +75 MATK, -20% SP consumption to summon.
  • [Lv 4] : +20% Max HP and SP, +100 ATK, +100 MATK, -25% SP consumption to summon.
  • [Lv 5] : +25% Max HP and SP, +125 ATK, +125 MATK, -30% SP consumption to summon.
Elemental Shield Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 120
  • Requires having an elemental spirit summoned (will de-spawn after casting)
  • Consumes : 1  Blue Gemstone
 Sacrifice your elemental spirit to create a Safety Wall and Pneuma like effect on the cell each party member is standing.


  • [Lv 1] : Blocks 12 attacks, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Blocks 13 attacks, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Blocks 14 attacks, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Blocks 15 attacks, Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Blocks 16 attacks, Duration 40 seconds.
Elemental Cure Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Requires having an elemental spirit summoned
 Consume 10% of the casters HP and SP to restore that amount of HP and SP to your elemental spirit.
Fire Insignia Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 14 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Scarlet Point
  • Consumes 2  Scarlet Point
  • Consumes 3  Scarlet Point
 Create a 3x3 fire crest on the ground that gives various effects to any character standing inside.


  • Duration lasts for 60 seconds.
  • Any Fire property characters will regain 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Any Earth property character will lose 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Water property attacks received be increased by 50%.


  • Weapon property change affects monsters as well, including Bosses.


  • [Lv 1] : Agni Elemental gets; +20% ATK, and it's HP and SP recoveries are doubled.
  • [Lv 2] : +50 ATK, Weapon property changes to Fire, +10% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +50 MATK, +25% Fire property magic damage.
Water Insignia Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 14 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes : 1  Indigo Point
  • Consumes : 2  Indigo Point
  • Consumes : 3  Indigo Point
 Create a 3x3 water crest on the ground that gives various effects to any character standing inside.


  • Duration lasts for 60 seconds.
  • Any Water property characters will regain 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Any Fire property character will lose 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Wind property attacks received be increased by 50%.


  • Weapon property change affects monsters as well, including Bosses.


  • [Lv 1] : Aqua Elemental gets; +20% ATK, and it's HP and SP recoveries are doubled.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% Healing Received, Weapon property changed to Water, +10% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : -30% Variable Cast Time for Water property skills, +25% Water property magic damage.
Wind Insignia Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 14 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes : 1  Yellow Wish Point
  • Consumes : 2  Yellow Wish Point
  • Consumes : 3  Yellow Wish Point
 Create a 3x3 wind crest on the ground that gives various effects to any character standing inside.


  • Duration lasts for 60 seconds.
  • Any Wind property characters will regain 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Any Water property character will lose 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Earth property attacks received be increased by 50%.


  • Weapon property change affects monsters as well, including Bosses.


  • [Lv 1] : Ventus Elemental gets; +20% ATK, and it's HP and SP recoveries are doubled.
  • [Lv 2] : +20% ASPD, Weapon property changed to Wind, +10% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : -50% After Cast Delay on Wind skills, +25% Wind property magic damage.
Earth Insignia Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 14 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes : 1  Lime Green Point
  • Consumes : 2  Lime Green Point
  • Consumes : 3  Lime Green Point
 Create a 3x3 earth crest on the ground that gives various effects to any character standing inside.


  • Duration lasts for 60 seconds.
  • Any Earth property characters will regain 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Any Wind property character will lose 1% HP every 5 seconds.
  • Fire property attacks received be increased by 50%.


  • Weapon property change affects monsters as well, including Bosses.


  • [Lv 1] : Tera Elemental gets; +20% ATK, and it's HP and SP recoveries are doubled.
  • [Lv 2] : +500 Max HP, +50 DEF, Weapon property changed to Earth, +10% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +50 Max SP, +50 MDEF, +25% Earth property magic damage.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Cast Delay: 0.1s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type : Arrows
  • Required ammo amount : 1
 Use a single arrow to strike and enemy twice from a distance.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 110% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 120% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 130% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 140% ATK per hit.

  • [Lv 8] : 170% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 9] : 180% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv10] : 190% ATK per hit.
Vulture's Eye Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Sharpen your sight increasing your range and Hit rate with Bow class weapons.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 Cell range when using a Bow, +1% Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 Cell range when using a Bow, +2% Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 Cell range when using a Bow, +3% Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : +4 Cell range when using a Bow, +4% Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 Cell range when using a Bow, +5% Hit.

  • [Lv 8] : +8 Cell range when using a Bow, +8% Hit.
  • [Lv 9] : +9 Cell range when using a Bow, +9% Hit.
  • [Lv10] : +10 Cell range when using a Bow, +10% Hit.
Arrow Shower Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type :
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type : Arrows
  • Required ammo amount : 1
 Fire an arrow to deal physical damage to enemies within a 3x3 area at the targeted cell. In addition, the affected target is knocked back 2 cells.


  • [Lv 1] : 160% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 170% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 190% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 210% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 230% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 240% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 250% ATK.
Attention Concentrate Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 + (5 x Skill Level)
 Temporarily increase DEX and AGI.

In addition, it reveals hidden targets within 3x3 cells around you when cast.


  • [Lv 1] : +3% DEX / AGI, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% DEX / AGI, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +5% DEX / AGI, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +6% DEX / AGI, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +7% DEX / AGI, Duration 140 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +8% DEX / AGI, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +9% DEX / AGI, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +10% DEX / AGI, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +11% DEX / AGI, Duration 220 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +12% DEX / AGI, Duration 240 seconds.
Arrow Crafting Support
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Requires being below 70% carry weight
 Let's you turn normal items into arrows.


You can check Arrow Crafting for the available recipes.

Charge Arrow Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type :
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type : Arrows

Skill Type Properties Description
Skid Trap Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes : 1  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that slides the target in the specified direction when stepped on.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 6 cells of knock back, 300 seconds duration
  • [Lv 2] : 7 cells of knock back, 240 seconds duration
  • [Lv 3] : 8 cells of knock back, 180 seconds duration
  • [Lv 4] : 9 cells of knock back, 120 seconds duration
  • [Lv 5] : 10 cells of knock back, 60 seconds duration

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Variable Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.3s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes : 1  Trap
  • Cast can not be interrupted

  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% ATK, 65 seconds duration
  • [Lv 2] : 75% ATK, 50 seconds duration
  • [Lv 3] : 100% ATK, 35 seconds duration
  • [Lv 4] : 125% ATK, 20 seconds duration
  • [Lv 5] : 150% ATK, 5 seconds duration

Beast Strafing Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Cast Delay: 0.1s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type: Arrows
  • Required ammo amount: 1
 Use your strength to shoot a powerful arrow after using Double Strafe.


  • This skill only works on Animal or Insect race monsters.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (ATK) = [50 + STR × 8]%

Ankle Snare Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes 1:  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that immobilizes anyone that steps in a 3x3 area of the trap.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.
  • The targets AGI will reduce the time they are immobilized.


  • [Lv 1] : 4 seconds immobilize, Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 8 seconds immobilize, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 12 seconds immobilize, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 16 seconds immobilize, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 20 seconds immobilize, Duration 50 seconds.


Immobilize duration is based on this formula;
Effect Duration = [Base_Effect_Duration − Target_AGI ÷ 10]s

Flasher Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 2  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that blinds anyone that steps in a 3x3 area of the trap.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to Blind targets, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to Blind targets, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 70% Chance to Blind targets, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Chance to Blind targets, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 90% Chance to Blind targets, Duration 30 seconds.
Remove Trap Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Trap
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Range: 2
 Removes a trap from the ground. You will receive the trap item back.
Falconry Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Allows you to rent a Falcon from Universal Rental NPC. This is needed for Falcon related skills.
Shockwave Trap Support

  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 45
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 2  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that drains the SP from anyone that steps in a 3x3 area of the trap.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : Drains 20% of Max SP, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Drains 35% of Max SP, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Drains 50% of Max SP, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Drains 65% of Max SP, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Drains 80% of Max SP, Duration 40 seconds.
Sandman Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 1  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that puts anyone that steps in a 3x3 area of the trap to sleep.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to apply Sleep status, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to apply Sleep status, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 70% Chance to apply Sleep status, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Chance to apply Sleep status, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 90% Chance to apply Sleep status, Duration 30 seconds.
Freezing Trap Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 2  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that freezes anyone that steps in a 3x3 area of the trap. It will also deal Water property physical damage to all enemies in the area.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to apply Frozen status, 6 seconds Frozen Duration, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to apply Frozen status, 9 seconds Frozen Duration, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 70% Chance to apply Frozen status, 12 seconds Frozen Duration, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Chance to apply Frozen status, 15 seconds Frozen Duration, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 90% Chance to apply Frozen status, 18 seconds Frozen Duration, Duration 30 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = ATK + (Trap_Research_Level × 40)

Blitz Beat Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 7 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 5
  • Requires falcon companion
 Use your Falcon to attack a target and a any enemies in the area of 3x3 cells around it.


While doing normal attacks there is a chance that your Falcon will attack the target on it's own. This chance is increased depending on the casters LUK.


  • Every 3 LUK increases the Falcon auto attack chance by 1%.
  • The damage of Falcon is increased by the casters AGI and DEX.


  • [Lv 1] : Attacks 1 times.
  • [Lv 2] : Attacks 2 times.
  • [Lv 3] : Attacks 3 times.
  • [Lv 4] : Attacks 4 times.
  • [Lv 5] : Attacks 5 times.
Detect Support
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 8
  • Range: 1 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Requires falcon companion
 Send your Falcon to a location and detect any traps or hidden enemies nearby.


  • [Lv 1] : 2 cells away.
  • [Lv 2] : 4 cells away.
  • [Lv 3] : 6 cells away.
  • [Lv 4] : 8 cells away.
Spring Trap Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Trap
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 3 + (Skill Level)
  • Requires falcon companion
 Send your Falcon to a trap and set it off immediately.


  • [Lv 1] : 4 cells away.
  • [Lv 2] : 5 cells away.
  • [Lv 3] : 6 cells away.
  • [Lv 4] : 7 cells away.
  • [Lv 5] : 8 cells away.
Blast Mine Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Variable Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.3s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 1  Trap
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Set a trap on the ground that explodes after a set time, dealing damage to anyone within a 3x3 area of the trap.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.
  • This damage is naturally Wind property. (Unknown if you can use an Endow to change the damage property)


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 5 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = [DEX × (3 + Base_Level ÷ 100) × (1 + INT ÷ 35)] × Skill_Level ± 10% + (Trap_Research_Level × 40)

  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 1
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 1  Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that displays a set message above any target that steps on it.

Claymore Trap Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Variable Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.3s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 2  Trap
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Set a trap on the ground that explodes when stepped on, dealing damage to anyone within a 3x3 area of the trap.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.
  • This damage is naturally Fire property. (Unknown if you can use an Endow to change the damage property)


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 100 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = [DEX × (3 + Base_Level ÷ 85) × (1.1 + INT ÷ 35)] × Skill_Level ± 10% + (Trap_Research_Level × 40)

Phantasmic Arrow Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
 Shoot an imaginary arrow at a target dealing 500% ATK.


  • This skills damage is forced to the Wind property.


Sniper

Skill Type Properties Description
True Sight Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 20
    • (Lv 3~4) : 25
    • (Lv 5~6) : 30
    • (Lv 7~8) : 35
    • (Lv 9~10) : 40
 Increase all of your stats, Hit rate, damage, and Critical Rate.


  • [Lv 1] : +5 All stats, +3% HIT, +2% Damage, +1 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 2] : +5 All stats, +6% HIT, +4% Damage, +2 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 3] : +5 All stats, +9% HIT, +6% Damage, +3 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 4] : +5 All stats, +12% HIT, +8% Damage, +4 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 All stats, +15% HIT, +10% Damage, +5 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 6] : +5 All stats, +18% HIT, +12% Damage, +6 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 7] : +5 All stats, +21% HIT, +14% Damage, +7 Critical Rate.
  • [Lv 8] : +5 All stats, +24% HIT, +16% Damage, +8 Critical Rate.

  • [Lv10] : +5 All stats, +30% HIT, +20% Damage, +10 Critical Rate.
Falcon Assault Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 26 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Requires falcon companion
 Command your Falcon to strike a target.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, AGI, DEX, Blitz Beat, and Steel Crow skill levels.


  • [Lv 1] : 220% Damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 290% Damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 360% Damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 430% Damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% Damage.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (Damage) = (Blitz Beat Skill Level x 20) + Steel_Crow_Level × 6 + Floor(AGI / 2) * 2 + Floor(DEX / 10) * 2

Sharp Shooting Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 14 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 11
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type: Arrows
  • Required ammo amount: 1
 Strike an enemy with a powerful arrow, dealing damage to any other enemy within a 5x5 cells area around the target.


  • This skill can deal Critical Hits.
  • This skills has a base +50 Critical Rate. (This is not shown in the status window)
  • Critical damage modifiers applies to this skill at half their value.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1500% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1800% ATK.
Wind Walk Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.2s + (0.3 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s + (0.1 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
 Embrace the winds and buff you and your party members with Movement Speed and Flee.


  • This does not stack with other movement speed boosts, except for Warg Rider.


  • [Lv 1] : +2% Movement Speed, +1 Flee, Duration 130 seconds.
  • [Lv 1] : +4% Movement Speed, +1 Flee, Duration 160 seconds.

  • [Lv 1] : +18% Movement Speed, +5 Flee, Duration 370 seconds.
  • [Lv 1] : +20% Movement Speed, +5 Flee , Duration 400 seconds.

Skill Type Properties Description
Ranger Main Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase your Mastery ATK and Soft Defense against Fish, Animal, and Plant race monsters.


  • This skill adds soft defense, meaning it is a flat reduction off of the final damage taken.


  • [Lv 1] : +5 ATK, +5 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 2] : +10 ATK, +10 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 3] : +15 ATK, +15 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 4] : +20 ATK, +20 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 5] : +25 ATK, +25 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 6] : +30 ATK, +30 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 7] : +35 ATK, +35 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 8] : +40 ATK, +40 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv 9] : +45 ATK, +45 Soft Defense.
  • [Lv10] : +50 ATK, +50 Soft Defense.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40

  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 1.0s
  • Range: 9

    • Bow

 Shoot a volley of arrows at a target, dealing 5 hits.

  • [Lv 2] : 540% ATK, 870% with Fear Breeze.
  • [Lv 3] : 560% ATK, 905% with Fear Breeze.
  • [Lv 4] : 580% ATK, 940% with Fear Breeze.

Electric Shocker Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 35
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 1  Special Alloy Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that will immobilize and drain SP from the target and any enemies in a 5x5 area around the target when stepped on.


  • After a set duration the trap will dismantle itself.
  • You can have a maximum of 3 traps set at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : Drains 5% Max SP per second, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Drains 10% Max SP per second, Duration 22 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Drains 15% Max SP per second, Duration 24 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Drains 20% Max SP per second, Duration 26 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Drains 25% Max SP per second, Duration 28 seconds.
Warg Mastery Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Requires:  Wolf Flute
 Allows you to call a Warg to your side, using this skill again will return the Warg to the wild.


  • You must release your Falcon companion before you can call a Warg.
Trap Research Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Study the art of trapping, increasing the Damage and Range of your traps. Also increases your Max SP.


  • The range bonus is only applied to Ranger traps.


  • [Lv 1] : +40 Damage Bonus, +1 Range, +1 INT, +220 Max SP.
  • [Lv 2] : +80 Damage Bonus, +1 Range, +2 INT, +240 Max SP.
  • [Lv 3] : +120 Damage Bonus, +2 Range, +3 INT, +260 Max SP.
  • [Lv 4] : +160 Damage Bonus, +2 Range, +4 INT, +280 Max SP.
  • [Lv 5] : +200 Damage Bonus, +3 Range, +5 INT, +300 Max SP.
  • [Lv 6] : +240 Damage Bonus, +3 Range, +6 INT, +320 Max SP.
  • [Lv 7] : +280 Damage Bonus, +4 Range, +7 INT, +340 Max SP.
  • [Lv 8] : +320 Damage Bonus, +4 Range, +8 INT, +360 Max SP.
  • [Lv 9] : +360 Damage Bonus, +5 Range, +9 INT, +380 Max SP.
  • [Lv10] : +400 Damage Bonus, +5 Range, +10 INT, +400 Max SP.
Arrow Storm Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.3s
  • Cool Down: 3.2s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
  • Required ammo type: Arrows
  • Required ammo amount: 5
 Call down a hail of arrows on a wide area around a target.

  • [Lv 1] : 380% ATK, 450% with Fear Breeze, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 560% ATK, 700% with Fear Breeze, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 740% ATK, 950% with Fear Breeze, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 920% ATK, 1200% with Fear Breeze, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 1100% ATK, 1450% with Fear Breeze, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 1280% ATK, 1700% with Fear Breeze, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 1460% ATK, 1950% with Fear Breeze, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 1640% ATK, 2200% with Fear Breeze, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 1820% ATK, 2450% with Fear Breeze, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv10] : 2000% ATK, 2700% with Fear Breeze, 9x9 Area of Effect.
Cluster Bomb Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 3
  • Consumes: 1  Special Alloy Trap
 Set a trap on the ground that can be manually detonated with Detonator, dealing a large amount of damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area of effect.


  • You can have a maximum of 3 traps set at a time.
  • This skills damage increases based on the casters Base Level, and the Trap Research skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 700% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = Skill Modifier + [ {(Skill Level x Caster’s DEX) + (INT x 5)} x (1.5 + (Casters_BaseLevel / 100))} ] x {(TrapResearch_SkillLevel x 20) / 50}

  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
 Allows you to mount your Warg companion.


While mounted you will have increased movement speed, but you can only use Warg skills and some trap skills.

Camouflage Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40
 Hide yourself near a wall or obstacle, you will still be detected by Demon race and Boss monsters.


Each second in Camouflage grants +10% Critical Rate, +30 ATK and reduces DEF by -5%, up to a maximum of +100% Critical Rate and +300 ATK.


  • After attacking or leaving the concealed state, you will lose the entire bonus. It is only applied for a single attack.


  • [Lv 1] : Consumes 6 SP per second, Unable to move.
  • [Lv 2] : Consumes 5 SP per second, Unable to move.
  • [Lv 3] : Consumes 4 SP per second, 50% movement speed, Can move away from wall or obstacle.
  • [Lv 4] : Consumes 3 SP per second, 75% movement speed, Can move away from wall or obstacle.
  • [Lv 5] : Consumes 2 SP per second, 100% movement speed, Can move away from wall or obstacle.

  • Consumes: 1  Special Alloy Trap

Fear Breeze Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Required weapon type:
    • Bow
 When active during normal attacks, has a chance to do additional attacks.


  • This effect is taken off if you unequip the weapon equipped.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 extra attack, 12% chance, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +1 extra attack, 12% chance, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +1 ~ 2 extra attacks, 21% chance, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +1 ~ 3 extra attacks, 27% chance, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +1 ~ 4 extra attacks, 30% chance, Duration 180 seconds.
Detonator Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Range: 9
 Sets off any traps within a 7x7 area of effect.
Warg Dash Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 4
  • Requires being mounted on a Warg
 Dash in a straight line very fast. You will stop if you run into a wall or enemy.


If you run into an enemy, deal damage to them in a 3x3 area of effect.

Warg Strike Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 18 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 Command your Warg to strike a target with immense force. Your Warg will automatically attack while you do normal attacks.


  • Can be used while riding a Warg.
  • The chance for the Warg to automatically attack is 1% for every 3 LUK.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK.
Sensitive Keen Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Requires Warg companion
 Command your Warg to search the area for hidden traps and enemies. If Warg finds an enemy, it will attack it, and has a chance to auto cast Warg Bite on the target.


  • [Level 1] : 7x7 Area of Effect, 150% ATK, 8% Warg Bite auto cast chance.
  • [Level 2] : 9x9 Area of Effect, 200% ATK, 16% Warg Bite auto cast chance.
  • [Level 3] : 11x11 Area of Effect, 250% ATK, 24% Warg Bite auto cast chance.
  • [Level 4] : 13x13 Area of Effect, 300% ATK, 32% Warg Bite auto cast chance.
  • [Level 5] : 15x15 Area of Effect, 350% ATK, 40% Warg Bite auto cast chance.
Warg Bite Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 38 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 2 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
  • Requires Warg companion
 Command your Warg to bite an enemy and attempt to lock them in place for a few seconds.


  • The higher the targets AGI, the less chance they have to be immobilized.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% ATK, 1 second immobilize.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% ATK, 2 second immobilize.
  • [Lv 3] : 1000% ATK, 3 second immobilize.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200% ATK, 4 second immobilize.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500% ATK, 5 second immobilize.

  • [Lv 3] : 80% chance to apply Burning status.
