  • [Lv 1] : -14% Def and Mdef.
  • [Lv 2] : -28% Def and Mdef.
  • [Lv 3] : -42% Def and Mdef.
Magnetic Field Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 * Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 25 - (5 * Skill Level)
  • Requires riding a Madogear
  • Consumes 2  Magic Gear Fuel
  • Required equipment:  Magnetic Field Generator
 Place a debuff on an area immoblizing all enemies and drains their SP.


  • If a target affected by this skill is hit by Earth property damage, or Quagmire, they are freed.


  • [Lv 1] : Drains 50 SP per second for 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Drains 50 SP per second for 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Drains 50 SP per second for 8 seconds.
Neutral Barrier Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 * Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 25 - (5 * Skill Level)
  • Requires riding a Madogear
  • Consumes 1  Magic Gear Fuel
  • Required equipment:  Barrier Builder
 Create a 5x5 barrier around you that negates incoming and outgoing ranged attacks, and increases Def / Mdef.


  • Ranged attacks that ignore accuracy checks will still hit the target.
  • Lasts 1 minute.
  • Using Stealth Field or removing the Madogear removes the buff.


  • [Lv 1] : +15% Def and Mdef, 30 second duration.
  • [Lv 2] : +20% Def and Mdef, 45 second duration.
  • [Lv 3] : +25% Def and Mdef, 60 second duration.
Stealth Field Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 60 + (20 * Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 25 - (5 * Skill Level)
  • Requires riding a Madogear
  • Consumes 2  Magic Gear Fuel
  • Required equipment:  Camouflague Generator
 Create a 5x5 stealth field around you that hides anyone inside. Continuosly consumes SP.

You can not be targeted while stealthed, but your movement speed is reduced by 20%.


  • If Stealth field overlaps with another Stealth field both effects will cancel.


  • [Lv 1] : 15 second duration.
  • [Lv 2] : 20 second duration.
  • [Lv 3] : 25 second duration.

Skill Type Properties Description

  • [Lv 2] : +6 ATK.

  • [Lv 9] : +27 ATK.
  • [Lv10] : +30 ATK.

  • Max Level: 10
 Increase your potion crafting chance, and healing you receive from potion items.


  • [Lv 1] : +1% Brewing success rate, +5% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 2] : +2% Brewing success rate, +10% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 3] : +3% Brewing success rate, +15% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 4] : +4% Brewing success rate, +20% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 5] : +5% Brewing success rate, +25% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 6] : +6% Brewing success rate, +30% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 7] : +7% Brewing success rate, +35% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 8] : +8% Brewing success rate, +40% Potion healing.
  • [Lv 9] : +9% Brewing success rate, +45% Potion healing.
  • [Lv10] : +10% Brewing success rate, +50% Potion healing.
Bioethics Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 This skill has no effect, it just allows you to gain skills from the Homunculus skill tree.
Berserk Pitcher Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10
  • SP % Cost: 8% of current
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 2  Berserk Potion
 Throw 2  Berserk Potions at a target and give them the effect of the potion, even if their class can not consume Berserk Potions.

Duration 15 minutes.


  • If this skill is used on a character less than level 85, the potions are consumed and no effect is applied.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Consumes 1  Medicine Bowl
 Allows you to brew an item, also increases the success rate of brewing.


  • You must have the applicable guide book for the item your are trying to brew.


  • [Lv 1] : +3% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 2] : +6% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 3] : +9% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 4] : +12% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 5] : +15% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 6] : +18% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 7] : +21% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 8] : +24% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv 9] : +27% Brewing success rate.
  • [Lv10] : +30% Brewing success rate.
Rest Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50
 Command your homunculus to go away and rest, this skill can only be used when the homunculus is at 80% HP.
Demonstration Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Bottle Grenade
 Creates a 3x3 area of effect on the ground that causes melee fire damage to any target that walks in it's radius. Also has a chance to destroy the targets weapon.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% ATK, 3% Chance to destroy the targets weapon.
  • [Lv 2] : 140% ATK, 6% Chance to destroy the targets weapon.
  • [Lv 3] : 160% ATK, 9% Chance to destroy the targets weapon.
  • [Lv 4] : 180% ATK, 12% Chance to destroy the targets weapon.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% ATK, 15% Chance to destroy the targets weapon.
Acid Terror Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Acid Bottle
 Throw an acid bottle and deal damage to a single target. Also has a chance to destroy the targets armor, and cause the Bleeding status.


  • This deals additional damage for each level of Potion Research.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, 5% Chance to destroy targets armor, 3% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK, 15% Chance to destroy targets armor, 6% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK, 25% Chance to destroy targets armor, 9% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK, 35% Chance to destroy targets armor, 12% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK, 45% Chance to destroy targets armor, 15% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
Potion Pitcher Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Throw a potion a target to heal them. Different levels throw different potion types.


  • Increases the efficiency by 3 when used on a homunculus.


  • [Lv 1] : Throws a  Red Potion at the target.
  • [Lv 2] : Throws a  Orange Potion at the target.
  • [Lv 3] : Throws a  Yellow Potion at the target.
  • [Lv 4] : Throws a  White Potion at the target.
  • [Lv 5] : Throws a  Blue Potion at the target.
Bio Cannibalize Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 4
  • Consumes 1  Plant Bottle
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon a plant monster on the targeted location. Higher levels lets you summon stronger plants but have lesser duration.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons a Mandragora, 5 plant limit, 5 minute duration.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons a Hydra, 4 plant limit, 4 minute duration.
  • [Lv 3] : Summons a Flora, 3 plant limit, 3 minute duration.
  • [Lv 4] : Summons a Parasite, 2 plant limit, 2 minute duration.
  • [Lv 5] : Summons a Geographer, 1 plant limit, 1 minute duration.
Summon Marine Sphere Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 1
  • Consumes 1  Marine Sphere Bottle
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon a Marine Sphere monsters on the targeted cell.

The monster will explode shortly after being damaged, and can damage any character nearby.


  • [Lv 1] : Marine Sphere has 2400 HP.
  • [Lv 2] : Marine Sphere has 2800 HP.
  • [Lv 3] : Marine Sphere has 3200 HP.
  • [Lv 4] : Marine Sphere has 3600 HP.
  • [Lv 5] : Marine Sphere has 4000 HP.

  • [Lv 5] : 600 seconds duration.
Call Homunculus Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Call your homunculus out from rest.

If you do not have a homunculus, you will instead create a random base homunculus, and consume 1  Embryo


There are two forms for each type of homunculus;

  • Amistr
  • Lif
  • Vanilmirth
  • Filir
Twilight Pharmacy 1 Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 200
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Consumes 200  Medicine Bowl
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Craft 200  White Potion all at the same time.

Each potion is individually crafted, each with it's own chance to fail or succeed.


  • You must be soul linked with Spirit of the Alchemist to use this skill.
Twilight Pharmacy 2 Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 200
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Consumes 200  Medicine Bowl
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Craft 200  Condensed White Potion all at the same time.

Each potion is individually crafted, each with it's own chance to fail or succeed.


  • This skill requires a Super Novice and a Soul Linker to be in your party.
  • You must be soul linked with Spirit of the Alchemist to use this skill.
Twilight Pharmacy 3 Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 200
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Consumes 200  Medicine Bowl
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Craft 100  Alcohol, 50  Acid Bottle, or 50  Bottle Grenade all at the same time.

Each potion is individually crafted, each with it's own chance to fail or succeed.


  • This skill requires a Taekwon Kid and a Soul Linker to be in your party.
  • You must be soul linked with Spirit of the Alchemist to use this skill.
Chemical Protection Shield Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 25
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 1
  • Consumes 1  Glistening Coat
 Prevent the targets Shield from being destroyed or stripped.


  • [Lv 1] : 120 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 2] : 240 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 3] : 360 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 4] : 480 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 5] : 600 seconds duration.
Resurrect Homunculus Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 74:68:62:56:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Resurrect your dead homunculus.


  • [Lv 1] : Resurrect homunculus at 20% Max HP.
  • [Lv 2] : Resurrect homunculus at 40% Max HP.
  • [Lv 3] : Resurrect homunculus at 60% Max HP.
  • [Lv 4] : Resurrect homunculus at 80% Max HP.
  • [Lv 5] : Resurrect homunculus at 100% Max HP.

Creator

Skill Type Properties Description
Slim Potion Pitcher Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 3
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Throw a potion in a 7x7 area of effect, healing all allies in the area.


  • Ranked potions do not give any bonus to the healing from this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : Throw a  Condensed Red Potion with 110% healing effect.
  • [Lv 2] : Throw a  Condensed Red Potion with 120% healing effect.
  • [Lv 3] : Throw a  Condensed Red Potion with 130% healing effect.
  • [Lv 4] : Throw a  Condensed Red Potion with 140% healing effect.
  • [Lv 5] : Throw a  Condensed Red Potion with 150% healing effect.
  • [Lv 6] : Throw a  Condensed Yellow Potion with 160% healing effect.
  • [Lv 7] : Throw a  Condensed Yellow Potion with 170% healing effect.
  • [Lv 8] : Throw a  Condensed Yellow Potion with 180% healing effect.
  • [Lv 9] : Throw a  Condensed Yellow Potion with 190% healing effect.
  • [Lv10] : Throw a  Condensed White Potion with 200% healing effect.
Full Chemical Protection Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 1
  • Consumes 1  Glistening Coat
 Prevent the targets Weapon, Headgear, Armor, and Shield from being destroyed or stripped.


  • [Lv 1] : 120 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 2] : 240 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 3] : 360 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 4] : 480 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 5] : 600 seconds duration.
Acid Demonstration Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Cooldown: 0.15s
  • Consumes 1  Bottle Grenade
  • Consumes 1  Acid Bottle
 Throw a  Acid Bottle and  Bottle Grenade at a target to deal long ranged physical damage.

Has a chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.


  • This skills animation shows 10 hits regardless of skill level.
  • Damage is increased based on your INT, and the targets VIT.
  • This skill deals only long ranged physical damage.
  • This skills element is determined by your weapon property.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, 1% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK, 2% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK, 3% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK, 4% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK, 5% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 6] : 1200% ATK, 6% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK, 7% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 8] : 1600% ATK, 8% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv 9] : 1800% ATK, 9% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.
  • [Lv10] : 2000% ATK, 10% Chance to destroy the targets Armor and Weapon.


Geneticist

Skill Type Properties Description
Sword Training Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increase your ATK and Hit when using a Sword or Dagger class weapon.


  • [Lv 1] : +10 ATK, +3 Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : +20 ATK, +6 Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : +30 ATK, +9 Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : +40 ATK, +12 Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : +50 ATK, +15 Hit.
Cart Remodeling Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Modify your cart to increase your Hit with Cart Tornado, Cart Cannon, and Cart Revolution.

Also increase your cart's maximum weight limit.


  • [Lv 1] : +500 cart weight limit, +4 Hit with cart skills.
  • [Lv 2] : +1000 cart weight limit, +8 Hit with cart skills.
  • [Lv 3] : +1500 cart weight limit, +12 Hit with cart skills.
  • [Lv 4] : +2000 cart weight limit, +16 Hit with cart skills.
  • [Lv 5] : +2500 cart weight limit, +20 Hit with cart skills.
Change Material Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 5
 Transform a handful of items into different items with a chance.


List of items and chances.

Special Pharmacy Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 12
 Allows you to create more advanced potions and items.



  • [Lv 1] : 600 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 2] : 580 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 3] : 560 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 4] : 540 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 5] : 520 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 6] : 500 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 7] : 480 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 8] : 460 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv 9] : 440 "Specific Value".
  • [Lv10] : 420 "Specific Value".


  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 400, creates the maximum number of potions allowed.
  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 300, creates 3 potions below the maximum allowed.
  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 100, creates 4 potions below the maximum allowed.
  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 1, creates 5 potions below the maximum allowed.
  • If Creation < Difficulty, creates 6 potions below the maximum allowed.


  • "Item Rates" are unknown.
  • Level 10 produces 12, 9, 8, 7 or 6 items depending on the brewer's stats.


Creation = INT + (DEX ÷ 2) + LUK + Job_Level + Random[30, 150] + (Base_Level − 100) + (Potion_Research_Level × 5) + (Full_Chemical_Protection_Level × Random[4, 10])


Difficulty = Specific_Value + Item_Rate

Cart Tornado Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 0.0s:0.5s:1.0s:1.5s:2.0s
  • Requires a push cart
 Swing your cart in a 5x5 area of effect.


  • Damage is increased based on the weight in your cart, Base STR, and Cart Remodeling skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 1600% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 1800% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 2000% ATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage + (Cart_Remodeling_Level × 50) + {Curr_Cart_Weight ÷ (150 − Base_STR)}]%

Cart Cannon Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40:42:46:48:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.5s:2.0s:2.5s:3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 7:8:9:10:11
  • Requires a push cart
  • Required ammo type: Cannonballs
  • Required ammo amount: 1
 Shoot a cannonball from your cart at a target to damage them and all nearby enemies.


  • Damage from this skill is forced to the element of the cannonball equipped.
  • Damage is increased based on INT, Base Level and Cart Remodeling.
  • This skill treats Hard DEF as Soft DEF.


  • [Lv 1] : 250 + (20 x Cart Remodeling skill level)% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 500 + (40 x Cart Remodeling skill level)% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 750 + (60 x Cart Remodeling skill level)% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1000 + (80 x Cart Remodeling skill level)% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 1250 + (100 x Cart Remodeling skill level)% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (ATK) = [Base_Damage + {Int * 2 / (6 - Cart Remodeling skill level)}]%

Cart Boost Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20:24:28:32:36
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Requires a push cart

Thorn Trap Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 22:26:30:34:38
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Seed Of Thorny Plant
 Place a Thorn trap on the ground that traps any enemy that steps on it.

Targets trapped in a Thorn trap will take a small amount of damage every second.

If a target trapped is hit by a fire property skill, they are released immediately.


  • You can have up to 3 Thorn traps at the same time.


  • [Lv 1] : duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : duration 14 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : duration 18 seconds.
Blood Sucker Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30:35:40:45:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: ??
  • Consumes 5  Bloodsucker Plant Seed
 Attach a  Bloodsucker Plant Seed to the player or a party member, the seed will drain HP from the enemy while attacking with physical damage and restore HP to the caster.


  • [Lv 1] : 1% chance to trigger, 1% leech, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 3% chance to trigger, 2% leech, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 5% chance to trigger, 3% leech, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 7% chance to trigger, 4% leech, Duration 220 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 9% chance to trigger, 5% leech, Duration 280 seconds.
Spore Explosion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 55:60:65:70:75
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 11
  • Consumes 1  Bomb Mushroom Spore
 Deals AoE damage to all nearby enemies and increases any future ranged damage by 10%(5% against boss monsters) for 5 seconds.


  • Damage is based on the caster's Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1000% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 1400% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 1600% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 1800% ATK, 9x9 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 2000% ATK, 9x9 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 2200% ATK, 11x11 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : 2400% ATK, 11x11 Area of effect.


Mixed Cooking Support
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 5:40
 Allows you to create exclusive foods.


  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 30, 10~12 dishes are prepared.
  • If Creation > Difficulty by at least 10, 10 dishes are prepared.
  • If Creation < Difficulty by exactly 10, 8 dishes are prepared.
  • If Creation < Difficulty by at least 30, 5 dishes are prepared.
  • If Creation < Difficulty by at least 50, the cooking fails.

Item Rates are unknown.


  • [Lv 1] : Let's you create 1 food at a time.
  • [Lv 2] : Let's you create 10 foods at at time.


Creation amount is based on this formula;
Creation = (Job_Lv ÷ 4) + (DEX ÷ 3) + (LUK ÷ 2) Difficulty = Random(30, 150) + Item_Rate

Illusion Doping Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy

Wall of Thorn Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 40:50:60:70:80
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 11
  • Consumes 1  Seed Of Thorny Plant
 Create a wall of thorns around a target that protects it. The wall can be attacked and destroyed.

Whenever an enemy touches the wall, they are damaged and knocked back.

If the thorn wall is hit with a Fire property attack, it transforms into a firewall.


  • [Lv 1] : 110% ATK, 4000 HP, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% ATK, 6000 HP, Duration 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 130% ATK, 8000 HP, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 140% ATK, 10000 HP, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 150% ATK, 12000 HP, Duration 14 seconds.
Demonic Fire Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 24:28:32:36:40
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:3.5s:4.0s:4.5s:5.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Bottle Grenade
 Throw a molotov cocktail and light an area of the ground on fire.

Enemies that walk in the area will take magical Fire property damage and have a chance to gain the Burning status.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% MATK, 8% Chance to apply Burning, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 150% MATK, 12% Chance to apply Burning, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 170% MATK, 16% Chance to apply Burning, Duration 14 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 190% MATK, 20% Chance to apply Burning, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 210% MATK, 24% Chance to apply Burning, Duration 18 seconds.
Hell's Plant Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40:45:50:55:60
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:3.5s:4.0s:4.5s:5.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Consumes 1  Plant Bottle
 Attach a hellish plant to yourself that deals damage to all nearby enemies every 0.3 seconds.


  • This skill deals melee physical damage.
  • This skills damage increases depending on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 180 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = [{(Skill_Level x Base_Level) x 10} + {(INT x 7) ÷ 2} x {18 + (JobLevel ÷ 4 )}] x [5 ÷ (10 − Summon_Flora_Level)]

Crazy Weed Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 24:28:32:36:40:44:48:52:56:60
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:3.5s:4.0s:4.5s:5.0s:5.5s:6.0s:6.5s:7.0s:7.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 12
  • Consumes 1  Seed Of Thorny Plant
 Cause many vines to surge from the ground dealing your weapon's property damage to enemies in the area.

This skill also removes ground effects.


  • This skill deals long ranged physical damage.
  • This skills damage is increased depending on the caster's Base Level.
  • The vines surge up in 5x5 area of effects randomly in the larger area of the skill, potentially missing some areas inside.
  • Targets inside the area can be hit by multiple vines.


  • [Lv 1] : 800% ATK, 5 Vines.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% ATK, 6 Vines.
  • [Lv 3] : 1000% ATK, 6 Vines.
  • [Lv 4] : 1100% ATK, 7 Vines.
  • [Lv 5] : 1200% ATK, 7 Vines.
  • [Lv 6] : 1300% ATK, 8 Vines.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK, 8 Vines.
  • [Lv 8] : 1500% ATK, 9 Vines.
  • [Lv 9] : 1600% ATK, 9 Vines.
  • [Lv10] : 1700% ATK, 10 Vines.
Fire Expansion Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 30:35:40:45:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Throw various items at Demonic Fire, to create different effects.


  • [Lv 1] : Throw  Oil Bottle into the fire.
    • Adds [INT + Job_Lv]% MATK to the fire, +10 seconds duration.
  • [Lv 2] : Throw  Explosive Powder into the fire.
    • Inflicts [INT × 10]% Fire property damage, ends fire instantly.
  • [Lv 3] : Throw  Smoke Powder into the fire.
    • -50% Ranged damage, -15% Melee damage, +20% Flee rate, [(Demonic_Fire_Lv + 1) × 4] second duration.
  • [Lv 4] : Throw  Tear Gas into the fire.
    • -50% Flee, -50% Hit, -5% Max HP every 2 seconds, Force targets to use /cry, [(Demonic_Fire_Lv + 1) × 5] second duration.
  • [Lv 5] : Throw  Acid Bottle into the fire.
    • Becomes the highest level learned of Acid Demonstration, ends fire instantly.
Howling of Mandragora Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40:45:50:55:60
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
  • Consumes 1  Mandragora Flowerpot
 Pulls a live Mandragora from the ground, it lets off a terrifying roar around the caster, leaving enemies in the Howling status.


  • Howling status effect reduces INT, drains SP and extends their Fixed Casting Time of all skills.


  • [Lv 1] : 35% Chance to apply status, -4 INT, 30% SP drain, +0.5 seconds of Fixed Cast Time, 11x11 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 45% Chance to apply status, -8 INT, 35% SP drain, +1.0 seconds of Fixed Cast Time, 13x13 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 55% Chance to apply status, -12 INT, 40% SP drain, +1.5 seconds of Fixed Cast Time, 13x13 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 65% Chance to apply status, -16 INT, 45% SP drain, +2.0 seconds of Fixed Cast Time, 15x15 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 75% Chance to apply status, -20 INT, 50% SP drain, +2.5 seconds of Fixed Cast Time, 15x15 Area of effect.


Chance of effect is based on this formula;
Chance of Effect = [Base_Chance_of_Effect − (Target_VIT + Target_LUK) ÷ 5]%


Taekwon Branch

Taekwon Kid

Skill Type Properties Description
Sprint Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100 ~ 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s ~ 0.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s ~ 0.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.3s
  • Requires being able to move
 Run in a straight line at incredible speed. Using this skill again will cause you to stop.

If the skill level is 7 or higher and you have no weapon equipped, if you stop the run before hitting an object, gain Spurt status for 150 seconds which grants STR +10.

Passively increases your ATK when you have no weapon equipped.


  • [Lv 1] : +10 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 2] : +20 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 3] : +30 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 4] : +40 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 5] : +50 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 6] : +60 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 7] : +70 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 8] : +80 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv 9] : +90 ATK when unarmed.
  • [Lv10] : +100 ATK when unarmed.
Tornado Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 14:12:10:8:6:4:2
 Can only be used when Tornado Stance triggers. Strike all enemies in a 5x5 around you for physical damage.


  • [Lv 1] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 300% ATK.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Heel Drop Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 14:12:10:8:6:4:2
 Can only be used when Heel Drop Stance triggers. Strike the currently targeted enemy for physical damage and inflict Stun on them for 3 seconds.


  • [Lv 1] : 180% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 260% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 300% ATK.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Roundhouse Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 14:12:10:8:6:4:2
 Can only be used when Roundhouse Stance triggers. Strike the currently targeted enemy for physical damage. In addition, knock back and stun all enemies within a 3x3 area of the kicked enemy.


  • [Lv 1] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 310% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 340% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 370% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 400% ATK.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Counter Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 14 ~ 2
 Can only be used when Counter Stance triggers. Strike the currently targeted enemy for ATK physical damage at a 100% Hit rate.


  • [Lv 1] : 220% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 280% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 310% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 340% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 370% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 400% ATK.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Flying Kick Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Ally, Enemy
  • SP Cost: 70 ~ 10
  • Range: 9
 Instantly close the gap between you and the target. If the target is an enemy, deal physical damage and remove any TaeKwon-related buffs on the target (Soul Links, any buffs from Soul Link granted skills, Berserk Potions, Ka- type skills), unless the target can not be dispelled.


  • If Tumbling is active, increase the damage based on the user's base level.
  • If Running is active, increase the damage based on the user's base level.
  • If both Running and Spurt statuses are active, Flying Kick deals enhanced damage.


  • [Lv 1] : 40% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 60% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 70% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 80% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 90% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 100% ATK.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Tornado Stance Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
 When active, every normal attack has a 15% chance to trigger Tornado Stance, which allows you to use Tornado Kick.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Heel Drop Stance Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
 When active, every normal attack has a 15% chance to trigger Heel Drop Stance, which allows you to use Heel Drop Kick.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Roundhouse Stance Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
 When active, every normal attack has a 15% chance to trigger Roundhouse Stance, which allows you to use Roundhouse Kick.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Counter Kick Stance Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
 When active, every normal attack has a 20% chance to trigger Counter Kick Stance, which allows you to use Counter Kick.


Soul Linker classes cannot use this skill.

Tumbling Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 1
 When you are attacked by ranged physical, magical or area attacks, avoid damage at a 20% chance.

If you are under Spurt status, Tumbling can avoid damage from melee attacks as well.

Peaceful Break Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase HP recovery when seated next to another TaeKwon type class.


  • VIT will increase the recovery amount.
  • Using /doridori will further increase HP recovery by 30.


  • [Lv 1] : +30 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 2] : +60 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 3] : +90 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 4] : +120 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 5] : +150 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 6] : +180 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 7] : +210 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 8] : +240 HP recovery.
  • [Lv 9] : +270 HP recovery.
  • [Lv10] : +300 HP recovery.
Happy Break Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase SP recovery when seated next to another TaeKwon type class.


  • Max SP will affect the recovery amount.
  • Using /doridori will further increase SP recovery by 3 and trigger the Happy Break status for 30 minutes.
  • While under Happy Break, using an  Earth Spike scroll consumes 10 SP and only has a low chance of destroying the scroll.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 SP recovery, 10% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 2] : +6 SP recovery, 9% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 3] : +9 SP recovery, 8% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 4] : +12 SP recovery, 7% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 5] : +15 SP recovery, 6% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 6] : +18 SP recovery, 5% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 7] : +21 SP recovery, 4% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 8] : +24 SP recovery, 3% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv 9] : +27 SP recovery, 2% Chance to destroy the scroll.
  • [Lv10] : +30 SP recovery, 1% Chance to destroy the scroll.
Kihop Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increases your ATK% per party member in the map for normal attacks.


  • [Lv 1] : +2% ATK per party member.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% ATK per party member.
  • [Lv 3] : +6% ATK per party member.
  • [Lv 4] : +8% ATK per party member.
  • [Lv 5] : +10% ATK per party member.
High Jump Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.5s ~ 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.5s ~ 0.5s
  • Cast cannot be interrupted
 Leap over all obstacles and move to an empty cell far away.


  • This skill does not work in any map where Teleport and Fly Wings are disabled, except for WoE1 castles and PVP rooms.
  • If a character knows High Jump, the casting time of Emergency Call is doubled.


  • [Lv 1] : Jump 2 cells away.
  • [Lv 2] : Jump 4 cells away.
  • [Lv 3] : Jump 6 cells away.
  • [Lv 4] : Jump 8 cells away.
  • [Lv 5] : Jump 10 cells away.
Warm Wind Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
 Endow yourself with an elemental property chosen by skill level.

Duration 300 seconds.


  • Unlike other endow sources, the entirety of your ATK is endowed, status ATK included.
  • This skill will also endow the Es- skills of the Soul Linker skill tree.


  • [Lv 1] : Endow with Earth property, 20 SP.
  • [Lv 2] : Endow with Wind property, 20 SP.
  • [Lv 3] : Endow with Water property, 20 SP.
  • [Lv 4] : Endow with Fire property, 20 SP.
  • [Lv 5] : Endow with Ghost property, 50 SP.
  • [Lv 6] : Endow with Dark property, 50 SP.
  • [Lv 7] : Endow with Holy property, 50 SP.
Taekwon Mission Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast cannot be interrupted
 This skill cannot be used after changing classes.

Displays the current target monster for the Taekwon Mission, or starts a new target.

Defeating 100 of the target monster rewards 1 Taekwon Mission point.


The top 10 Taekwons ranked are able to combo their Tornado Kick, Heel Drop, Roundhouse Kick and Counter Kick skills together endlessly.

Upon reaching Lv90, a top 10 ranked Taekwon will have their MaxHP and MaxSP tripled, and all Taekwon skills are unlocked.


  • If the current mission is at 0% completion, casting this skill again may change the target at a very low chance.
  • The target monster will never be a miniboss or MvP.
  • You can type /Taekwon to find the rankings, rankings will decay slightly after every month.


Star Gladiator

Skill Type Properties Description
Solar, Lunar and Stellar Perception Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
 Designate the current map with one of the cosmic alignments, Solar, Lunar or Stellar, for the use of certain skills.


  • It is impossible to change a map's cosmic alignment once it is designated.
  • Using this skill on a cosmically aligned map will display a list of map designations.

Only 1 map may be designated for each cosmic alignment.


  • [Lv 1] Designate current map with Solar alignment
  • [Lv 2] Designate current map with Lunar alignment
  • [Lv 3] Designate current map with Stellar alignment
Solar, Lunar and Stellar Opposition Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Fixed Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Range: 9
 Designate the targeted monster with one of the cosmic alignments, Solar, Lunar or Stellar, for the use of certain skills.


  • It is impossible to change a monster's cosmic alignment once it is designated.
  • Using this skill on a cosmically aligned monster will display a list of monster designations.
  • On players, character jobs can be designated without regarding size and Max HP.

Only 1 monster can be designated for each cosmic alignment.


  • [Lv 1] Designate monster with Solar alignment.

Limited to Small sized monsters.

  • [Lv 2] Designate monster with Lunar alignment.

Limited to Medium sized monsters with Max HP of 6,000 or more.

  • [Lv 3] Designate monster with Stellar alignment.

Limited to Large sized monsters with Max HP of 20,000 or more.

Solar, Lunar and Stellar Shadow Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increasing this skills level will permanently increase Attack Speed and reduce character's vision, similarly to the Blind effect.


  • This skill's effects will only activate for Job Level 50 characters.
  • You can get rid of the blind effect for this skill with Star Emperor's Purification of the Sun, Moon and Stars.


  • [Lv 1] +2% ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] +3% ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] +4% ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] +5% ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] +6% ASPD.
  • [Lv 6] +7% ASPD.
  • [Lv 7] +8% ASPD.
  • [Lv 8] +9% ASPD.
  • [Lv 9] +10% ASPD.
  • [Lv10] +11% ASPD.
Solar, Lunar and Stellar Team-Up Passive
  • Max Level: 3
 This skill can only target a Monk class party member.

Increase the Monk class character's chance of casting Raging Trifecta Blow when using Counter Kick, while Monk's Raging Thrust will increase the Taekwon Master's chance of casting Counter Kick .


  • [Lv 1] +100% Chance.
  • [Lv 2] +150% Chance.
  • [Lv 3] +200% Chance.
Solar, Lunar and Stellar Courier Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase Maximum Weight Limit when in Solar, Lunar and Stellar areas. The effect of this skill is canceled when its user leaves the Solar, Lunar or Stellar designated area.


  • [Lv 1] +10% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 2] +20% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 3] +30% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 4] +40% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 5] +50% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 6] +60% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 7] +70% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 8] +80% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 9] +90% Maximum Weight limit.
  • [Lv 10] +100% Maximum Weight limit.
Solar Heat Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
 This skill is only enabled in Solar areas.

Inflict damage to nearby enemies and knock them back, drain 2 SP each time this effect occurs.


  • On other players, this skill will only have the push back effect and will still drain the 2 SP.


  • [Lv 1] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 10 seconds..
  • [Lv 2] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
Lunar Heat Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
 This skill is only enabled in Lunar areas.

Inflict damage to nearby enemies and knock them back, drain 2 SP each time this effect occurs.


  • On other players, this skill will only have the push back effect and will still drain the 2 SP.


  • [Lv 1] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 10 seconds..
  • [Lv 2] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
Stellar Heat Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 This skill is only enabled in Stellar areas.

Inflict damage to nearby enemies and knock them back, drain 2 SP each time this effect occurs.


  • On other players, this skill will only have the push back effect and will still drain the 2 SP.


  • [Lv 1] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 10 seconds..
  • [Lv 2] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
Solar Protection Support
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70:60:50:40
 This skill is only enabled on Solar (even numbered) days in a Solar aligned map.

Increases your soft DEF for the duration.


  • [Lv 1] Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] Duration 320 seconds.


Soft defense bonus is calculated using this formula;
Soft DEF Boost = (Base_Level + DEX + LUK) ÷ 2

Lunar Protection Support
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70:60:50:40
 This skill is only enabled on Lunar (odd numbered) days in a Lunar aligned map.

Increases your Flee for the duration.


  • [Lv 1] Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] Duration 320 seconds.


Soft defense bonus is calculated using this formula;
[(Base_Level + DEX + LUK) ÷ 10]%

Stellar Protection Support
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70:60:50:40
 This skill is only enabled on Stellar (multiple of five) days in a Stellar aligned map.

Increases your ASPD for the duration.


  • [Lv 1] Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] Duration 240 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] Duration 320 seconds.


Soft defense bonus is calculated using this formula;
[(Base_Level + DEX + LUK) ÷ 10]%

Solar Wrath Passive
  • Max Level: 3
 Increase Attack Power against Solar aligned monsters.


  • Your Base Level, LUK, DEX and skill level affects this damage increase.


  • [Lv 1] : [Base Bonus ÷ 9]%
  • [Lv 2] : [Base Bonus ÷ 6]%
  • [Lv 3] : [Base Bonus ÷ 3]%


ATK increase is based on this formula;
Base Bonus = Base_Level + LUK + DEX

Lunar Wrath Passive
  • Max Level: 3
 Increase Attack Power against Lunar aligned monsters.


  • Your Base Level, LUK, DEX and skill level affects this damage increase.


  • [Lv 1] : [Base Bonus ÷ 9]%
  • [Lv 2] : [Base Bonus ÷ 6]%
  • [Lv 3] : [Base Bonus ÷ 3]%


ATK increase is based on this formula;
Base Bonus = Base_Level + LUK + DEX

  • Max Level: 3
 Increase Attack Power against Stellar aligned monsters.


  • Your Base Level, LUK, DEX and skill level affects this damage increase.


  • [Lv 1] : [Base Bonus ÷ 9]%
  • [Lv 2] : [Base Bonus ÷ 6]%
  • [Lv 3] : [Base Bonus ÷ 3]%


ATK increase is based on this formula;
Base Bonus = Base_Level + LUK + DEX

Solar Blessing Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increase the EXP reward from defeating Solar aligned monsters on Solar (even numbered) days.


  • [Lv 1] +10% EXP
  • [Lv 2] +20% EXP
  • [Lv 3] +30% EXP
  • [Lv 4] +40% EXP
  • [Lv 5] +50% EXP
Lunar Blessing Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increase the EXP reward from defeating Lunar aligned monsters on Lunar (odd numbered) days.


  • [Lv 1] +10% EXP
  • [Lv 2] +20% EXP
  • [Lv 3] +30% EXP
  • [Lv 4] +40% EXP
  • [Lv 5] +50% EXP
Stellar Blessing Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Increase the EXP reward from defeating Stellar aligned monsters on Stellar (multiple of five) days.


  • [Lv 1] +20% EXP
  • [Lv 2] +40% EXP
  • [Lv 3] +60% EXP
  • [Lv 4] +80% EXP
  • [Lv 5] +100% EXP
Solar, Lunar and Stellar Union Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
 Awaken the caster's hidden potential for 10 minutes while in a spirit status, endowing the caster with attacks that have 100% Accuracy and will ignore enemy's Defense, and increased Movement Speed.

However, 2% of caster's HP will be drained with each attack on monsters and 8% will be drained with each attack on other players.

In this status, attacking when the caster's remaining HP is less that 20% of Max HP will instantly kill the caster.


Star Emperor

Skill Type Properties Description
Document of the Sun, Moon and Stars Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 60
  • Cool Down: 60sec
 Allows you to reset Feeling and Hatred skills.


  • [Lv 1] Reset the maps chosen by Feeling the Sun Moon and Stars.
  • [Lv 2] Reset the monsters chosen by Hatred of the Sun Moon and Stars.
  • [Lv 3] Reset both maps and monsters chosen by the above skills.
Purification of the Sun, Moon and Stars Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Remove the vision penalty of Demon of the Sun Moon and Stars.


  • On NovaRO, this skill completely removes the vision penalty instead of reducing it by half.
Stance of the Sun Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Prepares your stance to operate with the sunlight.

You can use the Sun skills while this skill is activated, and additionally increases ATK%.


  • Only one Stance skill can be active at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : +3% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +5% ATK.
Stance of the Moon Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Prepares your stance to operate with the moonlight.

You can use the Moon skills while this skill is activated, and additionally increases Max HP.


  • Only one Stance skill can be active at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : +3% Max HP.
  • [Lv 2] : +4% Max HP.
  • [Lv 3] : +5% Max HP.
Stance of the Stars Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Prepares your stance to operate with the starlight.

You can use the Star skills while this skill is activated, and additionally increases attack speed.


  • Only one Stance skill can be active at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : +6% ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : +8% ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : +10% ASPD.
Prominence Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 1
 Sun-line skill only.

Kick the target and surrounding enemies with a red flame, dealing 100% additional Fire property damage.


  • Solar Burst can be used after using Prominence Kick.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 350% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 400% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 450% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 500% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
New Moon Kick Damage / Special
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 ~ 50
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0sec
  • Cool Down: 1.0sec
 Moon-line skill only.

Strike all enemies around you and enter a New Moon state.


While under New Moon state, gain 15 seconds of invisibility while still being able to move. You will not be detectable by Demon/Insect race monsters, and you can maintain [New Moon] state for up to 7 hits. However, when a detection skill is used, you will be revealed immediately.


  • [Lv 1] : 700% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 900% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1100% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 1200% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 1300% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
Flashing Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 45 ~ 15
  • Range: 1
 Star-line skill only.

Endows the starlight on your feet and kicks the enemy, marking the target with a Stellar Mark.


  • Up to 5 Stellar Marks can be marked at the same time.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 100% ATK, Stellar mark lasts 10 seconds.
Solar Burst Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 34 ~ 61
  • Cast Delay: 0.5 sec
 Sun-line skill only.

Deal physical melee damage to all enemies in a 7x7 around you.


  • Can only be used immediately after Prominence Kick.
  • Damage is increased depending on casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1220% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1440% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1660% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1880% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 2100% ATK.

  • [Lv 7] : 2540% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 2760% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 2980% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 3200% ATK.
Full Moon Kick Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20 ~ 75
  • Cool Down: 1.0 sec
 Moon-line skill only.

Immediately reveal yourself and deal damage to all enemies in a 7x7 Area of effect, also has the chance to apply Blind status to enemies.


  • New Moon status must be active to use this skill.
  • Damage is increased depending on casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% ATK, 20% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 2] : 1300% ATK, 25% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 3] : 1400% ATK, 30% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 4] : 1500% ATK, 35% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 5] : 1600% ATK, 40% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 6] : 1700% ATK, 45% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 7] : 1800% ATK, 50% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 8] : 1900% ATK, 55% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv 9] : 2000% ATK, 60% Chance to apply Blind status.
  • [Lv10] : 2100% ATK, 65% Chance to apply Blind status.
Falling Star Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 ~ 85
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0 sec
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0 sec
 Star-line skill only.

Grant yourself a buff that has a chance to drop stars on Star Token engraved targets whenever you auto attack them.

Stars damage the target and enemies in a 5x5 area of effect.


  • Damage is increased depending on casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 500% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 700% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 800% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 1100% ATK.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40
 Sun-line skill only.

  • "Light of _" skills cannot overlap with each other.

Stance of the Universe Support / Toggle
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Take a stance to allow usage of universe skills. You can also use sun, moon and star skills. Also increase all your stats.


  • Only one Stance skill can be active at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 All stats.
  • [Lv 2] : +4 All stats.
  • [Lv 3] : +5 All stats.
Nova Explosion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 60:65:70:75:80
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0 sec
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0 sec
  • Cool Down: 20 sec
  • Cast Delay: 1.0 sec
  • Range: 3
 Universe-line skill only.

Deal Neutral property melee physical damage that can not be reduced by any effect.


  • Can only be used in PVP and Siege areas.
  • You will be unable to use any skills for 2 seconds after casting this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 700% ATK.


BonusValue is a flat bonus to this skills damage;
BonusValue = MaxHP ÷ (6 - SkillLevel) + (MaxSP × (2 × SkillLevel))

Gravity Control Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 80
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0 sec
  • Cool Down: 20 sec
  • Cast Delay: 0.5 sec
  • Range: 9
 Universe-line skill only.

Cause a target to float helplessly in the air for 5 seconds. While floating, the target can not move or use skills (but they can use items and change equipment), and they cannot be hit by most attacks.

When the duration ends, deal Neutral property fall damage altered by the casters ATK and the target's current weight. If Gravity Control is used on a floating target, the status ends safely.

  • Can only be used in PVP and Siege areas.
Advent of the Star Emperor Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70 ~ 90
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0 sec
  • Cool Down: 10 sec
  • After Skill Delay: 1.0 sec
 Universe-line skill only.

Deal physical melee damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area of effect, also silence all enemies for 7 seconds.


  • Can only be used in PVP and Siege areas.


  • [Lv 1] : 1000% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1400% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1600% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1800% ATK.
Book of Star Creation Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 ~ 70
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1 sec
  • Var. Cast Time: 2 sec
  • Cool Down: 15 sec
  • Cast Delay: 0.5 sec
  • Range: 7
 Universe-line skill only.

Create a 5x5 area star that attacks all nearby enemies for ranged damage every 0.5 seconds.

Enemies in the star's area will have their movement speed reduced by 10%.


  • Can only be used in PVP and Siege areas.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 100% ATK, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 100% ATK, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 100% ATK, Duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% ATK, Duration 10 seconds.
Book of Dimensions Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Cool Down: 150 sec ~ 30 sec
 Universe-line skill only.

Grant yourself a buff that lasts for 60 seconds. While the buff is active, if you use either one of the following skills, end the buff and gain the corresponding effect:

  • Nova Explosion: For 5 seconds, remove the skill cool down and the skill usage penalty of Nova Explosion.
  • Advent of the Star Emperor: Gain 2 defensive spheres that last for 30 seconds and have a durability equal to your Max SP. All damage received is blocked by the spheres until their durability reaches 0, and excess damage from one attack will not carry over.


  • Can only be used in PVP and Siege areas.


Soul Linker

Skill Type Properties Description
Alchemist Spirit Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 460 ~ 60
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a soul link to an Alchemist type class.


Increase the power of Potion Pitcher by a percentage equal to the target's Base Level.


Also unlock the skill Berserk Pitcher.


And if the target has mastered Pharmacy, unlock the skills

  • Twilight Pharmacy 1.
  • Twilight Pharmacy 2.
  • Twilight Pharmacy 3.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 300 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 350 seconds.

  • Max Level: 5

  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9

  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.

Bard and Dancer Spirits Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 460 ~ 60
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a soul link to a Bard or Dancer type class.


Song and dance skills will now affect the performer as well, and movement speed during a performance is increased.


In addition, if the target knows the corresponding skill, grant the performance skills of the opposite gender at the same skill level:

  • Whistling and Humming
  • Assassin Cross of Sunset and Please Don't Forget Me
  • A Poem of Bragi and Fortune's Kiss
  • The Apple of Idun and Service for You


Soul link granted performance skills will cost 50% more SP to use.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 300 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 350 seconds.
Assassin Spirit Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 460 ~ 60
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a soul link to an Assassin type class.


Double the damage and SP cost of Sonic Blow and reduce it's cast delay by half.


  • Damage of Sonic Blow is only increased by 25% in War of Emperium.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 300 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 350 seconds.
Super Novice Spirit Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 460 ~ 60
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a soul link to a Super Novice type class.


If the target's Base Level is 90 or higher, allow the Supernovice to equip any headgear in the game.

If the target's Base Level is 96 or higher, allow the Supernovice to equip any level 4 One-Handed Staff, One-Handed Sword, One-Handed Axe, Dagger or Mace type weapon.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 300 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 350 seconds.

Wizard Spirit Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 460 ~ 60
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a soul link to a Wizard type class.


While soul linked, do not consume gemstones when using skills that require them, but increase their SP cost and Variable Casting Time by 50%.

Additionally, if magic is reflected against a soul linked Wizard by Kaite, damage can be negated by consuming a  Crystal Fragment.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 250 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 300 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 350 seconds.

Kaina Passive
  • Max Level: 7
 Increase the effectiveness of Happy Break and your Max SP.

This skill also reduces the SP cost of Estin, Estun, and Esma, based on Base Level.


SP reduction rates;

  • Base Level 70 or higher, -3% SP consumption per Kaina skill level.
  • Base Level 80 or higher, -5% SP consumption per Kaina skill level.
  • Base Level 90 or higher, -7% SP consumption per Kaina skill level.


  • [Lv 1] : +40% Effectiveness, +30 Max SP.
  • [Lv 2] : +50% Effectiveness, +60 Max SP.
  • [Lv 3] : +60% Effectiveness, +90 Max SP.
  • [Lv 4] : +70% Effectiveness, +120 Max SP.
  • [Lv 5] : +80% Effectiveness, +150 Max SP.
  • [Lv 6] : +90% Effectiveness, +180 Max SP.
  • [Lv 7] : +100% Effectiveness, +210 Max SP.
Kaizel Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 120~60
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.6s ~ 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.9s ~ 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Grant the target a buff that lasts for 30 minutes. While Kaizel status is active on a target, instantly resurrect them upon death, restoring a portion of their Max HP and grant them Kyrie Eleison status for 2 seconds.


  • Kaizel status is removed after the automatic resurrection.
  • Ka- active skills can only target yourself, family members or other Soul Linker type classes.


  • [Lv 1] : Restores 10% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 2] : Restores 20% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 3] : Restores 30% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 4] : Restores 40% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 5] : Restores 50% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 6] : Restores 60% HP on resurrection.
  • [Lv 7] : Restores 70% HP on resurrection.
Kaahi Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Range: 9
 Grant the target a buff that lasts for 350 seconds. While Kaahi status is active on a target, every time they are attacked by non-skill attacks, they restore some of their HP at the cost of some of their SP.


  • This effect does not trigger when HP is full.
  • Ka- active skills can only target yourself, family members or other Soul Linker type classes.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore 200 HP and consume 5 SP.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore 400 HP and consume 10 SP.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore 600 HP and consume 15 SP.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore 800 HP and consume 20 SP.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore 1000 HP and consume 25 SP.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore 1200 HP and consume 30 SP.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore 1400 HP and consume 35 SP.
Kaupe Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 20 ~ 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.1s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a 10 minute buff that gives a chance to dodge any physical attack.


  • When one attack is dodged, the effect ends.
  • Ka- active skills can only target yourself, family members or other Soul Linker type classes.


  • [Lv 1] : 33% Chance to dodge.
  • [Lv 2] : 66% Chance to dodge.
  • [Lv 3] : 100% Chance to dodge.
Kaite Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 70
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.8s ~ 2.4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.2s ~ 0.6s
  • Range: 9
 Grant a buff which will reflect magic spells back at the source, except for ground targeted magic spells. While Kaite is active, physical attacks received will deal 400% more damage.

When Kaite is granted to normally ineligible targets via Spirit of the Soul Linker, the chance of reflects occurring is reduced by 50%.


  • Healing magic reflected will not heal the source.
  • Ka- active skills can only target yourself, family members or other Soul Linker type classes.
  • High level monsters and boss type enemies cannot have their magic reflected, but players can have magic reflected regardless of level.
  • Does not stack with Assumptio.


  • [Lv 1] : Reflect 1 attack, Duration 1 minute.
  • [Lv 2] : Reflect 1 attack, Duration 2 minute.
  • [Lv 3] : Reflect 1 attack, Duration 3 minute.
  • [Lv 4] : Reflect 1 attack, Duration 4 minute.
  • [Lv 5] : Reflect 2 attack, Duration 5 minute.
  • [Lv 6] : Reflect 2 attack, Duration 6 minute.
  • [Lv 7] : Reflect 2 attack, Duration 10 minute.
Eska Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 100 ~ 60
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.4s ~ 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.6s ~ 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Target monster gains a state similar to Steel Body, where DEF and MDEF are increased but ASPD and movement speed are decreased.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 30 seconds.
Estin Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 18 ~ 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.08s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.02s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Deal magical damage to a Small size monster and knock them back 2 cells.

Damage is not applied to medium and large monsters, and only knock back occurs.


If [Lv 7] Estin is used, there is a 3 second window to cast Esma .


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 10% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 20% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 30% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 40% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 50% MATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 60% MATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 70% MATK.

  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 18 ~ 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.08s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.02s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Deal magical damage to a Medium size monster and Stun them for 2 seconds.

Stun does not occur for Small and Large size mobs.


If [Lv 7] Estun is used, there is a 3 second window to cast Esma .


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.

Eswoo Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 75 ~ 15
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Shrink the size of the target monster for and drastically lower their movement speed.

If Eswoo is cast on a target currently under the effects of Eswoo, the caster is stunned and Eswoo status on the target ends immediately.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Boss monsters only suffer 20% of the normal duration.
  • [Lv 1] : Duration 1 second.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 2 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 3 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Duration 7 seconds.
Eske Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 45 ~ 15
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.4s ~ 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.6s ~ 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Multiply the target monster's ATK by 4 and reduce their DEF by half.

After casting, there is a 3 second window to cast Esma.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 20 seconds.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 8 ~ 80
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Deal multiple hits of (BaseLevel + 40)% MATK per hit to a single target.


  • This skill can only be cast in the after-cast window of other specific Es- skills.
  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.

  • [Lv 9] : Hit 9 times.
  • [Lv10] : Hit 10 times.

  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
 When active, continuously gain Soul Energy.


  • [Lv 1] : Gain 1 Soul Energy every 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Gain 1 Soul Energy every 50 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Gain 1 Soul Energy every 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Gain 1 Soul Energy every 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Gain 1 Soul Energy every 20 seconds.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 42:44:46:48:50
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Cool Down: 90s ~ 210s
 Grant yourself a buff that whenever you deal damage to an enemy, you have a chance to gain 1 Soul Energy.

  • [Lv 2] : 20% Chance to gain 1 Soul Energy, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 25% Chance to gain 1 Soul Energy, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 30% Chance to gain 1 Soul Energy, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 35% Chance to gain 1 Soul Energy, Duration 210 seconds.

  • Max Level: 5
 Your maximum available Soul Energy is raised.

  • [Lv 2] : 11 Maximum Soul Energy.
  • [Lv 3] : 14 Maximum Soul Energy.

Esha Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 18:20:22:24:26
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Consume 1 Soul Energy.

Deal magical damage to a target and the area surrounding them. Halve the movement speed of all enemies hit for a few seconds.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.
  • After casting, there is a 5 second window to cast Esma.


  • [Lv 1] : 5% MATK, 3 seconds of half movement speed, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 10% MATK, 4 seconds of half movement speed, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 15% MATK, 5 seconds of half movement speed, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 20% MATK, 6 seconds of half movement speed, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 25% MATK, 7 seconds of half movement speed, 5x5 Area of effect.
Espa Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 52:56:50:64:68
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Consume 1 Soul Energy.

Deal magical damage to a target.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Damage is increased by base level.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.
  • After casting, there is a 5 second window to cast Eswhoo.


  • [Lv 1] : 750% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1000% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1250% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1500% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 1750% MATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 2000% MATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 2250% MATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 2500% MATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 2750% MATK.
  • [Lv 10] : 3000% MATK, no soul consumed.
Eswhoo Damage
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 66:70:74:78:82:86:90
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Consume 2 Soul Energy.

Deal magical damage to a target and all enemies in the area surrounding them.


  • Es- skills can only target monsters and not enemy players.
  • Damage is increased by base level.
  • Mild Wind affects the property of this skill.
  • After casting, there is a 5 second window to cast Esma.


  • [Lv 1] : 1700% MATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1900% MATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 2100% MATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2300% MATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% MATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 2700% MATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 2900% MATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 3100% MATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 3300% MATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 3500% MATK, 9x9 Area of effect, 1 soul consumed.
Kaute Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 24:30:36:42:48
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 7
 Consume 5 Soul Energy.

Kaute can only target yourself, family members, other Soul Linker type classes, or party members under the effect of Soul Unity. Unlike the Soul Linker Ka- skills, Spirit of the Soul Linker does not allow you to target ineligible targets.


Consume a portion of your Max HP to restore a portion of the targets Max SP.


  • This skill cannot be cast if your current HP is below 30% MaxHP.


  • [Lv 1] : Consume 12% Max HP, Restore 12% Max SP.
  • [Lv 2] : Consume 14% Max HP, Restore 14% Max SP.
  • [Lv 3] : Consume 16% Max HP, Restore 16% Max SP.
  • [Lv 4] : Consume 18% Max HP, Restore 18% Max SP.
  • [Lv 5] : Consume 20% Max HP, Restore 20% Max SP.
Soul Unity Support
  • Max Level: 7
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 44:46:48:50:52:54:56
  • Fixed Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Cool Down: 0s ~ 180s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Consume 10 Soul Energy.

Bind together the souls of all party members in an area around you. Allies under Soul Unity will restore HP every 3 seconds, and it will be possible to cast Kaute on them.


  • Soul Unity remains so long as allies stay within a 23x23 area of the caster.
  • If the caster is silenced or cursed, Soul Unity status is cancelled.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore 150 HP every 3 seconds, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore 300 HP every 3 seconds, 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore 450 HP every 3 seconds, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore 600 HP every 3 seconds, 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore 750 HP every 3 seconds, 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore 900 HP every 3 seconds, 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore 1050 HP every 3 seconds, 9x9 Area of effect, Duration 210 seconds.
Soul Revolve Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 50:100:150
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 On either yourself or an ally, dispel the Soul Link and restore SP to the target.


  • Can only be used on a soul linked target.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore 50 SP to the target.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore 100 SP to the target.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore 150 SP to the target.

Soul Division Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 36:40:44:48:52
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Consumes 1 Soul Energy.

Increase the after skill delay of a target for 5 seconds.


  • Can only be used in PVP areas.


  • [Lv 1] : +10% Skill delay reduction.
  • [Lv 2] : +20% Skill delay reduction.
  • [Lv 3] : +30% Skill delay reduction.
  • [Lv 4] : +40% Skill delay reduction.
  • [Lv 5] : +50% Skill delay reduction.
Soul Explosion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30:60:90:120:150
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 60s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 7
 Consumes 10 Soul Energy.

Explode a soul linked enemy, dispelling their soul link and dealing a portion of their current HP as fixed, non reducible damage.


  • Cannot be used on targets without an active soul link, or targets whose current HP is less than 10.
  • Can only be used in PVP areas.


  • [Lv 1] : 30% Fixed HP.
  • [Lv 2] : 40% Fixed HP.
  • [Lv 3] : 50% Fixed HP.
  • [Lv 4] : 60% Fixed HP.
  • [Lv 5] : 70% Fixed HP.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s

Ninja Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase passive SP restoration.

The SP restored is increased depending on Max SP.


  • [Lv 1] : 3 + (0.2% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 6 + (0.4% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 9 + (0.6% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 12 + (0.8% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 15 + (1.0% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 18 + (1.2% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 21 + (1.4% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 24 + (1.6% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 27 + (1.8% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 30 + (2.0% Max SP) restored every 10 seconds.

  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 12:15:18:21:24
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
 Enable Cicada Skin Shed status, which allows you to automatically dodge a set amount of physical attacks.

When you successfully dodge an attack, you will be knocked back 7 cells.

 Summon a 5x5 area of flames on the ground. Whenever an enemy walks on the enflamed area, they will take multiple strikes of Fire property magic damage.

Blaze Shield lasts for 20 seconds, and each cell is removed separately when it deals the maximum number of hits.

Watery Evasion Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 15:18:21:24:27:30:33:36:39:42
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.6s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes 1  Ice Stone
 Create a watery deluge on the ground that reduces enemy AGI, and decreases their movement speed by 50%.

This water area will increase the damage of Freezing Spear by 2% per skill level of Freezing Spear.

In this area players can use Aqua Benedicta and Water Ball.


  • Ninja class characters are immune to the AGI and movement speed decrease.


  • [Lv 1] : Druation 15 seconds, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : -3 AGI, Druation 20 seconds, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : -3 AGI, Druation 25 seconds, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : -3 AGI, Druation 30 seconds, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : -5 AGI, Druation 35 seconds, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : -5 AGI, Druation 40 seconds, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : -5 AGI, Druation 45 seconds, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : -8 AGI, Druation 50 seconds, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : -8 AGI, Druation 55 seconds, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : -8 AGI, Druation 60 seconds, 9x9 Area of effect.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50
  • Zeny Cost: 500:1000:1500:2000:2500:3000:3500:4000:4500:5000
  • Cast Delay: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 Throw coins at a target to inflict defense piercing damage equal to the amount of zeny thrown.


  • This skills damage is reduced by half against Boss monsters and in PvP/BG/WoE.


  • [Lv 1] : Consumes 500 ~ 1000 zeny.
  • [Lv 2] : Consumes 1000 ~ 2000 zeny.
  • [Lv 3] : Consumes 1500 ~ 3000 zeny.
  • [Lv 4] : Consumes 2000 ~ 4000 zeny.
  • [Lv 5] : Consumes 2500 ~ 5000 zeny.
  • [Lv 6] : Consumes 3000 ~ 6000 zeny.
  • [Lv 7] : Consumes 3500 ~ 7000 zeny.
  • [Lv 8] : Consumes 4000 ~ 8000 zeny.
  • [Lv 9] : Consumes 4500 ~ 9000 zeny.
  • [Lv10] : Consumes 5000 ~ 10000 zeny.
Mirror Image Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30:32:34:36:38:40:42:44:46:48
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.2s:2.8s:2.4s:2.0s:1.6s:1.2s:0.8s:0.8s:0.8s:0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.8s:0.7s:0.6s:0.5s:0.4s:0.3s:0.2s:0.2s:0.2s:0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Consumes 1  Shadow Orb
 Create a mirror image that allows the caster to dodge ranged and melee physical attacks.


  • This skill can only be cast during Ninja Aura status.


  • [Lv 1] : 1 Dodge, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 1 Dodge, Duration 80 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 2 Dodge, Duration 100 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 2 Dodge, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 3 Dodge, Duration 140 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 3 Dodge, Duration 160 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 4 Dodge, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 4 Dodge, Duration 200 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 5 Dodge, Duration 220 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 5 Dodge, Duration 240 seconds.
Killing Strike Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 55:60:65:70:75:80:85:90:95:100
  • Range: 5
 Inflict massive Ranged physical damage to a single target at the cost of your HP.

After using this skill you will be reduced to 1% HP.


  • This skill ignores accuracy checks.
  • Only does half damage against Boss type monsters.
  • Requires you to be in Ninja Aura status.


  • [Lv 1] : Damage Mod = 0.08
  • [Lv 2] : Damage Mod = 0.16
  • [Lv 3] : Damage Mod = 0.24
  • [Lv 4] : Damage Mod = 0.32
  • [Lv 5] : Damage Mod = 0.40
  • [Lv 6] : Damage Mod = 0.48
  • [Lv 7] : Damage Mod = 0.56
  • [Lv 8] : Damage Mod = 0.64
  • [Lv 9] : Damage Mod = 0.72
  • [Lv10] : Damage Mod = 0.80


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = (ATK × 40) + (Current_HP × Damage_Mod)


Kagerou/Oboro

Shared Skills
Skill Type Properties Description
Shadow Hiding Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Hide yourself.


  • This skill is the same as Thief's Hiding skill.
Right-hand Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Helps remove the damage reduction for dual wielding.


  • Right hand damage is reduced to 70% when dual wielding.


  • [Lv 1] : Deal 80% of your right hand damage.
  • [Lv 2] : Deal 90% of your right hand damage.
  • [Lv 3] : Deal 100% of your right hand damage.
  • [Lv 4] : Deal 110% of your right hand damage.
  • [Lv 5] : Deal 120% of your right hand damage.
Left-hand Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 5
 Helps remove the damage reduction for dual wielding.


  • Left hand damage is reduced to 50% when dual wielding.


  • [Lv 1] : Deal 60% of your left hand damage.
  • [Lv 2] : Deal 70% of your left hand damage.
  • [Lv 3] : Deal 80% of your left hand damage.
  • [Lv 4] : Deal 90% of your left hand damage.
  • [Lv 5] : Deal 100% of your left hand damage.
Kunai Explosion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 5:6:7:8:9
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.4s:1.8s:2.2s:2.6s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 7:8:9:10:11
  • Consumes 1  Explosive Kunai
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Throw an explosive Kunai and damage all enemies in the area.


  • [Lv 1] : 7 Cells range, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 8 Cells range, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 9 Cells range, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 10 Cells range, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 11 Cells range, 5x5 Area of effect.
Swirling Petal Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 24:28:32:36:40
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.2s:1.4s:1.6s:1.8s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 9:10:11:12:13
  • Required weapon type: Huuma Shuriken
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Throw a shuriken and deal damage to all enemies in a 7x7 area.


  • This skills damage is increased base on Throw Shuriken skill level, DEX, and AGI.


  • [Lv 1] : 150% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 450% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 750% ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : 900% ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : 1050% ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 1200% ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 1350% ATK.
  • [Lv10] : 1500% ATK.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage = (Base Damage + (100 * Throw Huuma Shuriken)) + Caster's AGI + Caster's DEX

Makibishi Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 9:12:15:18:21
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
 Spread out Makibishi on the ground that immobilize enemies that step on them.


  • [Lv 1] : Throw 3  Makibishi on the ground.
  • [Lv 2] : Throw 4  Makibishi on the ground.
  • [Lv 3] : Throw 5  Makibishi on the ground.
  • [Lv 4] : Throw 6  Makibishi on the ground.
  • [Lv 5] : Throw 7  Makibishi on the ground.
Pure Soul Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 100
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
 Focus you mind for 10 seconds to recover HP and SP quickly.

You are immobilized when using this skill and can not be attacked.


  • [Lv 1] : Recover 2% HP, and 1% SP per second.
  • [Lv 2] : Recover 4% HP, and 2% SP per second.
  • [Lv 3] : Recover 6% HP, and 3% SP per second.
  • [Lv 4] : Recover 8% HP, and 4% SP per second.
  • [Lv 5] : Recover 10% HP, and 5% SP per second.
Illusion - Shadow Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40:44:48:52:56
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 30.0s:27.0s:24.0s:21.0s:18.0s
 Create a shinobi clone that disappears when its HP reaches 0 or the duration runs out.


  • [Lv 1] : 6000 HP, Duration 27 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 9000 HP, Duration 24 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 12000 HP, Duration 21 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 15000 HP, Duration 18 seconds.
