Fire Charm Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Consumes 1  Charm Fire
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon a fire spirit to increase the damage of ninja's Fire property skills.

You can summon up to 10 spirits at a time.

[Adjusted Fire property skill damage modifiers]:
Flaming Petals: 90% + 20% MATK per spirit (290% MATK per hit at 10 spirits)
Blaze Shield: 50% + 20% MATK per spirit (250% MATK per hit at 10 spirits)
Exploding Dragon: 300%~900% + 100% MATK per spirit (1300%~1900% MATK at 10 spirits)

Ice Charm Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Consumes 1  Charm Ice
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon an ice spirit to increase the damage of ninja's Water property skills.

You can summon up to 10 spirits at a time.

[Adjusted Water property skill damage modifiers]:
Freezing Spear: 70% + 20% MATK per spirit (270% MATK per hit at 10 spirits)
Snow Flake Draft: 300%~900% + 100% MATK per spirit (1300%~1900% MATK at 10 spirits)

Wind Charm Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Consumes 1  Charm Wind
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon a wind spirit to increase the damage of ninja's Wind property skills.

You can summon up to 10 spirits at a time.

[Adjusted Wind property skill damage modifiers]:
Wind Blade: 150% + 20% MATK per spirit (350% MATK per hit at 10 spirits)
Lightning Jolt: 200%~600% + 20% MATK per spirit (400%~800% MATK at 10 spirits)
First Wind: 200%~600% + 100% MATK per spirit (1200%~1600% MATK at 10 spirits)

Earth Charm Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Consumes 1  Charm Earth
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Summon an earth spirit to increase ATK and DEF.

You can summon up to 10 spirits at a time.

Illusion - Bewitch Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 40:44:48:52:56
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:2.5s:2.0s:1.5s:1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 5:6:7:8:9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Switch places with a target at a chance, also has a chance to apply the Confusion status to the caster and the target.


  • There is a 25% chance the caster will get the Confusion status.
  • There is a 75% chance the target will get the Confusion status.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to swap places, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 2] : 55% Chance to swap places, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv 3] : 60% Chance to swap places, 7 Cells range.
  • [Lv 4] : 65% Chance to swap places, 8 Cells range.
  • [Lv 5] : 70% Chance to swap places, 9 Cells range.
16th Night Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70:75:80:85:90
  • Cool Down: 60.0s
 Reduce Fixed Casting Time for skills by 100%, and Variable Casting Time by 50%.


  • The Variable Casting Time does not stack additively with other Variable Casting Time.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 75 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 90 seconds.
Cross Slash Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10:12:14:16:18
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 3:4:5:6:7
 Strike a target with a cross attack.

It will also mark a target with a Cross Wound for 3 seconds. If another Kagerou or Oboro uses Cross Slash on the Cross Wound target it will deal additional damage.


  • This skills damage is increased depending on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, 4 Cells range.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK, 4 Cells range.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK, 4 Cells range.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 6] : 1200% ATK, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 7] : 1400% ATK, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv 8] : 1600% ATK, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv 9] : 1800% ATK, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv10] : 2000% ATK, 7 Cells range.

Illusion - Shock Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40:44:48:52:56
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:2.5s:2.0s:1.5s:1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 5
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Reduce the stats of a target and transform them into a random monster.

Targets under this effect can not change their gears.

  • This effect does not apply to allies or monsters.


  • This skill can only be used during WoE.


  • [Lv 1] : All stats are reduced by 2 ~ 3.
  • [Lv 2] : All stats are reduced by 4 ~ 6.
  • [Lv 3] : All stats are reduced by 6 ~ 9.
  • [Lv 4] : All stats are reduced by 8 ~ 12.

Illusion - Death Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40:44:48:52:56
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s:2.5s:2.0s:1.5s:1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 5

Cast Ninja Spell Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 7
 Transfer your spiritual energy to the earth to create a 5x5 area of effect portal the generates various effects.


Fire Property spirit

  • Applies Burning status to enemies at a chance.
  • Bonus ATK is granted if targets weapon property is Fire element.

Water Property spirit

  • Applies Freezing or Frozen status to enemies at a chance.
  • Bonus ATK is granted if targets weapon property is Water element.

Wind Property spirit

  • Applies Silence, Sleep, or Deep Sleep status to enemies at a chance.
  • Bonus ATK is granted if targets weapon property is Wind element.

Earth Property spirit

  • Applies Stone Curse, or Poison status to enemies at a chance.
  • Bonus ATK is granted if targets weapon property is Earth element.

  • SP Cost: 50
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 20.0s
  • Range: 7

Shadow Warrior Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 60:65:70:75:80
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 20.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Consumes 1  Shadow Orb
 Place a buff on a target that allows the user to apply Double Attack with any weapon.

Consumes 1 SP every second while active.


Increases the following skills damage by 20% while active;

  • Kunai Explosion.
  • Swirling Petal.
  • Kunai Splash.
  • Cross Slash.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 60 seconds.

Oboro Only
Skill Type Properties Description
Distorted Crescent Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 60:70:80:90:100
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.5s:2.0s:2.5s:3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 30.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Increase or decrease your ATK or MATK depending on your current HP or SP.


  • Even HP = Increase ATK.
  • Odd HP = Decrease ATK.
  • Even SP = Increase MATK.
  • Odd SP = Decrease MATK.


  • [Lv 1] : Increase by (Base Level / 3) + 20, Decrease by (Base Level / 3) + 30.
  • [Lv 2] : Increase by (Base Level / 3) + 40, Decrease by (Base Level / 3) + 60.
  • [Lv 3] : Increase by (Base Level / 3) + 60, Decrease by (Base Level / 3) + 90.
  • [Lv 4] : Increase by (Base Level / 3) + 80, Decrease by (Base Level / 3) + 120.
  • [Lv 5] : Increase by (Base Level / 3) + 100, Decrease by (Base Level / 3) + 150.
Ominous Moonlight Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20:30:40:50:60
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.5s:2.0s:2.5s:3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 30.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast cannot be interrupted
 Make all healing skills on a target do damage instead.

All healing the target receives will deal damage equal to half the amount that would be healed.

Example: If a target was healed for 100 HP, they would take 50 damage instead.


  • Can not be used on Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 30 seconds.
Moonlight Fantasy Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 55:60:65:70:75
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast cannot be interrupted
 Increase or decrease a targets Max HP and SP.

When the target is hit with magical damage, the damage is split around nearby enemies.


  • This skill can not be used on monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 30 seconds.


Target's HP Below 15% Below 16 ~ 30% Below 31 ~ 50% Below 51 ~ 75% Above 76%
HP is Even, increase by Skill_Level + 20% Skill_Level + 16% Skill_Level + 12% Skill_Level + 8% Skill_Level + 4%
HP is Odd, decrease by Skill_Level + 4% Skill_Level + 8% Skill_Level + 12% Skill_Level + 16% Skill_Level + 20%


Target's HP Below 15% Below 16 ~ 30% Below 31 ~ 50% Below 51 ~ 75% Above 76%
SP is Even, increase by Skill_Level + 15% Skill_Level + 12% Skill_Level + 9% Skill_Level + 6% Skill_Level + 3%
SP is Odd, decrease by Skill_Level + 3% Skill_Level + 6% Skill_Level + 9% Skill_Level + 12% Skill_Level + 15%


Gunslinger

Skill Type Properties Description
Coin Flip Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2
  • Zeny Cost: 1
 Consume 1 zeny to flip a coin. If the coin lands heads, the caster will gain 1 coin, if the coin lands tails, the caster will lose 1 coin.


  • You can have a maximum of 10 coins at a time.
  • The skill level affects the chance of flipping a heads.
Single Action Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Allows you to attack faster and more accurately.


  • [Lv 1] : +2 Hit, +1% ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : +4 Hit, +1% ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : +6 Hit, +2% ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : +8 Hit, +2% ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : +10 Hit, +3% ASPD.
  • [Lv 6] : +12 Hit, +3% ASPD.
  • [Lv 7] : +14 Hit, +4% ASPD.
  • [Lv 8] : +16 Hit, +4% ASPD.
  • [Lv 9] : +18 Hit, +5% ASPD.
  • [Lv10] : +20 Hit, +5% ASPD.

  • Max Level: 10
 Increase attack range and accuracy with Pistol class weapons.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 Hit, +1 Range.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 Hit, +2 Range.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 Hit, +3 Range.
  • [Lv 4] : +4 Hit, +4 Range.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 Hit, +5 Range.
  • [Lv 6] : +6 Hit, +6 Range.
  • [Lv 7] : +7 Hit, +7 Range.
  • [Lv 8] : +8 Hit, +8 Range.
  • [Lv 9] : +9 Hit, +9 Range.
  • [Lv10] : +10 Hit, +10 Range.
Fling Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1 ~ 5
  • Range: 9
 Fling coins at an enemy to reduce the targets DEF.


  • Fling can consume up to 5 coins per cast, each coin reducing the targets DEF more.
  • The casters Job Level also affects the DEF reduction.
Triple Action Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required ammo amount: 1
 Spend 1 coin to attack an enemy 3 times in quick succession.
Bull's Eye Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required ammo amount: 1
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Spend 1 coin to inflict 500% ATK to a Demihuman or Brute race target.

This skill has a 0.1% chance to apply Coma status to the target, this effect is not applied to Boss monsters.

Madness Canceller Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Spend 1 coin to immobilize yourself but also grant yourself +100 ATK and +20% ASPD.

Duration 15 seconds.


  • This skill can not be used with Adjustment.
Adjustment Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 2
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Spend 2 coins to activate Adjustment status.

Duration 20 seconds.


While under Adjustment status the caster will get;

  • +30 Flee.
  • -20% Damage taken from Ranged Attacks.
  • -30 Hit.


  • This skill can not be used with Madness Canceller.

    • Shells
    • Grenades

 Deal additional damage after hitting a target with Chain Action.


  • This skill can only be cast after Chain Action.
  • The caster's job level affect how many extra attacks are done.
  • If there is a target marked with Crimson Marker within a 21x21 area the target will receive 2 additional hits.


Additional attacks formula = (1 + Caster's Job_level / 20)

Howling Mine Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s:4.5s:4.0s:3.5s:3.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Grenade Launcher
  • Consumes 1  Projection Landmines
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Fire a sticking bomb to a target that deals damage and can be exploded for additional damage.

If the caster uses Flicker the bomb will explode dealing Fire property damage to all nearby enemies.


  • If the bomb is not detonated after 30 seconds it will fall off the target.
  • Targets damaged by the explosion have a chance to be applied with the Burning status.


  • [Lv 1] : 400% ATK, 800% Explosion damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 600% ATK, 1100% Explosion damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 800% ATK, 1400% Explosion damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 1000% ATK, 1700% Explosion damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 1200% ATK, 2000% Explosion damage.

Bound Trap Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 28 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 2.5s:2.0s:1.5s:1.0s:0.5s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 3:4:4:5:5
  • Required weapon type(s):
    • Revolver
    • Rifle
    • Gatling Gun
    • Shotgun
    • Grenade Launcher
  • Consumes 1  Special Alloy Trap
 Lay down a powerful movement impairing trap on the ground. All targets the enter the area will have their movement speed reduced.

The duration of the debuff is determined by the targets STR.

Using Flicker on a target with the debuff will remove it and deal additional damage to them.


  • Only 1 trap can be active at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : 3x3 Area of effect, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 5x5 Area of effect, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 7x7 Area of effect, Duration 14 seconds.
Platinum Alter Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 18 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Required ammo type: Bullets
  • Required ammo amount: 1
  • Required equipment:  Silver Bullet: Purification Shot: Silver Bullet
 When activated consumes all coins to increase ATK.

Also create a barrier to protect from damage, your Max HP affects the durability of the barrier.


  • This skill can only be used with Holy property bullets, if you switch bullet types this skill will be dispelled.
  • Skill level also affects the ATK increase.


  • [Lv 1] : Barrier is equal to 5% of Max HP, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Barrier is equal to 10% of Max HP, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Barrier is equal to 15% of Max HP, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Barrier is equal to 20% of Max HP, Duration 75 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Barrier is equal to 25% of Max HP, Duration 90 seconds.

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40:45:50:55:60

    • Gatling Gun

  • Required ammo amount: 6
  • Consumed ammo amount: 5

Target's knocked into walls or obstacles will take additional damage.

  • [Lv 1] : 700% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1100% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.

  • [Lv 5] : 1500% ATK, 9x9 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 1700% ATK, 9x9 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 1900% ATK, 11x11 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 2100% ATK, 11x11 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 2300% ATK, 11x11 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : 2500% ATK, 13x13 Area of effect.
Dragon Tail Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.2s:1.4s:1.6s:1.8s:2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 3.5s
  • Required weapon type:
    • Grenade Launcher
  • Required ammo type: Grenades
  • Required ammo amount: 1
  • Consumes 1  Dragon Tail Missile
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Launch missiles at a target, enemies that are marked by Crimson Marker will take additional damage.

This skills damage is divided among all onscreen targets that have a Crimson Market.


  • This skills damage increases depending on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 700% ATK, 1400% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% ATK, 1800% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 3] : 1100% ATK, 2200% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 4] : 1300% ATK, 2600% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500% ATK, 3000% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 6] : 1700% ATK, 3400% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 7] : 1900% ATK, 3800% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 8] : 2100% ATK, 4200% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv 9] : 2300% ATK, 4600% ATK against marked targets.
  • [Lv10] : 2500% ATK, 5000% ATK against marked targets.
Heat Barrel Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 100.0s:95.0s:90.0s:85.0s:80.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Consumes all your coins to increase your ATK and ASPD at the cost of Hit.


  • This skill can not be used with Platinum Alter, or Madness Canceller.
  • If the caster changes equipment this status will end.


  • [Lv 1] : +8% ATK per coin consumed, +1 ASPD, -30 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +10% ATK per coin consumed, +2 ASPD, -35 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +12% ATK per coin consumed, +3 ASPD, -40 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +14% ATK per coin consumed, +4 ASPD, -45 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +16% ATK per coin consumed, +5 ASPD, -50 Hit, Duration 60 seconds.

  • Max Level: 5

  • SP Cost: 76 + (4 x Skill Level)

  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Rifle
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Deal damage to a target and reduce it's Demi-Human resistances.


  • [Lv 1] : 3800% ATK, 30% chance to reduce resistance by 10%, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 4100% ATK, 40% chance to reduce resistance by 20%, Duration 14 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 4400% ATK, 50% chance to reduce resistance by 30%, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 4700% ATK, 60% chance to reduce resistance by 40%, Duration 18 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 5000% ATK, 70% chance to reduce resistance by 50%, Duration 20 seconds.
Slug Shot Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 76 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s:6.0s:7.0s:8.0s:9.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type:
    • Shotgun
  • Ammo used:
  • Consumes 1  Slug Ammunition XH
  • Consumes 1  Slug Ammunition SH
  • Consumes 1  Slug Ammunition H
  • Consumes 1  Slug Ammunition M
  • Consumes 1  Slug Ammunition L
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Fire a special slug shot a target to deal damage.

Heavier bullets will deal more damage.

Accuracy decreases the further away you are from the target.

Targets hit by this skill will be stunned.


  • [Lv 1] : 2000% ATK on players, 1200% ATK on monsters, -10 Hit for every cell beyond 3.
  • [Lv 2] : 4000% ATK on players, 2400% ATK on monsters, -9 Hit for every cell beyond 3.
  • [Lv 3] : 6000% ATK on players, 3600% ATK on monsters, -8 Hit for every cell beyond 3.
  • [Lv 4] : 9000% ATK on players, 4800% ATK on monsters, -7 Hit for every cell beyond 3.
  • [Lv 5] : 10000% ATK on players, 6000% ATK on monsters, -6 Hit for every cell beyond 3.
Hammer of God Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: All your active coins
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 20.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Required weapon type(s):
    • Rifle
 Target an enemy and summon a hammer of god to strike the target and nearby enemies.


  • If the target is marked by Crimson Marker, they will take additional damage.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 600% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 700% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 800% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 900% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : 1000% ATK, 7x7 Area of effect.


Doram

Summoner

Skill Type Properties Description
New Basic Skill Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Adds all the effects of a Novices Basic Skill into a singular point.
  • Enables Trading
    Allows the trading of items with other characters. Right click on a character to initiate.
  • Enables Emotions
    Alt+(0~9) and Ctrl+(1,-,=.)
    Alt+L opens additional Emotion icons.
  • Enables Sitting
    Sitting doubles HP/SP Recovery Speed.
    Press the Insert key or type /sit.
  • Enables Chat Room Creation
    Alt + C Opens a Chat Room or click the Chat button in the Basic Information Window.
  • Join a Party
    Character can join a party.
  • Enables Use of Kafra Storage
    Allows use of Kafra Storage, or the Secondary Storage (Doram storage NPC).
  • Organize Party
    Create a party by typing /organize [Party Name]
    Set party options in the Party Window (Alt+Z).
Bite Damage
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 2
 Bite an enemy to deal damage. This skill will deal additional damage to enemies with less health.


  • There is a chance to double cast this skill, in which you will instantly cast the skill again on the same target. (The chance is increased for every 30 Base Levels).


  • [Lv 1] 200% ATK.
Hide Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
 Hide from enemies inside a bush.
  • You can be discovered by Demon, Insect, and Boss monsters. Similar to thief's Hiding skill.
  • Sight, Ruwach, Detect, and Attention Concentrate will not reveal you.
  • If you are knocked back while hiding, you will be revealed.
  • Cast can be interrupted if you are hit during the activation of the skill.
Scratch Damage
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 4.0s - (1.0s x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Scratch an enemy with the chance to cause the Bleeding status.


  • There is a chance to double cast this skill, in which you will instantly cast the skill again on the same target. (The chance is increased for every 30 Base Levels).


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 150% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect
  • [Lv 3] : 200% ATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
Stoop Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
 Buff yourself for 6 seconds, reducing incoming damage by 90%.


  • You can use other skills while this is active, but can not move cells.
Lope Support
  • Max Level: 3
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s x Skill Level
 Leap high and far into the air, letting you jump over obstacles.


  • When this skill is learned, double the casting time of Emergency Call. (WoE skill)
  • This skill can be used in instances, but can not jump over impassible walls.


  • [Lv 1] : Leap 6 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : Leap 10 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : Leap 14 cells.
Spirit Marble Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Increases Max HP and SP.


  • After this skill is taken, spirit marbles will circle around you.


  • [Lv 1] : +1000 Max HP, +100 Max SP.
Silvervine Stem Spear Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Pierce an enemy using a Silvervine Stem. Has a chance to cause the Bleeding status.

Different skill levels uses different properties of magic.


  • There is a chance to double cast this skill, in which you will instantly cast the skill again on the same target. (The chance is increased for every 30 Base Levels).


  • [Lv 1] : Earth property, 700% MATK, 10% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 2] : Fire property, 700% MATK, 10% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 3] : Water property, 700% MATK, 10% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 4] : Wind property, 700% MATK, 10% Chance to cause Bleeding status.
  • [Lv 5] : Ghost property, 700% MATK, 10% Chance to cause Bleeding status.

Catnip Meteor Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 5 + (15 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 9
 The spirit of giant catnip is dropped from a great height to come down and damage enemies.

Deals neutral property magic damage to all enemies hit.
From base level 100, deals additional damage depends on user's base level and Int.


  • If you have  Catnip in your inventory it will be consumed, and there will be a chance to curse all enemies hit.
  • You can cast this skill with or without  Catnip.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% MATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% MATK, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% MATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% MATK, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 700% MATK, 7x7 Area of effect.
Scar of Tarou Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 8 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
  • Range: 9
 Inflict the injury of a country mouses wounded spirit onto a target.

This skill will apply a debuff on the target called [Bite Wound].


[Bite Wound] effects

  • Drains Max HP from the target every seconds.
  • Duration 9 seconds.


  • [Bite Wound] can be removed with Heal, Cure, and Clearance.
  • [Bite Wound] does not work on Boss monsters.
  • There is a chance to double cast this skill, in which you will instantly cast the skill again on the same target. (The chance is increased for every 30 Base Levels).


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK.

  • Cast Delay: 1.0s

 Carrots are raised in the anger of the Lunatic, dealing damage to all enemies hit.

From base level 100, deals additional damage depends on user's base level and Str.

Tuna Party Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 10.0s + (4.0s x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
 The spirit of the delicious tuna protects the target for 30 seconds.

This skill will block physical and magical damage until the buff durability runs out.

The durability of the buff depends on the targets Max HP.


  • The durability is doubled if Spirit of Sea is learned.
  • This skill has an animation (delay after attack) for the target, but not for the caster.


  • [Lv 1] : Durability is equal to 10% of the targets Max HP.
  • [Lv 2] : Durability is equal to 20% of the targets Max HP.
  • [Lv 3] : Durability is equal to 30% of the targets Max HP.
  • [Lv 4] : Durability is equal to 40% of the targets Max HP.
  • [Lv 5] : Durability is equal to 50% of the targets Max HP.
Power of Land Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 The spirits retain some of the power of the earth.
  • +20 INT.
  • If 20 or more skill points are invested in Plant based skills, +20% MATK.
Power of Life Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 The spirits retain some of the power of the life.
  • +20 Critical Rate, Flee, Hit.
  • If 20 or more skill points are invested in Animal based skills, +20% Ranged Damage.
Power of Sea Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 The spirits retain some of the power of the sea.
  • +10% Healing effectiveness.
  • If 20 or more skill points are invested in Seafood based skills, additional +20% Healing Effectiveness.

  • [Lv 1] : Increases SP recovery, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Increases SP recovery, Duration 14 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Increases SP recovery, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Increases SP recovery, Duration 18 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Increases SP recovery, Duration 20 seconds.
Spirit of Land Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Absorb the spirit of the earth to strengthen Plant based skills.


Silvervine Stem Spear

  • For 3 seconds after casting, provide massive movement speed boost.

Silvervine Root Twist

  • For 3 seconds after casting, increase MATK equal to your Base Level's number.

Catnip Meteor

  • For 3 seconds after casting, increase your Perfect Dodge equal to your Base Level / 12.

Catnip Powdering

  • For 3 seconds after casting, instantly casts Silvervine Stem Spear on enemies damaged by long ranged attacks.

Nyang Grass

  • For 3 seconds after casting, increase MATK equal to your Base Level's number.
Spirit of Life Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Absorb the spirit of life to strengthen Animal based skills.

Increases the damage of the following skills depending on the casters remaining HP;

  • Picky Peck.
  • Scar of Tarou.
  • Lunatic Carrot Beat.
  • Spirit of Savage.
Spirit of Sea Passive
  • Max Level: 1
 Absorb the spirit of the sea to strengthen Seafood based skills.


Fresh Shrimp

  • Doubles HP Recovery.

Bunch of Shrimp

  • Extends the ATK and MATK duration by 120 seconds.

Tuna Belly

  • Reduce the skills cooldown by 5 seconds.

Tuna Party

  • Increases the Tuna shield strength.

Tasty Shrimp Party

  • Also doubles the HP recovery of the caster and party.


Super Novice

Skill Type Properties Description
Swordsman Branch
Sword Mastery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Adds Mastery ATK when wielding a One-handed Sword or Dagger weapon.


  • [Lv 1] : +4 ATK.
  • [Lv 2] : +8 ATK.
  • [Lv 3] : +12 ATK.
  • [Lv 4] : +16 ATK.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 ATK.
  • [Lv 6] : +24 ATK.
  • [Lv 7] : +28 ATK.
  • [Lv 8] : +32 ATK.
  • [Lv 9] : +36 ATK.
  • [Lv10] : +40 ATK.
Increase HP Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Naturally recover extra HP every 10 seconds. Also increase the amount of HP healed from consumables.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore (5 HP + 0.2%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 10% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore (10 HP + 0.4%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 20% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore (15 HP + 0.6%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 30% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore (20 HP + 0.8%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 40% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore (25 HP + 1.0%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 50% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore (30 HP + 1.2%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 60% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore (35 HP + 1.4%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 70% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 8] : Restore (40 HP + 1.6%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 80% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv 9] : Restore (45 HP + 1.8%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 90% more healing from consumables.
  • [Lv10] : Restore (50 HP + 2.0%) Max HP every 10 seconds, Receive 100% more healing from consumables.
Bash Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~5) : 8
    • (Lv 6~10) : 15
  • Range: 1
  • Required weapon type:
    • Any except Bows
 Strike a single enemy with an increased chance to hit them.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% ATK, +5% Hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 160% ATK, +10% Hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 190% ATK, +15% Hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 220% ATK, +20% Hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 250% ATK, +25% Hit.
  • [Lv 6] : 280% ATK, +30% Hit.
  • [Lv 7] : 310% ATK, +35% Hit.
  • [Lv 8] : 340% ATK, +40% Hit.
  • [Lv 9] : 370% ATK, +45% Hit.
  • [Lv10] : 400% ATK, +50% Hit.
Magnum Break Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 2s
  • Area of Effect:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 5x5
    • (Lv 3~4) : 6x6
    • (Lv 5~6) : 7x7
    • (Lv 7~8) : 8x8
    • (Lv 9~10) : 9x9
 Consumes a small amount of HP to deal Fire property physical damage to all nearby enemies, with an increased chance to Hit.

Enemies hit will be knocked back 2 cells.

If the targets hit are players outside the 3x3 area, they will take reduced damage from this skill.


Afterwards, gain a +20% Fire property damage bonus for the next 10 seconds. (This does not change the element of your main attack, this is additional damage).


  • [Lv 1] : Consumes 20 HP, +10% Hit, 120% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 110% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 2] : Consumes 20 HP, +20% Hit, 140% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 120% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 3] : Consumes 19 HP, +30% Hit, 160% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 130% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 4] : Consumes 19 HP, +40% Hit, 180% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 140% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 5] : Consumes 18 HP, +50% Hit, 200% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 150% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 6] : Consumes 18 HP, +60% Hit, 220% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 160% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 7] : Consumes 17 HP, +70% Hit, 240% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 170% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 8] : Consumes 17 HP, +80% Hit, 260% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 180% ATK instead.
  • [Lv 9] : Consumes 16 HP, +90% Hit, 280% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 190% ATK instead.
  • [Lv10] : Consumes 16 HP, +100% Hit, 300% ATK, Players outside the 3x3 area take 200% ATK instead.
Provoke Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 3 + Skill Level
  • Range: 9
 Has a chance to provoke a target up to 9 cells away and make it aggressive toward you.

If successful, it will increase the targets ATK, while decreasing their DEF for 30 seconds.


  • The difference between the user's base level and the target's base level will affect the chance of success.
  • Players will have their Soft DEF reduced opposed to Hard DEF.
  • This can interrupt a skill being cast.
  • This will remove the target's Frozen, Stone, Sleep or Play Dead status.
  • Does not work on Boss or Undead race enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 73% Chance to apply effect, +5% ATK, -10% DEF.
  • [Lv 2] : 76% Chance to apply effect, +8% ATK, -15% DEF.
  • [Lv 3] : 79% Chance to apply effect, +11% ATK, -20% DEF.
  • [Lv 4] : 82% Chance to apply effect, +14% ATK, -25% DEF.
  • [Lv 5] : 85% Chance to apply effect, +17% ATK, -30% DEF.
  • [Lv 6] : 88% Chance to apply effect, +20% ATK, -35% DEF.
  • [Lv 7] : 91% Chance to apply effect, +23% ATK, -40% DEF.
  • [Lv 8] : 94% Chance to apply effect, +26% ATK, -45% DEF.
  • [Lv 9] : 97% Chance to apply effect, +29% ATK, -50% DEF.
  • [Lv10] : 100% Chance to apply effect, +32% ATK, -55% DEF.
Endure Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Cool Down: 10.0s
 For a short time or for 7 Hits, do not play the hit/flinching animation when taking damage. Also increases the caster's MDEF.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 MDEF, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 MDEF, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 MDEF, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +4 MDEF, Duration 19 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +5 MDEF, Duration 22 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : +6 MDEF, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : +7 MDEF, Duration 28 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : +8 MDEF, Duration 31 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : +9 MDEF, Duration 34 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : +10 MDEF, Duration 37 seconds.
Thief Branch
Double Attack Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase the chance of attacking twice when using Dagger class weapons. Double attack's will have an increased Hit Rate. (This only applies to double attacks).


  • [Lv 1] : 7% Chance, +1% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 2] : 14% Chance, +2% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 3] : 21% Chance, +3% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 4] : 28% Chance, +4% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 5] : 35% Chance, +5% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 6] : 42% Chance, +6% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 7] : 49% Chance, +7% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 8] : 56% Chance, +8% Hit Rate
  • [Lv 9] : 63% Chance, +9% Hit Rate
  • [Lv10] : 70% Chance, +10% Hit Rate
Improve Dodge Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increases your Flee Rate. When you are 2nd job or higher the Flee Rate is higher.


  • [Lv 1] : +3 Flee, (+4 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 2] : +6 Flee, (+8 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 3] : +9 Flee, (+12 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 4] : +12 Flee, (+16 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 5] : +15 Flee, (+20 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 6] : +18 Flee, (+24 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 7] : +21 Flee, (+28 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 8] : +24 Flee, (+32 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv 9] : +27 Flee, (+36 Flee if 2nd job or higher)
  • [Lv10] : +30 Flee, (+40 Flee if 2nd job or higher)

  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 1
 Attempt to steal an item from a monster.


  • [Lv 1] : 10% Success Rate
  • [Lv 2] : 16% Success Rate
  • [Lv 3] : 22% Success Rate
  • [Lv 4] : 28% Success Rate
  • [Lv 5] : 34% Success Rate
  • [Lv 6] : 40% Success Rate
  • [Lv 7] : 46% Success Rate
  • [Lv 8] : 52% Success Rate
  • [Lv 9] : 58% Success Rate
  • [Lv10] : 64% Success Rate
Hiding Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Hide yourself underground to avoid being attacked and targeted by enemies.


  • You will still be hit by area of effect skills.
  • You will be immobilized and can not use items while in hiding.


  • [Lv 1] : 30 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 60 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 90 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 120 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 150 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 180 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 210 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 240 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 270 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 13 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 300 second duration, Drains 1 SP every 14 seconds.

  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12
  • Range: 2
 Stab a target with increased ATK and leave them with the chance to be poisoned.

  • [Lv 2] : +30 ATK, 18% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 3] : +45 ATK, 22% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 4] : +60 ATK, 26% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 5] : +75 ATK, 30% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 6] : +90 ATK, 34% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 7] : +105 ATK, 38% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 8] : +120 ATK, 42% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv 9] : +135 ATK, 46% Chance to Poison.
  • [Lv10] : +150 ATK, 50% Chance to Poison.

Acolyte Branch
Aqua Benedicta Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Requires standing on a water cell
  • Consumes: 1  Empty Bottle
 The caster must be standing on a walkable body of water (e.g. ponds, lake shore, beach, Deluge, Watery Evasion) to use this skill.


  • Creates 1  Holy Water

Ruwach Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10
 Temporarily reveals hidden enemies within a 5x5 area centered on the caster.

Deals 100% MATK damage to hidden enemies revealed and cancels their hiding status.

Teleport Mobility
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 10
    • (Lv 2) : 9
 Allows you to teleport randomly, or to your save point.


  • [Lv 1] Teleports the caster to a random location in the same map.
  • [Lv 2] Teleports the caster to their save point.
  • Can not be cast if the caster is standing on top of Land Protector.
Warp Portal Mobility
  • Max Level: 4
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 38 - (3 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a portal on the ground that transports any player that steps into it to another map.


  • [Lv 1] Transports players to the caster's save point.
  • [Lv 2~4] Transports players to a specific Memo point.
  • You can use the /memo command to memorize a spot and add it to your Warp Portal destinations. Some maps and dungeons can not be added as Warp Portal destination.
Heal Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 10 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Restores HP to a single target.
  • The amount of HP restored is based on the skill level, Base Level, INT, and MATK of the caster.
  • If cast on an undead player or monster this will instead deal Holy element magic damage to the target. (Can be cast on monsters if "/noshift" is activated).
Cure Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Removes Silence, Blind, and Chaos from a target.

  • SP Cost: 10

 Create a 3x3 area on the ground that temporarily nullifies ranged physical damage.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 24 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9

This skill will remove Curse and Stone Curse statuses from the target.

  • [Lv 2] : +2 STR, +2 DEX, +2 INT, +4 Hit, Duration 80 seconds.

Mage Branch
Increase SP Recovery Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Naturally restore SP every 10 seconds. Also increase the amount of SP healed from consumables.


  • [Lv 1] : Restore (3 SP + 0.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 2% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 2] : Restore (6 SP + 0.4%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 4% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 3] : Restore (9 SP + 0.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 6% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 4] : Restore (12 SP + 0.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 8% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 5] : Restore (15 SP + 1.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 10% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 6] : Restore (18 SP + 1.2%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 12% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 7] : Restore (21 SP + 1.4%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 14% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 8] : Restore (24 SP + 1.6%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 16% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv 9] : Restore (27 SP + 1.8%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 18% more SP from consumables.
  • [Lv10] : Restore (30 SP + 2.0%) Max SP every 10 seconds, Receive 20% more SP from consumables.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12 ~ 30
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.64s ~ 3.2s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.16s ~ 1.2s

Frost Diver Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 26 - (Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.64s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.16s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Inflict Water property magic damage to a single target with a chance to leave them frozen.


  • Frozen enemies are immobile, unable to cast skills and turn to Water 1 element.


  • [Lv 1] : 110% MATK, 38% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% MATK, 41% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 3] : 130% MATK, 44% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 4] : 140% MATK, 47% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 5] : 150% MATK, 50% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 6] : 160% MATK, 53% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 7] : 170% MATK, 56% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 8] : 180% MATK, 59% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv 9] : 190% MATK, 62% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.
  • [Lv10] : 200% MATK, 65% Chance to apply Frozen status to target.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 12 ~ 30

  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.16s ~ 1.2s

  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10

Fire Wall Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.6s ~ 0.64s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.4s ~ 0.06s
  • Range: 9
 Create a 1x3 wall of fire on the ground that deals Fire property magic damage to all enemies that walk into it.

Enemies damaged by the Fire Wall will be knocked back 2 cells.

After a cell in the wall deals damage a certain number of time, it will disappear.


  • Undead race and Boss monsters take all hits at once and are not affected by the knock back of this skill.
  • A maximum of 3 fire walls can be created at a time.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 3 times, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 4 times, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 5 times, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 6 times, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 7 times, Duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 8 times, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 9 times, Duration 11 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 10 times, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 11 times, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 50% MATK, Deal damage 12 times, Duration 14 seconds.

Safety Wall Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~3) : 30
    • (Lv 3~6) : 35
    • (Lv 7~10) : 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.4 - (4 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time:
    • (Lv 1) : 0.8
    • (Lv 2) : 0.72
    • (Lv 3) : 0.64
    • (Lv 4) : 0.56
    • (Lv 5) : 0.48
    • (Lv 6) : 0.40
    • (Lv 7) : 0.32
    • (Lv 8) : 0.24
    • (Lv 9) : 0.16
    • (Lv 10) : 0.08
  • Cast Delay: Roughly 0.3s at every level
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a barrier on the ground that blocks all melee physical attacks.

The barrier will break after so many hits or if it recieves a hit the exceed its durability.


  • Can not be cast next to Pneuma.


  • [Lv 1] : 300 Base durability, Blocks 2 hits, Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 600 Base durability, Blocks 3 hits, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 900 Base durability, Blocks 4 hits, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200 Base durability, Blocks 5 hits, Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500 Base durability, Blocks 6 hits, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : 1800 Base durability, Blocks 7 hits, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : 2100 Base durability, Blocks 8 hits, Duration 35 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : 2400 Base durability, Blocks 9 hits, Duration 40 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : 2700 Base durability, Blocks 10 hits, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : 3000 Base durability, Blocks 11 hits, Duration 50 seconds.


Durability is based on the following formula;
Durability (HP) = Base_Durability + 7000 × (1 + 0.1 × Job_Level ÷ 50) + 65 × INT + Max_SP

Stone Curse Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 26 - (Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Range: 2
  • Consumes: 1  Red Gemstone
 Attempt to apply the Stone Curse status affect to a target at chance.

Successfully Stone Curse'd targets will be unable to attack or cast skills for a few seconds, then become immobile and into Earth 1 element.

Re-casting this skill on a Stone Cursed target will remove the status from them.


  • When skill level is 6 or higher, it only consumes the  Red Gemstone on successful casts.


  • [Lv 1] : 24% Chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 28% Chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 32% Chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 36% Chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 40% Chance.
  • [Lv 6] : 44% Chance.
  • [Lv 7] : 48% Chance.
  • [Lv 8] : 52% Chance.
  • [Lv 9] : 56% Chance.
  • [Lv10] : 60% Chance.

Pushcart Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Allows you to rent a pushcart, which can store items and unlock additional skills.

Your movement speed is reduced while you have a pushcart with you. Higher levels can remove this reduction.


  • Items inside the pushcart cannot be used or equipped directly, and must be brought outside to be used.
  • You can access the pushcart using Alt+W.


  • [Lv 1] : 55% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 3] : 65% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 4] : 70% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 5] : 75% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 6] : 80% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 7] : 85% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 8] : 90% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv 9] : 95% of normal walking speed.
  • [Lv10] : 100% of normal walking speed.
Vending Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 30
 Requires a pushcart. Open a store where you can sell items, and other players can buy them.


  • Note that there is a 3% vending tax applied to all your sales.


  • [Lv 1] : Able to vend 3 items at one time.
  • [Lv 2] : Able to vend 4 items at one time.
  • [Lv 3] : Able to vend 5 items at one time.
  • [Lv 4] : Able to vend 6 items at one time.
  • [Lv 5] : Able to vend 7 items at one time.
  • [Lv 6] : Able to vend 8 items at one time.
  • [Lv 7] : Able to vend 9 items at one time.
  • [Lv 8] : Able to vend 10 items at one time.
  • [Lv 9] : Able to vend 11 items at one time.
  • [Lv10] : Able to vend 12 items at one time.

Call Spirits Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 8
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Allows you to summon Spirit Spheres, each Sphere summoned gives +3 ATK.


  • Spirit Spheres last for 10 minutes.
  • Spirit Sphere are commonly used as requirements to cast other skills.


  • [Lv 1] : 1 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 2] : 2 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 3] : 3 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 4] : 4 Spirit Sphere maximum.
  • [Lv 5] : 5 Spirit Sphere maximum.
Absorb Spirits Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Range: 9
 Absorb all the Spirit Spheres from a target, regaining 7 SP for each sphere absorbed.


  • When used on a monsters, this instead has a 20% chance to regain 2 x Monster Level SP.
Critical Explosion Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Sphere Cost: 5
 Consume 5 Spirit Spheres to activate the Fury status.

Fury status increases your Critical Rate and reduces you natural SP recovery.


  • [Lv 1] : +10 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : +12.5 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : +15 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : +17.5 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : +20 Critical Rate, -50% SP Recovery, Duration 180 seconds.

  • SP Cost: 12
  • Cast Delay: 0.7s
  • Range: 1 + (2 x Skill Level)

 Throw your shield at an enemy dealing ranged physical damage.

Holy Cross Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10 + (1 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 2
 Slash an enemy with a cross shape dealing melee physical damage with a chance to inflict the Blind status to the target.

When wielding a two-handed weapon the damage is increased.


  • This skills damage is forced to the Holy element.


  • [Lv 1] : 135% ATK (One-hand), 270% ATK (Two-hand), 3% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 2] : 170% ATK (One-hand), 340% ATK (Two-hand), 6% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 3] : 205% ATK (One-hand), 410% ATK (Two-hand), 9% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% ATK (One-hand), 480% ATK (Two-hand), 12% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 5] : 275% ATK (One-hand), 550% ATK (Two-hand), 15% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 6] : 310% ATK (One-hand), 620% ATK (Two-hand), 18% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 7] : 345% ATK (One-hand), 690% ATK (Two-hand), 21% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 8] : 380% ATK (One-hand), 760% ATK (Two-hand), 24% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 9] : 415% ATK (One-hand), 830% ATK (Two-hand), 27% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv10] : 450% ATK (One-hand), 900% ATK (Two-hand), 30% Chance to Blind.

Sanctuary Recovery
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 12 + (3 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
  • Consumes: 1  Blue Gemstone
 Create a cross shaped 5x5 area on the ground the restores HP to everyone inside each second.

Deals Holy element magic damage to any Undead element and Demon race targets the area, it will also knock them back 2 cells.


  • Unlike most healing skills, Sanctuary can heal Mechanics inside Madogear and Homunculus.


  • [Lv 1] : Can heal up to 4 characters at a time, Heals 100 HP, Deals 50 damage, Duration 4 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Can heal up to 5 characters at a time, Heals 200 HP, Deals 100 damage, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Can heal up to 6 characters at a time, Heals 300 HP, Deals 150 damage, Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Can heal up to 7 characters at a time, Heals 400 HP, Deals 200 damage, Duration 13 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Can heal up to 8 characters at a time, Heals 500 HP, Deals 250 damage, Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Can heal up to 9 characters at a time, Heals 600 HP, Deals 300 damage, Duration 19 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Can heal up to 10 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 22 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : Can heal up to 11 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 25 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : Can heal up to 12 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 28 seconds.
  • [Lv10] : Can heal up to 13 characters at a time, Heals 777 HP, Deals 388 damage, Duration 31 seconds.

Status Recovery Recovery
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 5
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 9
 Removes Frozen, Stone Curse, Stun, White Imprison, Stasis, and Poem of the Netherworld status's from a target.


  • If used on Undead element monster, has a chance to inflict the Blind status.
  • If used on a passive monster that's attacking a player, it will return to its passive state.

  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 16
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cooldown: 0.5s
  • Range: 1
 Instantly jump behind a target and stab them in the back dealing damage. Hit rate is increased based on skill level.


  • If using a Dagger class weapon, you will hit the target 2 times.
  • If using a Bow class weapon, ATK% is halved.
  • Can not be used while in hiding status.

Raid Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Area of Effect:
    • 5x5
 Deal damage to an enemy and the targets around it. All enemies hit by this will take additional damage from all sources.

Additionally this skill has a chance to Stun and Blind the targets.

The damage increase is reduced against Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, +30% Damage to the target, (+15% to Boss), 13% Chance to Blind and/or Stun the target.
  • [Lv 2] : 350% ATK, +30% Damage to the target, (+15% to Boss), 16% Chance to Blind and/or Stun the target.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% ATK, +30% Damage to the target, (+15% to Boss), 19% Chance to Blind and/or Stun the target.
  • [Lv 4] : 650% ATK, +30% Damage to the target, (+15% to Boss), 22% Chance to Blind and/or Stun the target.
  • [Lv 5] : 800% ATK, +30% Damage to the target, (+15% to Boss), 25% Chance to Blind and/or Stun the target.

Steal Coin Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 15
  • Range: 1
 Attempt to steal zeny from a monster.

The chance to successfully steal zeny is based on the casters Base Level, DEX and LUK, and the monsters Base Level as well.


  • The amount of zeny stolen depends on the level of this skill.
  • Can not be used on Players or Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : 1% Chance to steal.
  • [Lv 2] : 2% Chance to steal.
  • [Lv 3] : 3% Chance to steal.

Enchant Poison Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 1

Poison React Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~8) : 20 + (5 x Skill Level)
    • (Lv 9~10) : 45
 Gives a 50% chance to auto cast Envenom when hit by a physical attack. Higher skill levels allow for more counter attacks.

If the attack you counter was Poison property, it deals increased damage and it has a 50% chance to poison the target.

This skill will end after the maximum number of counter attacks is reached or after 1 Poison property attack is countered.


  • This works against long ranged physical attacks as well.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% ATK, 1 Counter attack limit, 20 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 2] : 160% ATK, 1 Counter attack limit, 25 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 3] : 190% ATK, 2 Counter attack limit, 30 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 4] : 220% ATK, 2 Counter attack limit, 35 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 5] : 250% ATK, 3 Counter attack limit, 40 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 6] : 280% ATK, 3 Counter attack limit, 45 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 7] : 310% ATK, 4 Counter attack limit, 50 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 8] : 340% ATK, 4 Counter attack limit, 55 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv 9] : 370% ATK, 5 Counter attack limit, 60 Seconds duration.
  • [Lv10] : 400% ATK, 5 Counter attack limit, 60 Seconds duration.

Wizard Branch
Water Ball Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1~2) : 15
    • (Lv 3~4) : 20
    • (Lv 5) : 25
  • Var. Cast Time: (0.64 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: (0.16 x Skill Level)
  • Range: 9
  • Requires standing on a water cell
 Draw water from the ground to summon a Water Ball to throw at a target, using an area around you to strike an enemy many times for Water property magic damage.

The target will be hit 1 time for every Water cell used around you.


  • You can use a Sage's Deluge or a Ninja's Watery Evasion for this attack, but the ground effect on each cell is removed for each strike of Water Ball.


  • [Lv 1] : 130% MATK, Uses a 1x1 Area of water.
  • [Lv 2] : 160% MATK, Uses a 3x3 Area of water.
  • [Lv 3] : 190% MATK, Uses a 3x3 Area of water.
  • [Lv 4] : 220% MATK, Uses a 5x5 Area of water.
  • [Lv 5] : 250% MATK, Uses a 5x5 Area of water.
Ice Wall Support
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 20
  • Range: 9
 Create a wall of ice (1x5 area, centered on the targeted cell) which prevents anyone from walking through the area.


  • Ice Walls have 400 ~ 2200 HP, 0 DEF, 0 MDEF, and their HP decreases by 50 every second.
  • Ice Walls can be attacked by yourself, allies and enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 400 HP.
  • [Lv 2] : 600 HP.
  • [Lv 3] : 800 HP.
  • [Lv 4] : 1000 HP.
  • [Lv 5] : 1200 HP.
  • [Lv 6] : 1400 HP.
  • [Lv 7] : 1600 HP.
  • [Lv 8] : 1800 HP.
  • [Lv 9] : 2000 HP.
  • [Lv10] : 2200 HP.

Quagmire Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 0 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a 5x5 mud bog that cuts the Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX of enemies that enter it by half.

Also removes the effects of Increase Agility, Two-Handed Quicken, and Adrenaline Rush type skills.


  • You can have up to 3 Quagmires active at a time.
  • AGI and DEX will only drop by a maximum of 50 each.
  • In PvP enviroments, allies and the caster can be affected as well, and players will only receive a 25% penalty to Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX instead.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 25 seconds.

  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 9
 Reveal information about a monster.

Retrieve their level, current HP, size, race, attribute, DEF, MDEF and property damage table.


  • The information window will be shown to all party members.

  • Range: 3
  • Consumes : 1  Trap
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Set a trap on the ground that explodes when stepped on.


  • The trap will dismantle itself after a set duration.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% ATK, 65 seconds duration
  • [Lv 2] : 75% ATK, 50 seconds duration
  • [Lv 3] : 100% ATK, 35 seconds duration
  • [Lv 4] : 125% ATK, 20 seconds duration
  • [Lv 5] : 150% ATK, 5 seconds duration

  • Max Level: 10

  • [Lv 2] : 2000% MATK, 9 cells range, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 2250% MATK, 9 cells range, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2500% MATK, 9 cells range, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2750% MATK, 9 cells range, 5x5 area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 3000% MATK, 9 cells range, 5x5 area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 3250% MATK, 9 cells range, 5x5 area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 3500% MATK, 9 cells range, 5x5 area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 3750% MATK, 9 cells range, 7x7 area of effect.
  • [Lv 10] : 4000% MATK, 9 cells range, 7x7 area of effect.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (MATK) = [(1500 + Skill_Level × 250) × Homun_Level ÷ 150]%

Dieter

Skill Type Properties Description
Magma Flow Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 34:38:42:46:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s:2.5s:3.0s:3.5s:4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s:1.5s:1.0s:0.5s:0.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Every time Dieter takes damage, he spray lava around him dealing damage to nearby enemies.


  • This skill deals neutral property damage, and is fire when under Pyroclastic effects.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 122.


  • [Lv 1] : 100% ATK, 3% Chance of effect, Duration 30 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% ATK, 6% Chance of effect, Duration 45 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% ATK, 9% Chance of effect, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% ATK, 12% Chance of effect, Duration 75 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% ATK, 15% Chance of effect, Duration 90 seconds.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (ATK) = [(Base_Damage + Homun_Level × 3) * Homun_Level ÷ 120]%

Granitic Armor Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 54:58:62:66:70
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s:4.5s:4.0s:3.5s:3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Dieter covers itself and it's owner in a Granitic Armor reducing the damage taken for a short time.

After the effect ends it will deal damage to both the Homunculus and the player, but will not drop them below 1 HP.


  • The damage taken is reduced by DEF, cards and reductions.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 116.


  • [Lv 1] : 2% Damage reduction, 6% Max HP Damage taken on skills end, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 4% Damage reduction, 12% Max HP Damage taken on skills end, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 6% Damage reduction, 18% Max HP Damage taken on skills end, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 8% Damage reduction, 24% Max HP Damage taken on skills end, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 10% Damage reduction, 30% Max HP Damage taken on skills end, Duration 60 seconds.
Lava Slide Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 30:35:40:45:50
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s:4.5s:4.0s:3.5s:3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Dieter sprays out hot lava over a 7x7 area on the ground, dealing damage every second to enemies inside the area.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 109.
  • Only one instance of Lava Slide can be active at a time.
  • Damage is increased based on Dieter's level and STR stat.
  • When you recast this skill, the old one will be removed, and the new one will be placed.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% ATK, Duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 100% ATK, Duration 7 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 150% ATK, Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 200% ATK, Duration 9 seconds.

  • [Lv 9] : 450% ATK, Duration 14 seconds.
  • [Lv 10] : 500% ATK, Duration 15 seconds.
Pyroclastic Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 20:28:36:44:52
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.5s:2.0s:2.5s:3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Dieter overheats its arms and your weapon, increasing both his ATK, and your weapon ATK.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 131.
  • This ATK bonus is increased based on Dieter's level.
  • You can't swap or unequip your weapon while this buff is active.
  • Healer NPC removes it.


  • [Lv 1] : (Homun_Level + 20) ATK, Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : (Homun_Level + 40) ATK, Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : (Homun_Level + 60) ATK, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : (Homun_Level + 80) ATK, Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : (Homun_Level + 100) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : (Homun_Level + 120) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : (Homun_Level + 140) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : (Homun_Level + 160) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : (Homun_Level + 180) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
  • [Lv 10] : (Homun_Level + 200) ATK, Duration 180 seconds.
Volcanic Ash Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 60:65:70:75:80
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s:3.5s:3.0s:2.5s:2.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Dieter spreads a 3x3 area of ash on the ground, causing the Ash status effect to enemies in the area.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 102.
  • You can place up to 3 Volcanic Ash at a time.


[Ash status Effect]

  • Reduces plant race monsters DEF by 50%.
  • Reduces water monsters ATK and FLEE by 50%.
  • Reduce HIT by 50% for all monsters and players.
  • Skills have a 50% chance to miss.
  • Fire-element attacks will deal 150% damage on targets with the Ash status effect.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 8 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 16 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 24 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 32 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 40 seconds.

Eira

Skill Type Properties Description

  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40:50:60:70:80
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.6s:1.4s:1.2s:1.0s:0.8s
  • Cast can not be interrupted

  • Eira must have loyal intimacy to use this skill.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 128.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 360 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 420 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 480 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 540 seconds.

Overed Boost Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 70:90:110:130:150
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.8s:0.7s:0.6s:0.5s:0.4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.2s:0.3s:0.4s:0.5s:0.6s
  • Cooldown: 60s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Eira sets the Flee and ASPD of itself and the owner to specific amount, at the cost of halving DEF.

When the skill ends or is recast, it will drain half of the owners Max SP, and remove 50 hunger from Eira.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 114.


  • [Lv 1] : 440 Flee, 182 ASPD.
  • [Lv 2] : 480 Flee, 184 ASPD.
  • [Lv 3] : 520 Flee, 186 ASPD.
  • [Lv 4] : 560 Flee, 188 ASPD.
  • [Lv 5] : 600 Flee, 190 ASPD.
Eraser Cutter Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25:30:35:40:45
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.5s:2.0s:2.5s:3.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 7
 Eira attacks a single target with a sonic blade to deal Neutral property magic damage.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the Homunculus's Base Level and INT.
  • This skill ignores the targets MDEF.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 106.


  • [Lv 1] : 450% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 900% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 1350% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 1800% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 2250% MATK.

  • [Lv 7] : 3150% MATK.
  • [Lv 8] : 3600% MATK.
  • [Lv 9] : 4050% MATK.
  • [Lv10] : 4500% MATK.
Xeno Slasher Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 90:100:110:120:130
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 5.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Eira releases sonic blades to a targeted location dealing Wind magic damage to selected area.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 121.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the Homunculus's Base Level and INT.
  • This skill ignores the targets MDEF.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% MATK, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 1] : 700% MATK, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 1] : 1050% MATK, 3x3 area of effect.
  • [Lv 1] : 1400% MATK, 5x5 area of effect.

  • [Lv 1] : 2100% MATK, 5x5 area of effect.

  • [Lv 1] : 2800% MATK, 7x7 area of effect.
  • [Lv 1] : 3150% MATK, 7x7 area of effect.
  • [Lv 1] : 3500% MATK, 9x9 area of effect.


Silent Breeze Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 45:54:63:72:81
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.2s:1.4s:1.6s:1.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s:0.8s:0.6s:0.4s:0.2s
  • Range: 5:5:7:7:9
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Eira heals a target and inflicts the Silence status to both herself and the target. The silence status will override and replace certain other status effects on the target.


Effects overridden

  • Chaos
  • Deep Sleep
  • Hallucination
  • Harmonize
  • Howling
  • Siren's Voice
  • Sleep


  • This skill is unlocked at level 137.
  • The amount of HP restored is based on Eira's level and MATK.


  • [Lv 1] : 5 Cells range, Duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 5 Cells range, Duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 7 Cells range, Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 7 Cells range, Duration 18 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 9 Cells range, Duration 21 seconds.

Eleanor

Skill Type Properties Description
Style Change Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 35
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Changes Eleanor's fighting style between Fighting and Grappling.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 100.
  • Eleanor is always summoned in the Fighting mode.
  • In either mode, Eleanor has a 50% chance to get a Spirit Sphere when dealing or taking damage. Up to a maximum of 10.
Sonic Claw Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20:25:30:35:40
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 3
 Eleanor attacks a target for each spirit sphere she has.


  • This skills damage is increased depending on the Genetic's Base Level.
  • Sonic Claw can only be used in Fighting mode.
  • Silver Bain Rush can be used within 2 seconds of using this skill.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 100.


  • [Lv 1] : 60% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 2] : 120% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 3] : 180% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 4] : 240% ATK per hit.
  • [Lv 5] : 300% ATK per hit.

Tinder Breaker Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 20:25:30:35:40
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Range: 3:4:5:6:7
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Eleanor jumps to a target twisting it's joints dealing fixed damage, and reduces the targets Flee by 50%.


  • This skills damage is increased depending on the Genetic's Base Level.
  • This skill can only be used in Grapple Mode.
  • Continual Break Combo can be used 2 seconds after this skill.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 100.


  • [Lv 1] : 2500 Damage, 3 Cells range.
  • [Lv 2] : 5000 Damage, 4 Cells range.
  • [Lv 3] : 7500 Damage, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 4] : 10000 Damage, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv 5] : 12500 Damage, 7 Cells range.
Continual Break Combo Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 10:20:30:40:50
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 1
 Used as a combo attack 2 seconds after Tinder Breaker. Deals damage and slowly drains the targets SP.

If used on a monster the SP drain will be replaced with damage instead.


  • This skills damage is increased depending on the Genetic's Base Level.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 112.


  • [Lv 1] : 4000 Damage, 3 Cells range.
  • [Lv 2] : 8000 Damage, 4 Cells range.
  • [Lv 3] : 12000 Damage, 5 Cells range.
  • [Lv 4] : 16000 Damage, 6 Cells range.
  • [Lv 5] : 20000 Damage, 7 Cells range.
Eternal Quick Combo Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 24:28:32:36:40
  • Sphere/Coin Cost: 2
  • Cast Delay: ?s
  • Cooldown: ?s
 Used after Continual Break Combo to complete the combo.

Targets are also Stunned, lose additional HP, and have their Equipment ATK and DEF reduced.


  • This skills damage is increased depending on the Genetic's Base Level.
  • This skill is unlocked at level 133.


  • [Lv 1] : 6000 Damage, 2% HP Drain, -5% ATK and DEF.
  • [Lv 2] : 12000 Damage, 4% HP Drain, -10% ATK and DEF.
  • [Lv 3] : 18000 Damage, 6% HP Drain, -15% ATK and DEF.
  • [Lv 4] : 24000 Damage, 8% HP Drain, -20% ATK and DEF.
  • [Lv 5] : 30000 Damage, 10% HP Drain, -25% ATK and DEF.

Poison Mist Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 65:75:85:95:105
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.5s:0.7s:0.9s:1.1s:1.3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Range: 5
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Sera releases a poison mist in a 7x7 area of effect, causing Poison property damage and the Blind status.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 116.
  • Only 1 Poison Mist can be active at a time.
  • Additional bonus is increased based on Sera's DEX.
  • Deals damage every second.
  • When you recast this skill, the old one will be removed, and the new one will be placed.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% ATK, 20% Chance to cause Poison Mist, Poison Mist duration 3 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% ATK, 30% Chance to Poison Mist, Poison Mist duration 6 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% ATK, 40% Chance to Poison Mist, Poison Mist duration 9 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% ATK, 50% Chance to Poison Mist, Poison Mist duration 12 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% ATK, 60% Chance to Poison Mist, Poison Mist duration 15 seconds.
Pain Killer Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ally
  • SP Cost: 48:52:56:60:64
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s:1.2s:1.4s:1.6s:1.8s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s:0.8s:0.6s:0.4s:0.2s
  • Range: 1
  • Cast can not be interrupted
 Sera attacks a target with a paralyzing poison and reducing the damage they receive.


  • This skill is unlocked at level 123.
  • Targets under the effect of the poison will have the endure status for the duration.
  • The damage reduction is a flat reduction of (SkillLevel * 200)*(HomunculusLevel / 150) up to a maximum of 2000.
  • This is applied after all reduction modifiers except Steel Body.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 330 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 360 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 390 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 420 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 450 seconds.
  • [Lv 6] : Duration 480 seconds.
  • [Lv 7] : Duration 510 seconds.
  • [Lv 8] : Duration 540 seconds.
  • [Lv 9] : Duration 570 seconds.
  • [Lv 10] : Duration 600 seconds.
